anya-e0803n:20_0: Yasmā na hoti sammoho, akkharesu padesu ca.
anya-e0803n:27_0: Tasmā tadatthikā suddhaṃ, nayaṃ nissāya viññunaṃ;
anya-e0803n:30_0: Sandhināmādibhedo ca, padānaṃ tu vibhatti ca.
anya-e0803n:34_3: vīsatiyā upasaggesu yena kenaci upasaggena atthavisesakāraṇena paṭibaddhā atthavisesampi dhāretīti dhātu,
anya-e0803n:34_5: ayamito paccayo paro”tiādinā anekappakārena paṇḍitehi dhāriyati esātipi dhātu,
anya-e0803n:34_6: vidahanti viduno etāya saddanipphattiṃ ayalohādimayaṃ ayalohādidhātūhi viyātipi dhātu.
anya-e0803n:37_0: Atha vā jinamate “tato gotamidhātūnī”ti ettha dhātusaddo liṅgavipallāse vattati “pabbatāni vanāni cā”ti ettha pabbatasaddo viya,
anya-e0803n:37_1: na panettha vattabbaṃ “aṭṭhivācakattā napuṃsakaniddeso”ti aṭṭhivācakattepi “dhātuyo”ti itthiliṅgadassanato.
anya-e0803n:37_4: Bhū i ku ke takka taka taki sukaiccādayo.
anya-e0803n:37_5: Gaṇato te aṭṭhavidhā bhūvādigaṇo rudhādigaṇo divādigaṇo svādigaṇo kiyādigaṇo gahādigaṇo tanādigaṇo curādigaṇo cāti.
anya-e0803n:37_7: Anekavidhā hi paccayā nānappakāresu nāmanāma kitanāma samāsanāma taddhitanāmākhyātesu pavattanato.
anya-e0803n:37_8: Saṅkhepato pana duvidhāva nāmapaccayo ākhyātapaccayo cāti.
anya-e0803n:37_10: Tattha vikaraṇapaccayo akārādisattarasavidho aggahitaggahaṇena pannarasavidho ca.
anya-e0803n:37_12: Ye rūpanipphattiyā upakārakā atthavisesassa jotakā vā ajotakā vā lopanīyā vā alopanīyā vā,
anya-e0803n:38_0: Paṭicca kāraṇaṃ taṃ taṃ, entīti paccayātha vā;
anya-e0803n:41_0: Nāmakappe yato tasmā, na taṃ vitthārayāmase.
anya-e0803n:44_0: Iccānekavidhesu paccayesu “vikaraṇapaccayā nāma ime”ti sallakkhetabbā. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0803n:44_5: svādigaṇato ṇu ṇā uṇāpaccayā honti kattari,
anya-e0803n:45_0: Akāro ca ivaṇṇo ca, e okārā ca yo tathā;
anya-e0803n:46_0: Ṇu ṇā uṇā ca nā ppa ṇhā-yirā ṇe ṇayapaccayā.
anya-e0803n:49_0: Ye evaṃ niddiṭṭhehi vikaraṇapaccayehi tadaññehi ca sappaccayā aṭṭhavidhā dhātugaṇā suttantesu bahūpakārā,
anya-e0803n:49_5: na pana “dhammabhūto”tiādīsu pattiatthavācikā aparā bhūdhātu viya sakammikā.
anya-e0803n:49_6: Esā hi pariabhiādīhi upasaggehi yuttāyeva sakammikā bhavati,
anya-e0803n:49_7: na upa parā pātuādīhi upasagganipātehi yuttāpi.
anya-e0803n:49_8: Ato imissā siddhāni rūpāni dvidhā ñeyyāni akammakapadāni sakammakapadāni cāti.
anya-e0803n:51_0: Tatra bhavati ubbhavati samubbhavati pabhavati parābhavati sambhavati vibhavati,
anya-e0803n:51_1: bhoti sambhoti vibhoti pātubhavati pātubbhavati pātubhoti,
anya-e0803n:51_4: so “āvibhavati tirobhavatī”tiādīsu āvi tironipātā viya bhūdhātuto nipphannākhyātasaddassa neva visesakaro,
anya-e0803n:51_21: te bhūdhātuto nipphannākhyātasaddassa visesakarā ceva sakammakattasādhakā ca.
anya-e0803n:52_0: Tatra bhavatīti hoti vijjati paññāyati sarūpaṃ labhati.
anya-e0803n:52_4: Atha vā pabhavatīti yato kutoci sandati,
anya-e0803n:52_8: Parābhavatīti parābhavo hoti byasanaṃ āpajjati avuddhiṃ pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0803n:52_9: Sambhavatīti suṭṭhu bhavati vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjati.
anya-e0803n:52_12: Bhoti sambhoti vibhotīti imāni “bhavati sambhavati vibhavatī”ti imehi yathākkamaṃ samānaniddesāni.
anya-e0803n:52_13: Pātubhavatīti pakāsati dissati paññāyati pākaṭaṃ hoti.
anya-e0803n:52_15: Evaṃ akammakapadānaṃ yathārahaṃ sakammakākammakavasena atthakathanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:53_0: Paribhotidukādīsu pana sattasu dukesu yathākkamaṃ dve dve padāni samānatthāni,
anya-e0803n:53_1: tasmā dve dve padāniyeva gahetvā niddisissāma.
anya-e0803n:53_2: Tatra paribhoti paribhavatīti paraṃ hiṃsati pīḷeti,
anya-e0803n:53_5: Adhibhoti adhibhavatīti paraṃ abhimadditvā bhavati attano vasaṃ vattāpeti.
anya-e0803n:53_7: Anubhoti anubhavatīti sukhadukkhaṃ vedeti paribhuñjati sukhadukkhapaṭisaṃvedī hoti.
anya-e0803n:53_8: Samanubhoti samanubhavatīti sukhadukkhaṃ suṭṭhu vedeti suṭṭhu paribhuñjati suṭṭhu sukhadukkhapaṭisaṃvedī hoti.
anya-e0803n:53_11: Katthaci pana gacchatīti pavattatīti evaṃ akammakavasenapi.
anya-e0803n:59_0: Tatra bhāvetīti puggalo bhāvetabbaṃ yaṃ kiñci bhāveti āsevati bahulīkaroti,
anya-e0803n:59_2: Vibhāvetīti bhāvetabbaṃ yaṃ kiñci vibhāveti visesena bhāveti,
anya-e0803n:59_3: vividhena vā ākārena bhāveti bhāvayati vaḍḍheti,
anya-e0803n:59_5: Sambhāvetīti yassa kassaci guṇaṃ sambhāveti sambhāvayati suṭṭhu pakāseti ukkaṃseti.
anya-e0803n:59_6: Paribhāvetīti paribhāvetabbaṃ yaṃ kiñci paribhāveti paribhāvayati samantato vaḍḍheti.
anya-e0803n:59_8: Atha vā paribhāvetīti vāsetabbaṃ vatthuṃ paribhāveti paribhāvayati vāseti gandhaṃ gāhāpeti.
anya-e0803n:59_10: Paribhāvāpetīti puggalo puggalena sapattaṃ paribhāvāpeti hiṃsāpeti,
anya-e0803n:59_12: Abhibhāvāpetīti puggalo puggalena sapattaṃ abhibhāvāpeti ajjhottharāpeti.
anya-e0803n:59_13: Anubhāvāpetīti puggalo puggalena sampattiṃ anubhāvāpeti paribhojeti.
anya-e0803n:61_0: Kriyaṃ sādheti etassa, dīpakaṃ sāsane padaṃ.
anya-e0803n:67_3: tathā paribhāvāpetīti puggalo puggalassa sapattaṃ paribhāvāpetīti.
anya-e0803n:70_0: Bhaviyate vibhaviyate paribhaviyate abhibhaviyate anubhaviyate paribhūyate abhibhūyate anubhūyate,
anya-e0803n:70_2: Aññathā ca bhaviyyate vibhaviyyate paribhaviyyate abhibhaviyyate anubhaviyyate paribhuyyate abhibhuyyate anubhuyyateti.
anya-e0803n:70_3: Ettha kammuno kriyāpadāniyeva kammakattuno kriyāpadāni katvā yojetabbāni.
anya-e0803n:71_0: Tatra bhaviyateti bhāvetabbaṃ yaṃ kiñci puggalena bhāviyate āseviyate bahulīkariyate,
anya-e0803n:71_2: Vibhaviyateti vibhāvetabbaṃ yaṃ kiñci puggalena vibhaviyate visesena bhaviyate,
anya-e0803n:71_7: Abhibhaviyateti sapatto puggalena abhibhaviyate ajjhotthariyate abhimaddiyate.
anya-e0803n:71_10: Sesāni pana yathāvuttehi yaṃ kammameva padhānato gahetvā niddisiyati padaṃ,
anya-e0803n:71_12: Tasmā kattari ekavacanena niddiṭṭhepi yadi kammaṃ bahuvacanavasena vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0803n:71_16: Tathā kattari bahuvacanena niddiṭṭhepi yadi kammaṃ ekavacanavasena vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0803n:71_24: Iminā nayena sabbattha kammuno kriyāpadesu vohāro kātabbo.
anya-e0803n:71_25: Yasmiṃ pana kammuno kriyāpade kammatthadīpake kammabhūtassevatthassa kattubhāvaparikappo hoti,
anya-e0803n:71_27: taṃ kammuno kriyāpadato visuṃ na labbhati.
anya-e0803n:71_29: Sayameva paribhaviyate dubbhāsitaṃ bhaṇaṃ bālo tappaccayā aññehi paribhūtopi,
anya-e0803n:71_30: sayameva abhibhaviyate pāpakārī niraye nirayapālehi abhibhūtopi tathārūpassa kammassa sayaṃ katattāti.
anya-e0803n:71_32: sayameva kaṭo kariyatetiādīsu viya sukhābhisaṅkharaṇīyatā labbhateva,
anya-e0803n:74_3: Tatra yathā ṭhīyatepadassa ṭhānanti bhāvavasena atthakathanamicchanti,
anya-e0803n:74_5: Yathā ca ṭhānaṃ ṭhiti bhavanantiādīhi bhāvavācakakitantanāmapadehi saddhiṃ sambandhe chaṭṭhiyojanamicchanti,
anya-e0803n:74_6: na tathā ṭhīyate bhūyatetiādīhi bhāvavācakākhyātapadehi saddhiṃ sambandhe chaṭṭhiyojanā icchitabbā sambandhe
anya-e0803n:74_8: Yasmiṃ payoge yaṃ kammuno kriyāpadena samānagatikaṃ katvā vinā kammena niddisiyati kriyāpadaṃ,
anya-e0803n:74_9: kattuvācakapadaṃ pana paccattavacanena vā karaṇavacanena vā niddisiyati,
anya-e0803n:74_11: Na hi sabbathā kattāramanissāya bhāvo pavattati.
anya-e0803n:74_12: Evaṃ santepi bhāvo nāma kevalo bhavanalavanapacanādiko dhātuatthoyeva.
anya-e0803n:74_13: Akkharacintakā pana “ṭhīyate bhūyate”tiādīsu bhāvavisayesu karaṇavacanameva payuñjanti “nanu nāma pabbajitena
anya-e0803n:74_15: tasmā tesaṃ mate “tena ubbhaviyate”ti karaṇavacanena yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:92_0: Siyā sakammakaṃ, netaṃ, tathā hotīti dīpaye.
anya-e0803n:94_0: Vinā yapaccayaṃ tiṭṭhe, na tathā tiṭṭhate idaṃ.
anya-e0803n:95_0: Na kattari bhuvādīnaṃ, gaṇe yapaccayo ruto;
anya-e0803n:97_0: Na bhūdhātu divādīnaṃ, dhātūnaṃ dissate gaṇe;
anya-e0803n:105_0: Sarūpato pakāseti, tasmā te pākaṭā ubho;
anya-e0803n:111_0: Yasmā ca kattubhāvena, bhāvo nāma na tiṭṭhati;
anya-e0803n:113_0: Yajjevaṃ kattuvohāro, bhāvassa tu kathaṃ siyā;
anya-e0803n:115_0: Iti ce nissayānaṃ tu, vasā nissitasambhavā;
anya-e0803n:123_0: Pāḷiṃ patvāna tesaṃ tu, vacanaṃ appamāṇakaṃ;
anya-e0803n:125_0: Pāṭho pāvacane diṭṭho, tasmā evaṃ vademase;
anya-e0803n:127_0: Vacanehi yutaṃ dvīhi, icchitabbanti no ruci;
anya-e0803n:131_2: kammakattukriyāpadehi vā pañcadhā bhūdhātuto nipphannāni kriyāpadāni nānappakārena niddiṭṭhāni,
anya-e0803n:131_3: etāni lokiyānaṃ bhāvabhedavasena vohārabhedo hotīti dassanatthaṃ visuṃ visuṃ vuttāni.
anya-e0803n:131_5: Hetukattā hi suddhakattusaṅkhāte kārake tassaṅgabhāvato saṅgahamupagacchati,
anya-e0803n:131_8: So hi gamanapacanalavanādivasenānekavidhopi kriyāsabhāvattā bhedarahito kārakantaro.
anya-e0803n:131_10: Tena pāvacane bhāvavācakaṃ padaṃ bahuvacanantampi dissati.
anya-e0803n:131_16: Iti mukhyato vā hetuto vā bhāvassa kārakatā na labbhati.
anya-e0803n:131_21: tasmā nāmikapade kārakalakkhaṇe bhāvakārakanti vohāraṃ pahāya kattukammakaraṇasampadānāpādānādhikaraṇānaṃ
anya-e0803n:131_22: channaṃ vatthūnaṃ kattukārakakammakārakantiādi vohāro kariyati veyyākaraṇehi.
anya-e0803n:131_23: Evaṃ niruttinayaṃ nissāya vuttaṃ bhāvakārakañca dve ca kammakattukārakānīti kārakattayaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0803n:136_0: Idha bhāvakammesu attanopaduppattiṃ keci akkharacintakā avassamicchantīti tesaṃ mativibhāvanatthamamhehi
anya-e0803n:136_1: bhāvakammānaṃ kriyāpadāni attanopadavasenuddiṭṭhāni ceva niddiṭṭhāni ca.
anya-e0803n:136_2: Sabbānipi panetāni tikārakāni kriyāpadāni kriyāpadamālamicchatā parassapadattanopadavasena yojetabbāni.
anya-e0803n:136_3: Pāḷiādīsu hi tikārakāni kriyāpadāni parassapadattanopadavasena dvidhā ṭhitāni.
anya-e0803n:136_11: Kathaṃ paṭipannassa puggalassa rūpaṃ vibhoti vibhaviyyati.
anya-e0803n:136_19: So pahīyethāpi no pahīyethāti evaṃ dvidhā ṭhitāni.
anya-e0803n:143_0: Padānaṃ niddeso panati antiādīnaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ vacanānamanurūpena yojetabbo.
anya-e0803n:143_1: Evaṃ tikārakakriyāpadāni sarūpato vavatthānato niddesato ca veditabbāni.
anya-e0803n:144_0: Idāni nopasaggākammikādivasena bhavatissa dhātussa vinicchayaṃ vadāma –
anya-e0803n:146_0: Sopasaggā sakammā ca, iti bhūti vibhāvitā.
anya-e0803n:150_0: Gahetvā catudhā hoti, iti ñeyyaṃ visesato.
anya-e0803n:152_0: Bhūdhātu kārite sante, ekakammā bhavanti hi.
anya-e0803n:165_0: Tatra yassa payogamhi, padassa kattunā kriyā;
anya-e0803n:166_0: Nipphāditā vinā kammaṃ, na hoti taṃ sakammakaṃ.
anya-e0803n:167_0: “Pacatī”ti hi vutte tu, yena kenaci jantunā;
anya-e0803n:168_0: Odanaṃ vā panaññaṃ vā, kiñci vatthunti ñāyati.
anya-e0803n:169_0: Yassa pana payogamhi, kammena rahitā kriyā;
anya-e0803n:185_0: Ettha bhavatidhātumhi, nayo eso na labbhati;
anya-e0803n:187_0: Ediso ca nayo nāma, pāḷiyaṃ tu na dissati;
anya-e0803n:190_0: Kārāpetī”ti yo pāṭho, niddese taṃ suniddise.
anya-e0803n:193_0: Etaṃ nayaṃ vidū ñatvā, yoje pāṭhānurūpato;
anya-e0803n:196_0: Sagaṇe sagaṇe tesaṃ, vuttiṃ dīpetumeva ca.
anya-e0803n:197_0: “Asmiṃ gaṇe ayaṃ dhātu, hotī”ti tehi viññuno;
anya-e0803n:199_0: Tathā hi bhāvakammesu, vihito paccayo tu yo;
anya-e0803n:202_0: Nānāvidho nayo evaṃ, mayā ettha pakāsito.
anya-e0803n:204_0: Te patvākhyātasadde avigatavimatī honti ñāṇīpi tasmā;
anya-e0803n:206_0: Yogaṃ tesaṃ payoge paṭutaramatitaṃ patthayāno kareyya.
anya-e0803n:215_0: Tatthati anti, si tha, mi ma, te ante, se vhe, e mhe iccetā vattamānāvibhattiyo nāma.
anya-e0803n:216_0: Tu antu, hi tha, mi ma, taṃ antaṃ, su vho, e āmase iccetā pañcamīvibhattiyo nāma.
anya-e0803n:218_0: A u, e ttha, aṃ mha, ttha re, ttho vho, iṃ mhe iccetā parokkhāvibhattiyo nāma.
anya-e0803n:219_0: Ā ū, o ttha, aṃ mhā, ttha tthuṃ, se vhaṃ, iṃ mhase iccetā hiyyattanīvibhattiyo nāma.
anya-e0803n:220_0: Ī uṃ, o ttha, iṃ mhā, ā ū, se vhaṃ, aṃ mhe iccetā ajjatanīvibhattiyo nāma.
anya-e0803n:223_0: Sabbāsametāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ yāni yāni pubbakāni cha padāni,
anya-e0803n:223_2: Yāni yāni pana parāni cha padāni,
anya-e0803n:224_0: Parassapadānamattanopadānañca dve dve padāni paṭhamamajjhimuttamapurisā nāma.
anya-e0803n:225_0: Dvīsu dvīsu padesu paṭhamaṃ paṭhamaṃ ekavacanaṃ, dutiyaṃ dutiyaṃ bahuvacanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:226_1: mi ma iccetāni parassapadāni. Te ante, se vhe,
anya-e0803n:227_2: iti bahuvacananti evaṃ ekavacanabahuvacanāni kamato ñeyyāni.
anya-e0803n:228_2: syādīhi nāmikavibhattīhi saha sabbasaṅgāhakavasena pana sakatthaparatthādibhede atthe vibhajatīti vibhatti,
anya-e0803n:228_3: kammādayo vā kārake ekavacanabahuvacanavasena vibhajatīti vibhatti,
anya-e0803n:228_6: atha vā satipi jinasāsane avibhattikaniddese sabbena sabbaṃ vibhattīhi vinā atthassā’niddisitabbato visesena
anya-e0803n:228_7: vividhena vā ākārena bhajanti sevanti naṃ paṇḍitātipi vibhatti.
anya-e0803n:233_2: therānaṃ ayanti thero. Ko so? Vādo.
anya-e0803n:233_3: Theravādo aññesaṃ vādānaṃ uttamoti ayamattho veditabbo.
anya-e0803n:237_0: “Bho khāda piva”iccatra, vade yo koci codako.
anya-e0803n:239_0: “Bhikkhu, bho purisi”ccādi, padampi, na hidaṃ tathā.
anya-e0803n:240_0: “Bhikkhu, bho purisi”ccādi, si ga lopena vuccati;
anya-e0803n:242_2: Tatrāpi “aṭṭha ca puggala dhammadasā te”ti ettha chandavasena puggala iti rassakaraṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0803n:242_3: na “kakusandha koṇāgamano ca kassapo”ti ettha kakusandha iti avibhattikaniddeso viya avibhattikaniddeso daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0803n:242_4: “Bhikkhu nisinne mātugāmo upanisinno vā hoti upanipanno vā”ti ettha pana bhikkhūti idaṃ bhikkhumhīti
anya-e0803n:242_5: vattabbatthattā bhumme paccattantipi adiṭṭhavibhattikaniddesotipi vattuṃ yujjati.
anya-e0803n:242_6: Tattha pana chandavasena katarassattā tāni padāni avibhattikaniddesapakkhampi bhajantīti vattuṃ na yujjati.
anya-e0803n:243_0: Tattha parassapadānīti parassa atthabhūtāni padāni parassapadāni.
anya-e0803n:243_1: Etthuttamapurisesu attano atthesupi attanopadavohāro na kariyati.
anya-e0803n:247_1: Ettha pana paṭhamamajjhimapurisesu parassatthesupi parassapadavohāro na kariyati.
anya-e0803n:255_0: Tasmā idha paṭhamapurisādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ purisānaṃ vacanatthaṃ na pariyesāma.
anya-e0803n:255_1: Rūḷhiyā hi porāṇehi tyādīnaṃ purisasaññā vihitā.
anya-e0803n:256_2: Atha vā bahuttepi sati samudāyavasena jātivasena vā cittena sampiṇḍetvā ekīkatassatthassa ekassa viya vacanampi ekavacanaṃ,
anya-e0803n:256_3: bahutte nissitassa nissayavohārena vuttassa nissayavasena ekassa viya vacanampi ekavacanaṃ,
anya-e0803n:256_4: ekattalakkhaṇena bavhatthānaṃ ekavacanaṃ viya vacanampi ekavacanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:256_6: samāyogaputhuārammaṇavasena ekatthassa bahūnaṃ viya vacanaṃ bahuvacanaṃ,
anya-e0803n:256_7: tathā ye ye bahavo tannivāsataṃputtasaṅkhātassekassatthassa rūḷhīvasena bahūnaṃ viya vacanampi bahuvacanaṃ,
anya-e0803n:256_8: ekassatthassa aññenatthena ekābhidhānavasena bahūnaṃ viya vacanampi bahuvacanaṃ,
anya-e0803n:256_9: ekassatthassa nissitavasena bahūnaṃ viya vacanampi bahuvacanaṃ,
anya-e0803n:256_10: ekassatthassa ārammaṇabhedakiccabhedavasena bahūnaṃ viya vacanampi bahuvacanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:256_14: bahumhi viya ca vattabbe bahuvacanaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

anya-e0803n:261_0: Katthaci pana īdisesu ṭhānesu bahuvacanapayogāpi dissanti.

anya-e0803n:261_8: saṅgayhamānā ca bavhatthabahuvacane saṅgahaṃ gacchanti visuṃyeva vā,

anya-e0803n:264_7: āgatigatiyā asati cutūpapāto na hoti” iccevamādayo ekattalakkhaṇe bavhatthānaṃ ekavacanapayogā.
anya-e0803n:265_2: padhānanti kho meghiya vadamānaṃ kinti vadeyyāma” iccevamādayo ekassatthassa attavasena bahuvacanapayogā.

anya-e0803n:268_2: Na hi tathāgato satisampajaññarahito dhammaṃ deseti,
anya-e0803n:268_3: yutti ca na dissati “mātikāyaṃ pucchāyaṃ vissajjane cāti tīsupi ṭhānesu appaccayādidhamme desento satthā
anya-e0803n:268_4: punappunaṃ bahuvacanavasena desanāsote patitvā dhammaṃ desetī”ti.
anya-e0803n:269_0: “Katame dhammā appaccayā” iccevamādayo ekassatthassa mātikānusandhinayena bahuvacanapayogā.
anya-e0803n:270_0: “Ime dhammā appaccayā” iccevamādayo ekassatthassa pucchānusandhinayena bahuvacanapayogā.
anya-e0803n:271_1: te dhamme ṭhapetvā avasesā kusalākusalābyākatā dhammā” iccevamādayo ekassatthassa pucchāsabhāgena bahuvacanapayogā.
anya-e0803n:272_0: “Atthi bhikkhave aññeva dhammā gambhīrā duddasā duranubodhā santā paṇītā atakkāvacarā nipuṇā paṇḍitavedanīyā,
anya-e0803n:272_1: ye tathāgato sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedetī”ti ayamekassatthassa puthucittasamāyogaputhuārammaṇavasena bahuvacanapayogo.
anya-e0803n:273_0: “Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ mahāvane,
anya-e0803n:276_0: Iccevamādayo saddā ye ye bahavo, tannivāsataṃputtasaṅkhātassekatthassa rūḷhīvasena bahuvacanapayogā.
anya-e0803n:277_0: “Sāriputtamoggallāne āmantesi ‘gacchatha tumhe sāriputtā kīṭāgiriṃ gantvā assajipunabbasukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kīṭāgirismā pabbājanīyakammaṃ karotha,
anya-e0803n:277_3: etha byagghā nivattavho” iccevamādayo ekassatthassa aññenatthena ekābhidhānavasena bahuvacanapayogā.

anya-e0803n:280_0: “Cattāro sammappadhānā”ti ayaṃ pana kiccabhedena ekassatthassa bahuvacanapayogo.
anya-e0803n:281_5: Ettha pana jātyāpekkhekavacanaṃ atthato sāmaññāpekkhekavacanamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:309_1: Te hi upacāramukhyasabhāvavasena karonti karaṇanti ca “kārakā”ti vuccanti.
anya-e0803n:309_2: Teva yathākkamaṃ kriyānimitta taṃsādhaka taṃsabhāvāti veditabbā.
anya-e0803n:310_0: Kammaṃ kattā ca bhāvo ca, iccevaṃ kārakā tidhā;
anya-e0803n:318_0: Kārakattaṃ tu bhāvassa, sacepi na samīritaṃ;
anya-e0803n:320_0: Kriyānipphatti natthīti, yuttitopi ca natthi taṃ;
anya-e0803n:323_1: Tattha paṭhamapuriso ākhyātapadena tulyādhikaraṇe sādhakavācake vā kammavācake vā tumhā’mhasaddavajjite
anya-e0803n:323_3: bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesuñāṇa”ntiādīsu viya payujjamānepi,
anya-e0803n:323_6: vuccatīti vacana”ntiādīsu viya appayujjamānepi sabbadhātūhi paro hoti.
anya-e0803n:323_7: Katthaci pana pāḷippadese nāmassa appayuttattā paṭhamapurisapayogattho duranubodho bhavati,
anya-e0803n:323_11: tasmiṃ dukkhasāsanārocane vattuṃ avisahanavasena kilamantaṃ maṃ devassa ubho pādā assāsentu,
anya-e0803n:323_12: vissaṭṭho kathehīti maṃ vadathāti adhippāyo ca bhavati.
anya-e0803n:325_0: Tasmā upaṭṭhahaṃ gaṇhe, garuṃ garumataṃ vidū.
anya-e0803n:326_9: Yattha satipi nāmassa sādhakavācakatte apaccattavacanattā ākhyātapadena tulyādhikaraṇatā na labbhati,
anya-e0803n:326_10: tattha kammavācakaṃ paccattavacanabhūtaṃ tulyādhikaraṇapadaṃ paṭicca paṭhamapurisādayo tayo labbhanti.
anya-e0803n:326_15: Ettha panidaṃ vacanaṃ na vattabbaṃ “nindanti tuṇhimāsina’ntiādīsu satipi nāmassa kammavācakatte apaccattavacanattā
anya-e0803n:326_16: ākhyātapadena tulyādhikaraṇatā na labbhatīti paṭhamapurisuppatti na siyā”ti.
anya-e0803n:326_18: “Nindanti tuṇhimāsina”ntiādīsu “janā”ti ajjhāharitabbassa sādhakavācakassa nāmassa saddhimākhyātapadena tulyādhikaraṇabhāvassa icchitattā.
anya-e0803n:327_0: Majjhimapuriso ākhyātapadena tulyādhikaraṇe sādhakavācake vā kammavācake vā paccattavacanabhūte tumhasadde payujjamānepi,
anya-e0803n:327_1: taṭṭhāniyatte sati appayujjamānepi sabbadhātūhi paro hoti.
anya-e0803n:327_8: Yattha satipi tumhasaddassa sādhakavācakatte apaccattavacanattā ākhyātapadena tulyādhikaraṇatā na labbhati,
anya-e0803n:327_10: Itare pana dve honti kammavācakaṃ paccattavacanabhūtaṃ tulyādhikaraṇapadaṃ paṭicca.
anya-e0803n:328_0: Uttamapuriso ākhyātapadena tulyādhikaraṇe sādhakavācake vā kammavācake vā paccattavacanabhūte amhasadde payujjamānepi,
anya-e0803n:328_1: taṭṭhāniyatte sati appayujjamānepi sabbadhātūhi paro hoti.
anya-e0803n:328_10: Yattha satipi amhasaddassa sādhakavācakatte apaccattavacanattā ākhyātapadena tulyādhikaraṇatā na labbhati,
anya-e0803n:328_12: Itare pana dve honti kammavācakaṃ paccattavacanabhūtaṃ tulyādhikaraṇapadaṃ paṭicca.
anya-e0803n:328_16: Evaṃ yattha yattha sādhakavācakānaṃ vā kammavācakānaṃ vā nāmādīnaṃ paccattavacanabhūtānaṃ ākhyātapadehi
anya-e0803n:328_17: tulyādhikaraṇatte laddhe tattha tattha paṭhamapurisādayo labbhanti,
anya-e0803n:328_18: tasmā nāmādīnaṃ paccattavacanabhūtānaṃ tulyādhikaraṇabhāvoyeva paṭhamapurisādīnamuppattiyā kāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0803n:329_0: Dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vā purisānamekābhidhāne paro puriso gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n:329_1: Ettha ekābhidhānaṃ nāma ekato abhidhānaṃ ekakālābhidhānañca.
anya-e0803n:329_9: tumhe atthakusalā bhavathā”ti evaṃ dvinnamekābhidhāne paro puriso gahetabbo.

anya-e0803n:329_18: mayamatthakusalā bhavāmā”ti vā “so ca atthakusalo bhavati,
anya-e0803n:329_23: mayamatthakusalā bhavāmā”ti vā evaṃ tiṇṇamekābhidhāne paro puriso gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n:330_3: tumhe atthakusalā bhavathā”ti vā “ahañca atthakusalo bhavāmi,

anya-e0803n:336_0: Pacchā vutto paro nāma, saññāya paṭipāṭiyā;
anya-e0803n:338_0: Paṭhamamhā paro nāma, majjhimo uttamopi ca;
anya-e0803n:339_0: Majjhimamhā paro nāma, uttamo puriso ruto.
anya-e0803n:342_0: “Tvañca bhadde sukhī hohi, eso cāpi mahāmigo”;
anya-e0803n:343_0: Iti pāṭho yato diṭṭho, tasmā evaṃ vademase.
anya-e0803n:344_0: “Tumhe dve sukhitā hotha”, iccattho tattha dissati;
anya-e0803n:349_0: Tvañca jānapadā ceva, negamā ca samāgatā”.
anya-e0803n:352_0: Etā gāthāpi etassa, atthassa pana sādhikā;
anya-e0803n:354_0: Evaṃ viññūhi viññeyyaṃ, bahunā bhāsitena kiṃ.
anya-e0803n:356_0: Na virujjhati ce attho, taṃ pamāṇaṃ sudhīmataṃ.
anya-e0803n:362_0: Tyādīnaṃ purisasaññā, yasmā vuttā tato idaṃ;
anya-e0803n:365_0: Kriyālakkhaṇanti ettha kathaṃ ākhyātikassa kriyālakkhaṇatā veditabbā?
anya-e0803n:366_0: Lakkhiyati kriyāyetaṃ, kriyā vā assa lakkhaṇaṃ;
anya-e0803n:367_0: Kriyālakkhaṇatā evaṃ, veditabbā tathā hi ca.
anya-e0803n:389_0: Evaṃ kālesu vibhattippavattiṃ ñatvā ye te suttantesu vicittā suvisadavipulatikhiṇabuddhivisayabhūtā payogā dissanti,
anya-e0803n:389_1: tesu pāṭavamicchantehi tyādikkamena vuccamānā kriyāpadamālā sallakkhitabbā – bhavati, bhavanti. Bhavasi, bhavatha. Bhavāmi, bhavāma. Bhavate, bhavante. Bhavase, bhavavhe. Bhave, bhavāmhe.
anya-e0803n:390_0: Dissanti ca suttantesu atthasambhavepi aññayogādirahitāni kriyāpadāni.
anya-e0803n:390_5: Aññaṃ sepaṇṇi gacchāmi” iccevamādīni etassatthassa paridīpaniyā kriyāpadamālā.
anya-e0803n:391_0: Ettha tividho kriyāpadesu yogo tayogo, mayogo,
anya-e0803n:394_0: Sotūnaṃ payogesu kosallatthaṃ aññayogādisahitamaparampi kriyāpadamālaṃ vadāma –
anya-e0803n:395_9: pitaraṃ me idhāgataṃ” iccevamādīni etassatthassa paridīpaniyā kriyāpadamālā.
anya-e0803n:396_4: Yo ca amhasaddena vattabbe atthe nipatati,
anya-e0803n:396_6: na sopi saddo kriyāpadassa mayogasahitattaṃ sādheti,
anya-e0803n:397_4: Idha bhante bhagavā paṃsukūlaṃ dhovatū”ti iccevamādayo payogā.
anya-e0803n:397_8: saraṇo vandati satthuno”ti ca iccevamādayo payogā.
anya-e0803n:397_9: Idametthupalakkhitabbaṃ “tvaṃ tumhe ahaṃ maya”nti atthadīpaka tayoga mayogato añño aññatthadīpano payogoyeva aññayogo nāma,
anya-e0803n:398_8: syādyantānaṃ padānaṃ dassanato accantamajjhāharitabbehi samānādhikaraṇattā tagguṇabhūtattā ca majjhimuttamapurisasambhavo
anya-e0803n:398_10: Īdisesu payogesu syādyantānaṃ dassanavasena avijjamānānipi ajjhāharitabbāni “tvamaha”miccādīni padāni bhavanti.
anya-e0803n:399_0: Ākhyātikassa kriyālakkhaṇattā aliṅgabhedattā ca tiṇṇaṃ liṅgānaṃ sādhāraṇabhāvaparidīpanatthaṃ aparampi kriyāpadamālaṃ vadāma –
anya-e0803n:402_6: Catudhā uddiṭṭhakriyāpadesu yathā “bhavatī”ti akārānantaratyantapadaṃ gahetvā “bhavati bhavanti bhavasī”tiādinā kriyāpadamālā sabbathā katā,
anya-e0803n:402_7: evaṃ “ubbhavati”ccādīnipi akārānantaratyantapadāni gahetvā “ubbhavati ubbhavanti ubbhavasī”tiādinā kriyāpadamālā sabbathā kātabbā.
anya-e0803n:402_9: “bhāveti vibhāvetī”tiādīni ca ekārānantaratyantapadāni gahetvā pāḷinayānusāreneva padamālā kātabbā,
anya-e0803n:402_13: Na hi loke lokiyā sabbe dhātusadde paccekaṃ sabbehipi channavutiyā vacanehi yojetvā vadanti,
anya-e0803n:402_14: evaṃ avadantānampi nesaṃ kathā aparipuṇṇā nāma na hoti,
anya-e0803n:402_15: tasmā vajjetabbaṭṭhānaṃ vajjetvā yathāsambhavaṃ padamālā kātabbā.
anya-e0803n:403_0: Ito paṭṭhāya pana yathuddiṭṭhapadāneva pariṇāmetvā pariṇāmetvā pañcamiyādīnaṃ mātikābhāvena gahetabbāni.
anya-e0803n:403_1: Idāni pana tayogādisahitāsahitavasena dvidhā kriyāpadamālāyo dassessāma kvacādesavasena sambhūtāni ca
anya-e0803n:404_0: Bhavatu, bhavantu. Bhavāhi, bhava, bhavatha. Bhavāmi, bhavāma. Bhavataṃ,
anya-e0803n:409_0: Ettha panajjataniyā uṃvacanassa iṃsumādesavasena bhavatino rūpantarānipi veditabbāni.
anya-e0803n:412_4: evamajjataniyā uṃvacanassa iṃsumādesavasena bhavatino rūpantarāni bhavanti. Apica
anya-e0803n:422_0: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṃ
anya-e0803n:429_8: vattamānādīnaṃ vacanatthavibhāvanā cāti navadhā vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0803n:430_2: Tathā hete nāmikapadasaññitehi aparehi bhotisadda bhavesaddehi samānasutikāpi asamānatthā ceva honti asamānavibhattikā ca.
anya-e0803n:430_3: Sāsanasmiñhi keci saddā aññamaññaṃ samānasutikā samānāpi asamānatthā asamānapavattinimittā asamānaliṅgā
anya-e0803n:430_4: asamānavibhattikā asamānavacanakā asamānantā asamānakālikā asamānapadajātikā ca bhavanti.
anya-e0803n:432_2: Ettha ca akataññūsaddadvayaṃ katākatājānanajānanapavattinimittaṃ paṭicca sambhūtattā asamānapavattinimittakanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:433_5: Ettha sukhīsaddadvayaṃ sāsaddadvayañca pumitthiliṅgavasena asamānaliṅganti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:436_0: “Yāya mātu bhato poso, imaṃ lokaṃ avekkhati;
anya-e0803n:437_0: Tampi pāṇadadiṃ santiṃ, hanti kuddho puthujjano”ti
anya-e0803n:441_0: Vikkosamānā tibbāhi, hanti nesaṃ varaṃ vara”nti.
anya-e0803n:443_0: Asamānantatte pana yattha samānasutikānaṃ asamānavibhattikattaṃ vā asamānavacanattaṃ vā upalabbhati.
anya-e0803n:445_6: Ettha sayaṃsaddadvayaṃ nāmanipātavasena patisaddattayaṃ nāmākhyātopasaggavasena asamānapadajātikanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:446_1: Evaṃ sāsanasmiṃ keci saddā aññamaññaṃ samānasutikā samānāpi asamānatthā asamānapavattinimittā asamānaliṅgā
anya-e0803n:446_2: asamānavibhattikā asamānavacanakā asamānantā asamānakālikā asamānapadajātikā ca bhavanti.
anya-e0803n:446_7: Evaṃ santepi sutisāmaññato ekattena gahetvā atthuddhāro karaṇīyoti yathāvuttakriyāpadānaṃ nāmapadehi
anya-e0803n:447_3: tasmā so dvīsu atthesu vattati kriyāpadatthe nāmikapadatthe ca.
anya-e0803n:453_0: Ayaṃ pana sabbesaṃ tesamatthānaṃ sādhikā amhākaṃ gāthāracanā –
anya-e0803n:454_0: “Sukhī bhavati eso ca, ahañcāpi sukhī bhave;
anya-e0803n:455_0: Sukhī bhavatu eso ca, ahañcāpi sukhī bhave.
anya-e0803n:458_0: Sukhī bhaveyya eso ca, ahañcāpi sukhī bhave;
anya-e0803n:459_0: Sukhī bhaveyya ce eso, ahañcāpi sukhī bhave”ti.
anya-e0803n:468_0: Ettha pāḷippadesaṃ tu, āharissaṃ suṇātha me.
anya-e0803n:470_0: Kaṃ tvaṃ atthavasaṃ ñatvā, evaṃ vāyamase bhusaṃ.
anya-e0803n:471_0: Nisamma vattaṃ lokassa, vāyāmassa ca devate;
anya-e0803n:483_0: Evamayaṃ bhavesaddo pañcasu chasu vā kriyāpadatthesu pavattati.
anya-e0803n:483_8: Iminā nayena bhūdhātuto nipphannānaṃ aññatopi aññesaṃ kriyāpadānaṃ yathāsambhavamattho uddharitabbo.
anya-e0803n:487_3: parābhave”iccādayo gacchati gacchaṃ gacchatosaddādayo viya visesasaddā,
anya-e0803n:487_5: na ca rājadevatādivācako devasaddo viya sāmaññasaddā.
anya-e0803n:488_7: Satipi visesasaddatte sadisattā sutisāmaññato tabbisayaṃ buddhiṃ nuppādeti vināva’tthappakaraṇasaddantarābhisambandhena.
anya-e0803n:488_8: Tathā hi saddantarābhisambandhena “gacchati patiṭṭhita”nti vutte sattamyantaṃ nāmapadanti viññāyati.
anya-e0803n:488_10: Tathā “sa gacchaṃ na nivattatī”ti vutte paṭhamantaṃ nāmapadanti viññāyati.
anya-e0803n:488_14: Iti visesasaddānaṃ ākhyātanāmānaṃ nāmākhyātehi samānasutikānaṃ atthābhisambandhādīsu yo koci atthavisesañāpako sambandho avassamicchitabbo.
anya-e0803n:488_15: Evaṃ “gacchatī”tiādīnaṃ ākhyātanāmattādivasena paccekaṃ ṭhitānaṃ ekekatthavācakānaṃ visesasaddatā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0803n:489_0: “Nāthati devo”tiādīnaṃ pana ākhyātanāmānaṃ nāmākhyātehi asamānasutikānaṃ anekatthavācakānaṃ sāmaññasaddatā eva daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0803n:489_1: Atthasambandhādīsu hi vinā yena kenaci sambandhena “nāthatī”ti vutte “yācatī”ti vā “upatāpetī”ti vā “issariyaṃ
anya-e0803n:489_3: tathā “devo”ti vutte “megho”ti vā “ākāso”ti vā “rājā”ti vā “devatā”ti vā “visuddhidevo”ti vā attho paṭibhāti.
anya-e0803n:489_4: Yadā pana saddantarābhisambandhena “nāthati suppaṭipatti”nti vutte tadā “nāthatī”ti kriyāpadassa “yācatī”ti attho viññāyati,
anya-e0803n:489_8: Tathā “devo gajjatī”ti vutte “devo”ti nāmapadassa “megho”ti attho viññāyati.
anya-e0803n:489_11: “Devo devakāyā cavati āyusaṅkhayā”ti vutte “devatā”ti attho viññāyati.
anya-e0803n:490_4: “atthakusalā bhavante”ti vā “kiccāni bhavante”ti vā vutte “bhavante”ti idaṃ “bhavantī”timinā samānatthamākhyātapadanti

anya-e0803n:847_0: Tadevaṃ nāmikaṃ ñe yyaṃ, saliṅgaṃ savibhattikaṃ.
anya-e0803n:850_0: Paṭhamā dutiyā tatiyā, catutthī pañcamī tathā;

anya-e0803n:853_0: Kammatthe dutiyā sāpi, bhinnā aṃ yo iti dvidhā.

anya-e0803n:895_1: Ettha sattabhūtarūpavācako bhūtasaddoyeva niyogā napuṃsakaliṅgotipi daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:895_2: Etthāpi aniyataliṅgā bhūta parābhūta sambhūtasaddādayo napuṃsakaliṅgavasena yujjante.

anya-e0803n:897_0: Ettha me appasiddhāti, ye ye saddā pakāsitā;
anya-e0803n:899_0: O, ā, bindu, i, ī, u, ū-antime sattadhā ṭhitā;

anya-e0803n:905_0: Antā satteva pulliṅge, itthiyaṃ pañca vā cha vā;
anya-e0803n:906_0: Napuṃsake tayo evaṃ, dasa pañcahi chabbidhā.

anya-e0803n:907_9: Atha vā bhūtoti evaṃnāmako amanussajātiyo sattaviseso,

anya-e0803n:909_0: Jantu jīvo jagu yakkho, pāṇī dehī tathāgato.
anya-e0803n:910_0: Sattavo mātiyo loko, manujo mānavo naro;
anya-e0803n:912_0: Pajāti itthiyaṃ vutto, liṅgato, na ca atthato;
anya-e0803n:914_0: Yo so jaṅghāya ulati, so satto jaṅghalo idha;
