anya-e0803n:916_11: Ito paraṃ nayānusārena suviññeyyattā “idaṃ nibbacana”nti ca ādīni avatvā katthaci atthasādhakavacanaṃ
anya-e0803n:916_13: Tesu hi sabbattha dassitesu ganthavitthāro siyā,
anya-e0803n:917_2: Bhūsaddassa atthātisayayogato vaḍḍhanepi dissamānattā bhavanaṃ vaḍḍhananti katvā.
anya-e0803n:917_3: “Bhavo ca rañño abhavo ca rañño”ti idaṃ vuddhiatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:917_5: “Sassato attā ca loko cā”ti hi sassatavasena pavattā diṭṭhi sassatadiṭṭhi,
anya-e0803n:917_8: bhavati sassataṃ tiṭṭhatīti pavattanato sassatadiṭṭhi bhavadiṭṭhi nāma.
anya-e0803n:917_12: ekacce samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā bhavadiṭṭhiyā vā kāmabhavādinā vā sabbabhavato vimuttiṃ saṃsāravisuddhiṃ kathayiṃsūti.
anya-e0803n:917_13: Atha vā bhavanti vaḍḍhanti sattā etenāti bhavoti atthena sampattipuññāni bhavoti ca vuccanti.
anya-e0803n:918_3: so sarūpaṃ labhatī”ti katvā “bhavati avijjātaṇhādisamudayā nirantaraṃ samudetī”ti atthena vā “bhavā”ti vuccanti.
anya-e0803n:918_4: Okāso pana “bhavanti jāyanti ettha sattā nāmarūpadhammā cā”ti atthena “bhavo”ti.
anya-e0803n:918_12: kammaṃ pana yathā sukhakāraṇattā “sukho buddhānamuppādo”ti vutto.
anya-e0803n:918_19: Atha vā “bhavapaccayā jātī”ti vacanato bhavati etenāti bhavoti kammabhavo vuccati.
anya-e0803n:921_4: Bhavati ettha sattasammuti khandhādipaṭipāṭisaṅkhāte dhammapuñjasminti atthena.
anya-e0803n:932_5: Hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetī”ti evamādi etassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:932_10: bhāve ca te kusalaṃ natthi kiñcī”ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:932_15: Tattha ajjhāsayo ca vatthudhammo ca cittañca satto cāti ime bhavatīti bhāvo.
anya-e0803n:932_20: yaṃ itthibhāvo pumbhāvo itthindriyanti ca vuccati.
anya-e0803n:932_22: “itthī”ti vā “puriso”ti vā bhavati etena cittaṃ abhidhānañcāti bhāvo.
anya-e0803n:935_1: itthīti vā bhavati etena cittaṃ abhidhānañcāti itthibhāvo”ti,
anya-e0803n:935_2: tasmā pumbhāvoti etthāpi pumassa bhāvo pumbhāvo,
anya-e0803n:935_3: pumāti vā bhavati etena cittaṃ abhidhānañcāti pumbhāvoti nibbacanaṃ samadhigantabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:936_0: Abhāvoti na bhāvoti abhāvo, ko so?
anya-e0803n:936_4: Atha vā sabhāvoti dhammānaṃ sati atthasambhave yo koci sarūpaṃ labhati,
anya-e0803n:936_5: tassa bhāvo lakkhaṇamiti saññito namanaruppanakakkhaḷaphusanādiākāro iccevattho.
anya-e0803n:936_7: dhammānaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ mata”nti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:937_2: Yutti hi sambhavoti vuccati “sambhavo gahaṇassa kāraṇa”ntiādīsu.
anya-e0803n:937_11: Ime pana sambhavapabhavasaddā katthaci samānatthā katthaci bhinnatthāti veditabbā. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0803n:937_12: Sambhavasaddo hi bhavanakriyampi vadati yuttimpi paññattimpi sambhavarūpampi paccayatthampi,
anya-e0803n:937_13: pabhavasaddo pana bhavanakriyampi vadati nadippabhavampi paccayatthampi,
anya-e0803n:937_16: Vuttañhetaṃ “paccayo hetu nidānaṃ kāraṇaṃ sambhavo pabhavotiādi atthato ekaṃ,
anya-e0803n:941_2: taṃ pana uttari āvibhavissati “dhanamassa bhavatūti dhanabhūtī”tiādinā.
anya-e0803n:941_3: Iccevaṃ kitakavasena sabbathāpi sattavidhāni sādhanāni honti,
anya-e0803n:941_6: Idha payogesvatthesu ca viññūnaṃ pāṭavatthaṃ sādhananāmaṃ pakāsitaṃ.
anya-e0803n:941_7: Tathā hi dunnikkhittasādhanehi padehi yojitā saddappayogā dubbodhatthā honti,
anya-e0803n:941_8: sunikkhittasādhanehi pana padehi yojitā subodhatthā honti,
anya-e0803n:941_11: Payogānurūpañhi aviparītaṃ katvā atthaṃ kathanasīlā “yācitova bahulaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjati,
anya-e0803n:941_12: appaṃ ayācito”ti evamādīsu sādhanavasena gahetabbesu atthesu,
anya-e0803n:941_13: aññesu catthesu paṭutarabuddhino paṇḍitāyeva ekantena bhagavato pariyattisāsanadharā nāma hontīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:941_14: Ito paraṃ nayānusārena suviññeyyattā “idaṃ nāma sādhana”nti na vakkhāma,
anya-e0803n:941_15: kevalamidha dassitesu payogesu viññūnaṃ bahumānuppādanatthañceva vividhavicittapāḷigatike vividhatthasāre
anya-e0803n:941_16: jinavaravacane sotūnaṃ buddhivijambhanatthañca atthasādhakavacanāniyeva yathārahaṃ suttageyyaveyyākaraṇagāthādīsu
anya-e0803n:942_3: yena tvaṃ mithilaṃ vaje”ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:942_7: “Tejasaṅkhato ussāhamantapabhūsattisaṅkhāto vā mahanto ānubhāvo etassāti mahānubhāvo”ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:944_0: Ānubhāvāti vuccanti, pabhāvāti ca te vade.
anya-e0803n:947_1: “Anubhavitabbassa phalassa mahantatāya mahānubhāvo”ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:947_5: Apica “dhammadessī parābhavo”ti pāṭhānurūpato parābhavissatīti parābhavoti anāgatakālavasenapi nibbacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:947_6: Atha vā parābhavanti etenāti parābhavo. Kiṃ taṃ?
anya-e0803n:947_10: Tañhi bhavato vigatattā bhavato vigatoti vibhavo,
anya-e0803n:947_11: bhavassa ca taṃhetu vigatattā vigato bhavo etasmāti vibhavo.
anya-e0803n:947_12: Vibhavanti ucchijjanti vinassanti ito ariyadhanavilomakā kilesamahācorātipi vibhavo.
anya-e0803n:948_0: Nibbānaṃ vibhavo mokkho, nirodho amataṃ samaṃ;
anya-e0803n:957_0: Santi asaṅkhatā dhātu, disā ca sabbatopabhaṃ.
anya-e0803n:970_1: Tattha vināso vibhavanaṃ ucchijjanaṃ nassananti atthena vibhavo.
anya-e0803n:970_3: ittheke sato sattassa ucchedaṃ vināsaṃ vibhavaṃ paññapentī”ti ca idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:970_6: Dhanaṃ pana bhavanti vaḍḍhanti vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjanti sattā etenāti vibhavo.
anya-e0803n:970_7: “Asītikoṭivibhavassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbattī”ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:971_0: Dhanaṃ saṃ vibhavo dabbaṃ, sāpateyyaṃ pariggaho;
anya-e0803n:972_0: Oḍḍaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ sakaṃ attho, iccete dhanavācakā.
anya-e0803n:973_0: Ucchedadiṭṭhi pana vibhavati ucchijjati “attā ca loko ca puna cutito uddhaṃ na jāyatī”ti gahaṇato vibhavoti.
anya-e0803n:976_10: Natthibhāvoti natthitā avijjamānatā vivittatā rittatā tucchatā suññatā.
anya-e0803n:977_4: sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā anubhavanto yo koci.
anya-e0803n:977_8: Anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā”tiādīsu “dātā”ti padānaṃ kattuvācakānaṃ “amatassā”tiādīhi padehi kammavācakehi chaṭṭhiyantehi saddhiṃ yojanā dissati,
anya-e0803n:977_9: tathā imesampi padānaṃ “paccāmittassa abhibhavitā”tiādinā yojanā kātabbā.
anya-e0803n:978_13: Ettha pana dhātuatthe ādaro na kātabbo,
anya-e0803n:980_0: Sohaṃ appabhavaṃ tattha, sākhaṃ hatthehi aggahi”nti
anya-e0803n:983_5: Tatra vibhāvīti atthavibhāvane samattho paṇḍito vuccati.
anya-e0803n:984_0: Vidvā vijjāgato ñāṇī, vibhāvī paṇḍito sudhī;
anya-e0803n:985_0: Budho visārado viññū, dosaññū viddasu vidū.
anya-e0803n:986_0: Vipassī paṭibhāṇī ca, medhāvī nipako kavi;
anya-e0803n:987_0: Kusalo viduro dhīmā, gatimā mutimā cayaṃ.
anya-e0803n:988_0: Cakkhumā kaṇṇavā dabbo, dhīro bhūri vicakkhaṇo;
anya-e0803n:991_0: Sayambhūti sayameva bhavatīti sayambhū. Ko so?
anya-e0803n:991_1: Antarena paropadesaṃ sāmaṃyeva sabbaṃ ñeyyadhammaṃ paṭivijjhitvā sabbaññutaṃ patto sakyamuni bhagavā.
anya-e0803n:992_0: “Na me ācariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjati;
anya-e0803n:994_0: Ahañhi arahā loke, ahaṃ satthā anuttaro;
anya-e0803n:996_0: Atthato pana pāramitāparibhāvito sayambhūñāṇena saha vāsanāya vigataviddhastaniravasesakileso mahākaruṇāsabbaññutaññāṇādiaparimeyyaguṇagaṇādhāro
anya-e0803n:996_2: So evaṃbhūto khandhasantāno loke aggapuggaloti vuccati.
anya-e0803n:996_3: Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “ekapuggalo bhikkhave loke uppajjamāno uppajjati acchariyamanusso,
anya-e0803n:996_9: sakyaputto sakko sakyamuni sakyasīho sakyapuṅgavoti kulato ca pasiddho,
anya-e0803n:997_0: Yo ekapuggalo āsi, buddho so vadataṃ varo;
anya-e0803n:1000_0: Sakko iti ca avhito, tathā sakyamunīti ca.
anya-e0803n:1025_0: Sammāsambuddho iti so, ñāto sattuttamoti ca;
anya-e0803n:1032_0: Nāmaṃ guṇehi nissitaṃ, ko kavindo kathessati.
anya-e0803n:1043_0: Tathā hi satthavāho naravaro chaḷabhiññoti evaṃpakārāni abhidhānapadāni visesakapadāpekkhakāni. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0803n:1050_1: Buddho jino bhagavāti evaṃpakārāni pana no visesakāpekkhānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1051_0: Keci panettha evaṃ vadeyyuṃ “munindo samaṇindo samaṇissaro yatissaro ādiccabandhu ravibandhūti evaṃpakārānaṃ
anya-e0803n:1051_1: idha vuttānamabhidhānānaṃ visesatthābhāvato punaruttidoso atthī”ti. Tanna,
anya-e0803n:1051_2: abhidhānānaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇīyānabhisaṅkharaṇīyavasena abhisaṅkhatābhidhānāni anabhisaṅkhatābhidhānānīti dvedhā dissanato.
anya-e0803n:1051_3: Tathā hi katthaci keci “sakyasīho”ti abhidhānaṃ paṭicca “sakyakesarī sakyamigādhipo”tiādinā nānāvividhamabhidhānamabhisaṅkharonti,
anya-e0803n:1051_11: taṃ jalajaṃ nāmāti mantvā paṭisambhidāppattehi ariyehi desanāvilāsavasena vutto “padumuttaranāmino”ti
anya-e0803n:1052_1: Vuttañhetaṃ dhammasenāpatinā āyasmatā sāriputtena “buddhoti netaṃ nāmaṃ mātarā kataṃ,
anya-e0803n:1052_6: vimokkhantikametaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇappaṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṃ buddho”ti,
anya-e0803n:1052_10: Na hi tāni abhidhānāni ceva “satthā sugato jino”tiādīni ca aññaṃ kiñci abhidhānaṃ paṭicca abhisaṅkhatāni,
anya-e0803n:1052_11: nāpi aññāni abhidhānāni etāni paṭicca abhisaṅkhatāni dissanti.
anya-e0803n:1052_12: Tathā hi “buddho”ti abhidhānaṃ paṭicca “bujjhitā bodhetā bodhako”tiādīni nāmābhidhānāni na abhisaṅkharonti.
anya-e0803n:1052_13: Tathā “bhagavā satthā sugato”tiādīni nāmābhidhānāni paṭicca “sampannabhago anusāsako sundaravacano”tiādīni nāmābhidhānāni nābhisaṅkharonti.
anya-e0803n:1052_14: Evaṃ imaṃ vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “munindo samaṇindo samaṇissaro yatissaro ādiccabandhu ravibandhū”tiādinā nayena punarutti amhehi katāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0803n:1054_0: Dviduggamavaro buddho, iti nāmaṃ dvidhā bhave”ti.
anya-e0803n:1055_0: Pabhūti paraṃ pasayha bhavatīti pabhū, issaro.
anya-e0803n:1055_1: “Araññassa pabhū ayaṃ luddako”ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1055_6: Iti cattāro khandhe arūpino abhibhavīti abhibhū.
anya-e0803n:1055_7: So ca kho niccetanattā abhibhavanakriyāyāsati pubbevā’saññuppattito jhānalābhikāle attanā adhigatapañcamajjhānaṃ
anya-e0803n:1055_8: saññāvirāgavasena bhāvetvā cattāro arūpakkhandhe asaññibhave appavattikaraṇena abhibhavitumārabhi,
anya-e0803n:1055_9: tadabhibhavanakiccaṃ idāni siddhanti abhibhavīti abhibhūti vuccati.
anya-e0803n:1055_10: Apica niccetanabhāvena abhibhavanabyāpāre asatipi pubbe sacetanakāle sabyāpārattā sacetanassa viya niccetanassāpi
anya-e0803n:1055_12: Dissati hi loke sāsane ca sacetanassa viya acetanassapi upacārena sabyāpāratāvacanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1058_1: phalesino chadanaṃ vippahāyā”ti ca “phalaṃ toseti kassaka”nti ca ādi.
anya-e0803n:1058_2: Abhibhūsaddassa asaññasattābhidhānatte “abhibhuṃ abhibhuto maññatī”ti idamettha sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1058_6: Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “tathāgato bhikkhave abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso vasavattī”ti.
anya-e0803n:1058_7: Keci pana “abhibhū nāma sahasso brahmā”ti vadanti.
anya-e0803n:1059_2: tiṇṇo lokantagū vibhū”ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1059_3: Vibhūti hettha rūpakāyadhammakāyasampattiyā visesabhūtoti attho. Āha ca –
anya-e0803n:1064_0: Dhārento brāhmaṇaṃ vaṇṇaṃ, bhikkhāya maṃ upāgamī”ti –
anya-e0803n:1065_3: Gotrabhūti gottasaṅkhātaṃ amatamahānibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā bhūtoti gotrabhū,
anya-e0803n:1065_6: Yesaṃ dhammānaṃ samanantarā ariyadhammassa avakkanti hoti,
anya-e0803n:1065_12: “bhavissanti kho panānanda anāgatamaddhānaṃ gotrabhuno kāsāvakaṇṭhā dussīlā pāpadhammā”ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1065_14: So hi mātāpitibharaṇādīhi sattahi vattehi sakkattaṃ labhitvā aññe deve vattena abhibhavatīti vatrabhū.
anya-e0803n:1065_15: Āgamaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana bhūdhātumhi labbhamānaṃ pattiatthampi gahetvā “vattena aññe abhibhavitvā devissariyaṃ pattoti vatrabhū”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1065_18: Ettha hi vatrabhūti vatranāmakassa asurassa abhibhavitā.
anya-e0803n:1065_25: Sabbābhibhūti ca idaṃ nāmaṃ tathāgatasseva yujjati.
anya-e0803n:1071_0: Idāni aniyataliṅgānaṃ niyataliṅgesu pakkhittānaṃ bhūtaparābhūta sambhūtasaddādīnaṃ niddeso vuccati.
anya-e0803n:1071_1: Tatra bhūtoti attano paccayehi abhavīti bhūto,
anya-e0803n:1071_2: bhūtoti jāto sañjāto nibbatto abhinibbatto pātubhūto,
anya-e0803n:1071_3: bhūtoti vā laddhasarūpo yo koci saviññāṇako vā aviññāṇako vā.
anya-e0803n:1071_5: bhūtoti sacco tatho avitatho aviparīto yo koci,
anya-e0803n:1071_15: “rūpe vibhūte na phusanti phassā”ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1071_22: Yena kenaci yo pīḷito hīḷito vā,
anya-e0803n:1071_32: tathā “idha bhikkhave bhikkhu na heva anaddhabhūtaṃ attānaṃ na addhabhāvetī”ti padampi.
anya-e0803n:1072_3: Ettha bhāvitoti iminā samānādhikaraṇaṃ “satisambojjhaṅgo kho kassapa mayā sammadakkhāto bhāvito”tiādīsu guṇīvācakaṃ padhānapadaṃ sāsane daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1072_7: te na āsīsati na sevatīti suttapadattho.
anya-e0803n:1072_17: devadattena attano abuddhabhāvena ceva khantimettādīnañca abhāvena kumārakassapatthero ca therī ca manaṃ nāsito,
anya-e0803n:1072_18: manaṃ vuḷho ahosī”tiādīsu cassa payogo veditabbo.
anya-e0803n:1074_0: Santaṃ tassa manaṃ hoti, manamhi upakūlitoti.
anya-e0803n:1075_2: Tabbapaccayaṭṭhāne hi sakkuṇeyyapadayojanā dissati “aladdhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ laddhabbaṃ labhanīyaṃ laddhuṃ vā sakkuṇeyya”nti.
anya-e0803n:1075_5: Tathā hi tabbapaccayaṭṭhāne arahatipadayojanā dissati “parisakkuṇeyyaṃ lābhamarahatīti laddhabba”nti.
anya-e0803n:1075_6: Ettha pana paribhottabboti padassa atthibhāve “khattiyo kho mahārāja daharoti na uññātabbo na paribhottabbo”ti pāḷi nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1076_0: “Kiṃ so bhamāno saccako”, iccatra pāḷiyaṃ pana;
anya-e0803n:1078_0: Atrāyaṃ pāḷi “kiṃ so bhamāno saccako nigaṇṭhaputto,
anya-e0803n:1078_6: sa rājavasatiṃ vase”ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1078_11: addasa accutaṃ isi”ntiādīni viya paripuṇṇuttarakriyāpadāni katvā rājā bhavamāno sampattimanubhavatītiādinā yojetabbāni.
anya-e0803n:1078_12: “Saramāno gacchanto”tiādīni hi “yāto gato patto”tiādīhi sadisāni na honti,
anya-e0803n:1079_3: tasmā “rājapurisehi nīyamāno coro evaṃ cintesī”tiādīni viya paripuṇṇuttarakriyāpadāni katvā aññehi paribhaviyamāno tāṇaṃ gavesati.
anya-e0803n:1079_6: Ayaṃ aniyataliṅgānaṃ niyataliṅgesu pakkhittānaṃ bhūta parābhūta sambhūtasaddānaṃ niddeso.
anya-e0803n:1079_7: Iccevaṃ pulliṅgānaṃ bhūdhātumayānaṃ yathārahaṃ nibbacanādivasena niddeso vibhāvito.
anya-e0803n:1080_4: Bhāvanāti vaḍḍhanā brūhanā phātikaraṇaṃ āsevanā bahulīkāro.
anya-e0803n:1081_1: atha vā bhavanti jāyanti vaḍḍhanti cettha thāvarā ca jaṅgamā cāti bhūmi.
anya-e0803n:1081_3: “Paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā”tiādīsu pana lokuttaramaggo bhūmīti vuccati.
anya-e0803n:1082_0: “Pathavī medanī bhūmi, bhūrī bhū puthuvī mahī;
anya-e0803n:1083_0: Chamā vasumatī ubbī, avanī ku vasundharā;
anya-e0803n:1084_0: Jagatī khiti vasudhā, dharaṇī go dharā”iti.
anya-e0803n:1085_0: Atra bhū ku gosaddā pathavīpadatthe vattantīti kutra diṭṭhapubbāti ce?
anya-e0803n:1087_0: Bhū ku goiti pathavī, vuccatīti vibhāvaye.
anya-e0803n:1088_3: atha vā visesato bhavanti sattā etāyāti vibhūti,
anya-e0803n:1088_6: Pihanīyā vibhūtiyo”ti ca idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1089_1: Sā hi bhavanti etthāti bhūrīti vuccati,
anya-e0803n:1089_2: bhavati vā paññāyati vaḍḍhati cāti bhūrī,
anya-e0803n:1089_3: atha vā bhūtābhūtā tannissitā sattā ramanti etthāti bhūrī.
anya-e0803n:1089_5: tasmā sā imināpi atthena bhūrīti vuccati.
anya-e0803n:1089_10: ayogā bhūrisaṅkhayo”ti ettha aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ imassatthassa sādhakaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1089_11: Atha vā bhūte atthe ramatīti bhūrī,
anya-e0803n:1089_13: “bhūrī medhā pariṇāyikā”ti ettha aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ imassatthassa sādhakaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1089_14: Atha vā paññāyeva rāgādayo dhamme abhibhavatīti bhūrī,
anya-e0803n:1089_16: Tathā hi paṭisambhidāmagge āyasmatā sāriputtena vuttaṃ “rāgaṃ abhibhūyatīti bhūrī, paññā.
anya-e0803n:1089_18: taṃ ariṃ maddatīti bhūrī, paññā. Doso. Moho…pe…
anya-e0803n:1089_21: Ettha pana “gotrabhū”ti padamiva “aribhū”ti vattabbepi bhūsaddaṃ pubbanipātaṃ katvā sandhivasena bhūrīti padamuccāritanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1089_22: Apica īdisesu nāmikapadesu vināpi upasaggena abhibhavanādiatthā labbhantiyeva,
anya-e0803n:1097_0: Ñāṇaṃ paññāṇamummaṅgo, sattho soto ca diṭṭhi ca;
anya-e0803n:1098_0: Mantā bodho buddhi buddhaṃ, paṭibhānañca bodhiti.
anya-e0803n:1099_0: Dhammo vijjā gati monaṃ, nepakkaṃ go matī muti;
anya-e0803n:1100_0: Vīmaṃsā yoni dhonā ca, paṇḍā paṇḍiccayampi ca;
anya-e0803n:1114_3: Bhotīti yāya saddhiṃ kathentena sā itthī “bhotī” iti vattabbā,
anya-e0803n:1114_4: tasmā iminā padena itthī vohariyatīti ca daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1114_5: Yathā hi purisena saddhiṃ kathentena puriso “bhavaṃ” iti vohariyati,
anya-e0803n:1114_6: evameva itthiyā saddhiṃ kathentena itthī “bhotī”iti vohariyati.
anya-e0803n:1114_10: mā bhotī kupitā ahū”ti cettha nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1114_11: Atha vā idhekacco satto itthiliṅgavasena laddhanāmo,
anya-e0803n:1114_13: tasmā iminā padena itthīpi itthiliṅgena laddhanāmā anitthīpi vohariyatīti ca daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0803n:1114_14: Tathā hi devaputtopi “devatā”ti itthiliṅgavasena voharitabbattā devatāsaddamapekkhitvā “bhotī”iti voharito,
anya-e0803n:1114_17: taṃ me akkhāhi pucchitā”ti ettha pana devatāsaddamapekkhitvā “bhotī”iti itthi liṅgavohāro kato.
anya-e0803n:1114_18: Atrāyaṃ suttapadattho “yadi so kuhako dhanatthiko tāpaso na jānāti,
anya-e0803n:1114_19: bhotī devatā pana jānāti ki”nti. Apica –
anya-e0803n:1116_0: Karomi te taṃ vacanaṃ, tvaṃsi ācariyo mamā”ti –
anya-e0803n:1118_0: “Na tvaṃ bāle vijānāsi, yathā arahataṃ vaco”ti;
anya-e0803n:1120_1: kusarājaṃ mahabbala”nti ettha ca itthīyeva itthiliṅgavasena voharitā,
anya-e0803n:1120_2: tasmā katthaci itthipurisapadatthasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ anapekkhitvā liṅgamattamevāpekkhitvā bhotī devatā,
anya-e0803n:1120_6: Katthaci pana liṅgañca atthañca apekkhitvā “bhotī itthī,
anya-e0803n:1121_1: Atha vā bhavanti jāyanti vaḍḍhanti cettha sattasaṅkhārāti bhū.
anya-e0803n:1121_9: pāpakaṃ vata bhāsasī”ti idametesamatthānaṃ sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1122_0: Aniyataliṅgānaṃ pana niyatitthiliṅgesu pakkhittānaṃ bhūtaparābhūtasambhūtasaddādīnaṃ niddeso nayānusārena suviññeyyova.
anya-e0803n:1122_1: Iccevaṃ itthiliṅgānaṃ bhūdhātumayānaṃ yathārahaṃ nibbacanādivasena niddeso vibhāvito.
anya-e0803n:1123_3: bhavati vā tasmiṃ tadadhīnavuttitāya upādārūpanti bhūtaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1123_4: Atha vā bhūtanti satto bhūtanāmako vā.
anya-e0803n:1123_5: Bhūtanti hi napuṃsakavasena sakalo satto evaṃnāmako ca yakkhādiko vuccati.
anya-e0803n:1123_10: tamhā ṭhānā apakkamī”ti evamādīsu napuṃsakappayogo veditabbo.
anya-e0803n:1123_14: na bahi ṭhānaṃ upalabbhatī”ti cuṇṇiyapadaracanāyampi bhūtasaddassa napuṃsakaliṅgattadassanatoti avagantabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1123_16: Tassa mahantapātubhāvādīhi kāraṇehi mahābhūtatā veditabbā. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0803n:1127_0: Yojetabbā tiliṅge te, iti ñe yyaṃ visesato.
anya-e0803n:1129_0: Idāni bhūto, cittāni, bhūtāni vimalāni tu.
anya-e0803n:1132_1: Tañhi bhavanti vaḍḍhanti etthāti bhavittanti vuccati,
anya-e0803n:1132_3: iti paṅke avassayi”nti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1135_3: “bhūnahaccaṃ kataṃ mayā”ti ca idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1136_1: Atha vā bhavanti vaḍḍhanti ettha sattā puttadhītāhi nānāsampattīhi cāti bhavanaṃ vuccati geho,
anya-e0803n:1137_0: Atthavibhāvīti atthassa vibhāvanasīlaṃ cittaṃ vā ñāṇaṃ vā kulaṃ vā atthavibhāvi.
anya-e0803n:1138_3: Apica gotrabhūti nibbānārammaṇaṃ maggavīthiyaṃ pavattaṃ gotrabhuñāṇaṃ vā saṅkhārārammaṇaṃ vā phalasamāpattivīthiyaṃ pavattaṃ gotrabhuñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1138_6: gottābhidhānā ca nibbānato ārammaṇakaraṇavasena bhavatīti “gotrabhū”ti vuccati,
anya-e0803n:1138_7: dutiyaṃ pana saṅkhārārammaṇampi samānaṃ āsevanapaccayabhāvena sasampayuttāni phalacittāni gottābhidhāne nibbānamhi bhāvetīti “gotrabhū”ti vuccati.
anya-e0803n:1143_0: Dīghabhāvena vuttaṃ tu, napuṃsakanti no vade;
anya-e0803n:1144_0: Binduvantī’tare bhedā, tayo iti hi bhāsitā.
anya-e0803n:1145_0: Īkārantā ca ūdantā, rassattaṃ yanti sāsane;
anya-e0803n:1147_1: cittena saha na bhavatīti nacittasahabhu, rūpaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1148_0: Aniyataliṅgānaṃ niyatanapuṃsakaliṅgesu pakkhittānaṃ bhūtaparābhūtasaddādīnaṃ niddeso nayānusārena suviññeyyova.
anya-e0803n:1148_1: Iccevaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgānaṃ bhūdhātumayānaṃ yathārahaṃ nibbacanādivasena niddeso vibhāvito.
anya-e0803n:1153_0: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṃ
anya-e0803n:1160_0: Vippakiṇṇakathā ettha, evaṃ vutte na hessati;
anya-e0803n:1164_0: Puriso, purisā. Purisaṃ, purise. Purisena, purisehi,
anya-e0803n:1165_0: Ayamāyasmatā mahākaccānena pabhinnapaṭisambhidena katasmā niruttipiṭakato uddharito purisaiccetassa pakatirūpassa nāmikapadamālānayo.
anya-e0803n:1165_5: Tatra purisoti purisavacane ekavacane paccattavacanaṃ bhavati,
anya-e0803n:1166_2: Tatra purisanti purisavacane ekavacane upayogavacanaṃ bhavati,
anya-e0803n:1167_3: Tatra purisenāti purisavacane ekavacane karaṇavacanaṃ bhavati, purisehi,
anya-e0803n:1168_2: Tatra purisassāti purisavacane ekavacane sampadānavacanaṃ bhavati,
anya-e0803n:1169_5: Tatra purisāti purisavacane ekavacane nissakkavacanaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0803n:1169_7: purisamhāti purisavacane ekavacane nissakkavacanaṃ bhavati, purisehi,
anya-e0803n:1170_2: Tatra purisassāti purisavacane ekavacane sāmivacanaṃ bhavati,
anya-e0803n:1171_4: Tatra puriseti purisavacane ekavacane bhummavacanaṃ bhavati,
anya-e0803n:1172_2: Tatra bho purisaiti purisavacane ekavacane ālapanaṃ bhavati,
anya-e0803n:1172_3: bhavanto purisāiti purisavacane puthuvacane ālapanaṃ bhavatīti iminā nayena sabbattha nayo vitthāretabbo.
anya-e0803n:1173_0: Yamakamahātherena katāya pana cūḷaniruttiyaṃ “bho purisa”iti rassavasena ālapanekavacanaṃ vatvā “bho purisā”iti dīghavasena ālapanabahuvacanaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1173_2: tathāpi bahūnamālapanavisaye “bho yakkhā”itiādīnaṃ ālapanabahuvacanānaṃ jātakaṭṭhakathādīsu dissanato pasatthatarova hoti viññūnaṃ pamāṇañca,
anya-e0803n:1173_3: tasmā iminā yamakamahātheramatenapi “puriso purisā purisa”ntiādīni vatvā āmantane “bho purisa,
anya-e0803n:1176_2: atha kho bahuvacanampi hotīti “bho purisā”iti bahuvacanappayogopi gahito.
anya-e0803n:1176_3: “Bhavanto”tidaṃ pana bahuvacanameva hotīti “purisā”ti puna vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1176_4: Iti yamakamahātherena “bho purisa”iti rassavasena ālapanekavacanaṃ vatvā “bho purisā”iti dīghavasena ālapanabahuvacanaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1176_5: Tathā hi pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu ca nipātabhūto bhosaddo ekavacanabahuvacanavasena dvidhā bhijjati.
anya-e0803n:1176_7: “api nu kho sapariggahānaṃ tevijjānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ apariggahena brahmunā saddhiṃ saṃsandati sametīti,
anya-e0803n:1176_12: bho pabbajita”iccādipāḷito aṭṭhakathāto ca bhosaddassa ekavacanappayoge pavattinidassanaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1176_14: Yathā mayameva arahāma taṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamituṃ,
anya-e0803n:1176_15: nāhaṃ bho samaṇassa gotamassa subhāsitaṃ subhāsitato nābbhanumodāmi,
anya-e0803n:1176_17: Bho yakkhā ahaṃ imaṃ tumhākaṃ bhājetvā dadeyyaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1176_19: bho dhuttā tumhākaṃ kriyā mayhaṃ na ruccati.
anya-e0803n:1176_20: So te purise āha bho tumhe maṃ mārentā rañño dassetvāva mārethā”ti iccādi pana pāḷito aṭṭhakathāto ca bhosaddassa bahuvacanappayoge pavattinidassanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1177_0: Keci pana adūraṭṭhassālapane “bho purisa”iti rassavasena ālapanekavacanaṃ icchanti,
anya-e0803n:1177_1: dūraṭṭhassālapane pana “bho purisā”iti dīghavasena ālapanekavacanaṃ icchanti.
anya-e0803n:1177_2: Adūraṭṭhānaṃ dūraṭṭhānañca purisānaṃ itthīnañca ālapane na kiñci vadanti.
anya-e0803n:1177_3: Tathā adūraṭṭhāya dūraṭṭhāya ca itthiyā ālapane te pucchitabbā “adūraṭṭhānaṃ dūraṭṭhānañca purisānamālapane kathaṃ vattabba”nti.
anya-e0803n:1177_4: Addhā te evaṃ puṭṭhā uttari kiñci vattuṃ na sakkhissanti.
anya-e0803n:1177_5: Evampi te ce vadeyyuṃ “bhavanto purisāti imināva adūraṭṭhānaṃ dūraṭṭhānañca purisānamālapanaṃ bhavatī”ti.
anya-e0803n:1177_6: Tadā te vattabbā “yadi bhavanto purisā”ti iminā advejjhena vacanena adūraṭṭhānaṃ dūraṭṭhānañca purisānamālapanaṃ bhavati,
anya-e0803n:1177_7: evaṃ sante “bho purisa”iti rassapadenapi dūraṭṭhassa ca purisassālapanaṃ vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1177_8: evaṃ avatvā kimatthaṃ adūraṭṭhassālapane “bho purisa”iti rassavasena ālapanekavacanaṃ icchatha,
anya-e0803n:1177_9: kimatthañca dūraṭṭhassālapane “bho purisā”iti dīghavasena ālapanekavacanaṃ icchatha.
anya-e0803n:1178_1: taggha sugata bojjhaṅgā”tiādīsu ālapanapadabhūtaṃ “bhagavā”iti dīghapadaṃ samīpe ṭhitakālepi dūre ṭhitakālepi buddhassālapanapadaṃ bhavitumarahateva,
anya-e0803n:1178_3: Yasmā panetesu “bhagavā”ti ālapanapadassa na katthacipi rassattaṃ dissati,
anya-e0803n:1178_4: “sugatā”ti ālapanapadassa ca na katthacipi dīghattaṃ dissati,
anya-e0803n:1178_5: tasmā dīgharassamattābhedaṃ acintetvā “purisa”iti rassavasena vuttapadaṃ pakatissaravasena samīpe ṭhitassa
anya-e0803n:1178_7: āyatassaravasena dūre ṭhitapurisassa āmantanakāle dūraṭṭhassālapanapadaṃ bhavatīti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1178_10: bho dhuttā”tiādīni dīghavasena vuttāni ālapanabahuvacanapadānipi pakatissaravasena samīpe ṭhitapurisānaṃ
anya-e0803n:1178_12: āyatassaravasena dūre ṭhitapurisādīnaṃ āmantanakāle dūraṭṭhānamālapanapadāni bhavantīti gahetabbāni.
anya-e0803n:1178_13: Tathā hi brāhmaṇā katthaci katthaci rassaṭṭhānepi dīghaṭṭhānepi āyatena sarena majjhimāyatena sarena
anya-e0803n:1178_14: accāyatena ca sarena vedaṃ paṭhanti likhitumasakkuṇeyyena gītassarena viya.
anya-e0803n:1178_15: Iti sabbakkharesupi āyatena sarenuccāraṇaṃ labbhateva likhitumasakkuṇeyyaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1178_16: tasmā asampathamanotaritvā “bho purisa”iti vacanena dūraṭṭhassa ca adūraṭṭhassa ca purisassālapanaṃ bhavati,
anya-e0803n:1178_18: bhavanto purisā”ti imehi vacanehipi dūraṭṭhānañca adūraṭṭhānañca purisānamālapanaṃ bhavatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1178_19: Iti dūraṭṭhassa adūraṭṭhānañca āyatena sarena āmantanameva pamāṇaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1178_32: bho cakkhu”iccevamādīhi padehi adūraṭṭhassālapanañca dūraṭṭhassālapanañca bhavati.
anya-e0803n:1178_35: kaññāyo”ti evamādīhipi padehi adūraṭṭhānañcālapanaṃ bhavatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1180_0: Tassa taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā, rañño puttaṃ adassayuṃ;
anya-e0803n:1189_0: Na katthacipi dīghattaṃ, iti nīti mayā matā.
anya-e0803n:1190_0: Idampettha vattabbaṃ “kuto nu bho idamāyātaṃ ‘dūraṭṭhassālapanaṃ adūraṭṭhassālapanami’ti”?
anya-e0803n:1191_0: Imasmiṃ pakaraṇe “bahuvacana”nti vā “puthuvacana”nti vā “anekavacana”nti vā atthato ekaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1191_2: tasmā sabbattha “bahuvacana”nti vā “puthuvacana”nti vā “anekavacana”nti vā vohāro kātabbo,
anya-e0803n:1191_3: puthuvacanaṃ anekavacananti ca idaṃ sāsane niruttaññūnaṃ vohāro,
anya-e0803n:1192_0: Kasmā pana imasmiṃ pakaraṇe dvivacanaṃ na vuttanti?
anya-e0803n:1192_10: Teneva hi si yo aṃ yo nā hītiādinā ekavacanabahuvacanāneva dassitānīti.
anya-e0803n:1193_3: mayaṃ aññamaññaṃ pārisuddhiuposathaṃ kareyyāmā”ti pāḷiyaṃ dve sandhāya “āyasmantā”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1193_4: “uddiṭṭhā kho āyasmanto cattāro pārājikā dhammā”tiādīsu pana pāḷīsu bahavo sandhāya “āyasmanto”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1193_5: na ca sakkā vattuṃ “yathā tathā vutta”nti,
anya-e0803n:1193_18: Na hi akkharasamayakovido jhānalābhīpi dibbacakkhunā vassasatampi vassasahassampi samavekkhanto buddhavacane ekampi kriyāpadaṃ dvivacananti passeyya,
anya-e0803n:1193_19: evaṃ kriyāpadesu dvivacanassābhāvā nāmikapadesu dvivacanaṃ natthi.
anya-e0803n:1194_0: Apica “puthuvacana”nti niruttivohāropi “buddhavacane dvivacanaṃ natthī”ti etamatthaṃ dīpeti.
anya-e0803n:1194_1: Tañhi sakkaṭabhāsāyaṃ vuttā dvivacanato bahuvacanato ca visuṃbhūtaṃ vacanaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1194_2: tattha vā vuttehi atthehi visuṃbhūtassa atthassa vacanaṃ “puthuvacana”nti vuccati.
anya-e0803n:1194_3: Kathamidaṃ sakkaṭabhāsāyaṃ vuttā dvivacanato bahuvacanato ca visuṃbhūtaṃ vacananti ce?
anya-e0803n:1194_5: tasmā idaṃ tehi sakkaṭabhāsāyaṃ vuttehi dvivacanabahuvacanehi visuṃbhūtaatthassa vacananti vuccati.
anya-e0803n:1194_6: Kathañca pana sakkaṭabhāsāyaṃ vuttehi visuṃbhūtassa atthassa vacananti puthuvacananti ce?
anya-e0803n:1194_7: Yasmā sakkaṭabhāsāyaṃ dve upādāya dvivacanaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1194_12: Māgadhabhāsāyaṃ pana dviticatupañcādike bahavo upādāya puthuvacanaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1194_13: tasmā sakkaṭabhāsāyaṃ vuttehi atthehi visuṃbhūtassa atthassa vacananti puthuvacananti vuccati.
anya-e0803n:1194_16: puthuno vā atthassa vacanaṃ “puthuvacana”nti attho samadhigantabbo.
anya-e0803n:1195_1: purisa”nti niruttipiṭakato uddharitanayaṃ nissāya pakatirūpabhūtassa bhūtasaddassa nāmikapadamālā vuccate –
anya-e0803n:1196_0: Bhūto, bhūtā. Bhūtaṃ, bhūte. Bhūtena, bhūtehi, bhūtebhi. Bhūtassa, bhūtānaṃ. Bhūtā, bhūtasmā, bhūtamhā, bhūtehi, bhūtebhi. Bhūtassa, bhūtānaṃ. Bhūte,
anya-e0803n:1197_1: Yathā panettha bhūtaiccetassa pakatirūpassa nāmikapadamālā purisanayena yojitā,
anya-e0803n:1197_2: evaṃ bhāvakādīnañca aññesañca taṃsadisānaṃ nāmikapadamālā purisanayena yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n:1197_3: Etthaññāni taṃsadisāni nāma “buddho”tiādīnaṃ padānaṃ buddhaiccādīni pakatirūpāni.
anya-e0803n:1234_0: Kecettha vadeyyuṃ “nanu bho ‘orodhā ca kumārā cā’ti pāṭhassa dassanato orodhasaddo itthiliṅgo”ti? Tanna,
anya-e0803n:1234_6: Nanu ca bho sammohavinodaniyādīsu orodhasaddassa itthiliṅgatā pākaṭā,
anya-e0803n:1234_8: “Rukkhe adhivatthā devatā therassa kuddhā paṭhamameva manaṃ palobhetvā ‘ito te sattadivasamatthake upaṭṭhāko rājā marissatī’ti supine ārocesi.
anya-e0803n:1234_9: Thero taṃ kathaṃ sutvā rājorodhānaṃ ācikkhi.
anya-e0803n:1234_11: Ettha hi “rājorodhāna”nti vatvā “tā”ti vuttattāva orodhasaddassa itthiliṅgatā pākaṭāti? Tanna,
anya-e0803n:1234_14: ettha pana orodhasaddena itthipadatthassa kathanato itthipadatthaṃ sandhāya “tā”ti vuttattā “tā itthiyo”ti ayamevattho.
anya-e0803n:1234_15: Tumhe pana amātāpitarasaṃvaddhattā ācariyakule ca anivuṭṭhattā etaṃ sukhumatthamajānantā yaṃ vā taṃ vā mukhārūḷhaṃ vadatha.
anya-e0803n:1235_0: Bhuñjanatthaṃ kathanatthaṃ, mukhaṃ hotīti no vade;
anya-e0803n:1236_0: Yaṃ vā taṃ vā mukhārūḷhaṃ, vacanaṃ paṇḍito naroti.
anya-e0803n:1237_0: Na mayaṃbho yaṃ vā taṃ vā mukhārūḷhaṃ vadāma,
anya-e0803n:1237_5: mā tumhe “aṭṭhakathācariyānaññeva vacanaṃ gahetvā vadāmā”ti aṭṭhakathācariye abbhācikkhatha.
anya-e0803n:1237_8: na yuttaṃ buddhādīnaṃ garūnamabbhācikkhanaṃ mahato anatthassa lābhāya saṃvattanato.
anya-e0803n:1237_9: Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “attanā duggahitena amhe ceva abbhācikkhati,
anya-e0803n:1238_0: Evaṃ abbhācikkhanassa ayuttataṃ sāvajjatañca dassetvā punapi te idaṃ vattabbā –
anya-e0803n:1238_3: Kosiyajātakaṭṭhakathāyañhi “satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ mātugāmaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
anya-e0803n:1238_4: Sā kirekassa saddhassa pasannassa upāsakabrāhmaṇassa brāhmaṇī dussīlā pāpadhammā”ti pāṭho dissati.
anya-e0803n:1238_5: Ettha hi “mātugāmaṃ ārabbha kathesī”ti vatvā “sā”ti vuttattā tumhākaṃ matena mātugāmasaddo itthiliṅgoyeva siyā,
anya-e0803n:1238_9: kiṃ sā eva aṭṭhakathā tumhākaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1239_2: Evaṃ vuttā te niruttarā appaṭibhānā maṅkubhūtā pattakkhandhā adhomukhā pajjhāyeyyuṃ.
anya-e0803n:1239_3: Etthāpi mātugāmasaddena itthipadatthassa kathanato itthipadatthaṃ sandhāya “sā”ti vuttattā “sā itthī”ti ayamevattho.
anya-e0803n:1239_4: Katthaci hi padhānavācakena pulliṅgena napuṃsakaliṅgena vā samānādhikaraṇassa guṇasaddassa abhidheyyaliṅgānuvattittāpulliṅgavasena
anya-e0803n:1239_5: vā napuṃsakaliṅgavasena vā niddisitabbattepi liṅgamanapekkhitvā itthipadatthamevāpekkhitvā itthiliṅganiddeso dissati.
anya-e0803n:1239_7: “Idha visākhe mātugāmo susaṃvihitakammantā hoti saṅgahitaparijanā bhattumanāpaṃ carati,
anya-e0803n:1239_9: “ko nu kho bhante hetu ko paccayo,
anya-e0803n:1239_10: yena midhekacco mātugāmo dubbaṇṇā ca hoti durūpā supāpikā dassanāya,
anya-e0803n:1239_11: daliddā ca hoti appassakā appabhogā appesakkhā ca.
anya-e0803n:1239_12: Idha mallike ekacco mātugāmo kodhanā hoti upāyāsabahulā,
anya-e0803n:1239_13: appampi vuttā samānā abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patitthiyati kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukarotī”ti ca,
anya-e0803n:1239_14: “taṃ kho pana bhikkhave itthiratanaṃ rañño cakkavattissa pubbuṭṭhāyinī pacchānipātinī kiṃkārapaṭissāvinī”ti ca ime payogā.
anya-e0803n:1240_0: Katthaci pana padhānavācakena napuṃsakaliṅgena samānādhikaraṇassa guṇasaddassa abhidheyyaliṅgānuvattittā
anya-e0803n:1240_1: napuṃsakaliṅgavasena niddisitabbattepi liṅgamanapekkhitvā purisapadatthamevāpekkhitvā pulliṅganiddeso dissati.
anya-e0803n:1240_3: “Pañca paccekabuddhasatāni imasmiṃ isigilismiṃ pabbate ciranivāsino ahesuṃ.
anya-e0803n:1240_4: Taṃ kho pana rañño cakkavattissa pariṇāyakaratanaṃ ñātānaṃ pavesetā aññātānaṃ nivāretā”ti.
anya-e0803n:1240_5: Katthaci padhānavācakena liṅgattayena samānādhikaraṇassa guṇasaddassa abhidheyyaliṅgānurūpaṃ niddeso dissati.
anya-e0803n:1240_8: Aṭṭhahi kho nakulamāte dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo kāyassa bhedā parammaraṇā manāpakāyikānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjati.
anya-e0803n:1241_0: Seyyaiti saddo pana yebhuyyena okārantabhāve ṭhatvā liṅgattayānukūlo bhavati ekākāreneva tiṭṭhanato. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0803n:1246_0: Yaso ca appabuddhīnaṃ, viññūnaṃ ayaso ca yo;
anya-e0803n:1247_0: Ayasova seyyo viññūnaṃ, na yaso appabuddhinaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1248_0: Dummedhehi pasaṃsā ca, viññūhi garahā ca yā;
anya-e0803n:1251_0: Pavivekaṃ dukkhaṃ seyyo, yañce kāmamayaṃ sukhaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1253_0: Maraṇaṃ dhammikaṃ seyyo, yañce jīve adhammika”nti.
anya-e0803n:1254_0: Evamayaṃ seyya iti saddo okārantabhāve ṭhatvā liṅgattayānukūlo bhavati.
anya-e0803n:1254_1: Katthaci pana ākārantabhāve ṭhatvā itthiliṅgānukūlo dissati “itthīpi hi ekacciyā,
anya-e0803n:1254_4: Evaṃpakāre payoge kiṃ tumhe na passathāti.
anya-e0803n:1254_5: Evaṃ vuttā ca te niruttarāva bhavissanti.
anya-e0803n:1255_0: Sacepi te ettha evaṃ vadeyyuṃ “tattha tattha suttappadese aṭṭhakathādīsu ca ‘mātugāmo’ti vā ‘mātugāmenā’ti
anya-e0803n:1255_1: vā okārantapulliṅgabhāvena mātugāmasaddassa dassanato pulliṅgabhūtaṃ mātugāmasaddaṃ anapekkhitvā itthipadatthameva
anya-e0803n:1255_2: apekkhitvā “sā itthī”ti itthīsaddena sāsaddassa sambandhaggahaṇaṃ mayaṃ sampaṭicchāma,
anya-e0803n:1255_3: ‘orodho’ti vā ‘orodhenā’ti vā okārantapulliṅgabhāvena ṭhitassa orodhasaddassa adassanato pana tumhehi vuttaṃ purimatthaṃ na sampaṭicchāmā”ti.
anya-e0803n:1255_4: Tadā tesaṃ imāni vinayapāḷiyaṃ āgatapadāni dassetabbāni “tena kho pana samayena rājā udeno uyyāne paricāresi saddhiṃ orodhena,
anya-e0803n:1255_5: atha kho rañño udenassa orodho rājānaṃ udenaṃ etadavocā”ti.
anya-e0803n:1255_6: Evaṃ imāni suttapadāni dassetvā suttanipātaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “rāmo nāma rājā kuṭṭharogī orodhehi ca nāṭakehi
anya-e0803n:1255_7: ca jigucchamāno”ti vacanañca dassetvā “gacchatha tumhe garukulamupagantvā bhagavato saddhammassa ciraṭṭhitatthaṃ
anya-e0803n:1256_1: mātugāmasaddo ca orodhasaddo ca dārasaddo cāti ime itthipadatthavācakāpi samānā ekantena pulliṅgā bhavanti.
anya-e0803n:1256_2: Tesu dārasaddassa ekasmiṃ atthe vattamānassāpi bahuvacanakattameva saddasatthavidū icchanti,
anya-e0803n:1256_4: Mayaṃ pana dārasaddassa ekasmiṃ atthe ekavacanakattaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1258_0: Puttā ca dārā ca mayañca sabbe;
anya-e0803n:1260_0: Tasmā hi amhaṃ daharā na miyyare”ti ca,
anya-e0803n:1262_0: Sahasā sampiyāyena, taṃ jaññāvasalo itī”ti ca,
anya-e0803n:1264_0: Dissati paradāresu, taṃ parābhavato mukha”nti ca,
anya-e0803n:1265_0: “Puttesu dāresu ca yā apekkhā”ti ca byāse,
anya-e0803n:1265_2: puttadārehi mattano”ti ca evamādayo bahuvacanappayogā bahavo bhavanti.
anya-e0803n:1268_0: Dhammena dāraṃ posenti, te namassāmi mātalī”ti ca,
anya-e0803n:1270_0: “Yo icche puriso hotuṃ, jātiṃ jātiṃ punappunaṃ;
anya-e0803n:1273_0: Samāhāralakkhaṇavasena panesa dārasaddo napuṃsakaliṅgekavacanopi katthaci bhavati.
anya-e0803n:1273_2: Puttadārassa saṅgaho”iti evaṃ idha vuttappakārena liṅgañca atthañca sallakkhetvā “puriso purisā”ti pavattaṃ
anya-e0803n:1273_3: purisasaddanayaṃ nissāya sabbesaṃ “bhūto bhāvako bhavo”tiādīnaṃ bhūdhātumayānaṃ aññesañcokārantapadānaṃ
anya-e0803n:1274_0: Kiṃ pana sabbāni okārantapadāni purisanaye sabbappakārena ekasadisāneva hutvā paviṭṭhānīti?
anya-e0803n:1274_2: Kānici hi okārantapadāni purisanaye sabbathā paviṭṭhāni ca honti,
anya-e0803n:1274_4: kānici okārantapadāni purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhāni ca honti,
anya-e0803n:1274_7: Tatra katamāni kānici okārantapadāni purisanaye sabbathā paviṭṭhāni ca honti,
anya-e0803n:1280_0: Idāni yathāvuttassa pākaṭīkaraṇatthaṃ manasaddādīnaṃ nāmikapadamālaṃ kathayāma –
anya-e0803n:1281_0: Mano, manā. Manaṃ, mano, mane. Manasā, manena, manehi, manebhi. Manaso, manassa, manānaṃ. Manā, manasmā, manamhā, manehi, manebhi. Manaso, manassa, manānaṃ. Manasi, mane, manasmiṃ, manamhi, manesu. Bho mana,
anya-e0803n:1282_1: Evaṃ vaco, vacā. Vacaṃ, vaco, vace.
anya-e0803n:1282_3: Ahasaddassa pana bhummekavacanaṭṭhāne ahasi, ahe, ahasmiṃ, ahamhi, ahu,
anya-e0803n:1283_0: Idāni rūpantaravisesadassanatthaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgassa manasaddassapi nāmikapadamālaṃ vadāma,
anya-e0803n:1284_0: Manaṃ, manāni, manā. Manaṃ, manāni, mane. Manena, manehi, manebhi. Manassa, manaso, manānaṃ. Manā, manasmā, manamhā, manehi, manebhi. Manassa, manaso, manānaṃ. Mane, manasmiṃ, manamhi, manesu. Bho mana,
anya-e0803n:1285_0: Ettha ca pulliṅgassa manasaddassa paccattakaraṇasampadānasāmibhummavacanāni mano manasā manaso manasīti rūpāni ṭhapetvā yāni sesāni,
anya-e0803n:1285_1: napuṃsakaliṅgassa ca manasaddassa paccattavacanāni “manaṃ manānī”ti rūpāni ca,
anya-e0803n:1285_2: aṭṭhamyopayogavacanānaṃ “manaṃ manānī”ti rūpadvayañca ṭhapetvā yāni sesāni,
anya-e0803n:1286_0: Keci okāranto manoiti saddo napuṃsakaliṅgoti vadanti,
anya-e0803n:1286_8: mano dukkho”ti ca “nicco vā anicco vāti anicco bhante”ti ca evamādayo pulliṅgappayogā bahavo diṭṭhā.
anya-e0803n:1286_11: “anicco dukkho”ti evamādīni taṃsamānādhikaraṇāni anekapadasatānipi napuṃsakaliṅgāneva siyuṃ.
anya-e0803n:1286_18: tathāpi manogaṇe pamukhabhāvena gahitassokārantassa manasaddassa rūpaṃ na hoti.
anya-e0803n:1286_20: Cittasaddena samānaliṅgassa samānasutittepi manogaṇe apariyāpannassa niggahītantasseva manasaddassa rūpaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1286_21: Manasaddo hi punnapuṃsakavasena dvidhā bhijjati “mano manaṃ”iti yathā “ajjavoajjava”nti.
anya-e0803n:1286_23: Santaṃ tassa manaṃ hotī”ti hi pāḷi.
anya-e0803n:1286_24: Yadi ca so manosaddo napuṃsakaliṅgo na hoti.
anya-e0803n:1291_0: Ettha manosaddena samānādhikaraṇo “patita”nti saddo napuṃsakaliṅgabhāvena kasmā sannihito.
anya-e0803n:1291_2: tasmā saddantarasannidhānavasena manosaddo napuṃsakaliṅgoti ñāyatīti? Tanna,
anya-e0803n:1291_4: Yadi hi samānādhikaraṇapadaṃ sabbattha liṅgavisesaṃ joteyya,
anya-e0803n:1291_5: “cattāro indriyānī”ti etthāpi “cattāro”ti padaṃ indriyasaddassa pulliṅgattaṃ kareyya,
anya-e0803n:1291_8: Yadi tumhe “patita”nti samānādhikaraṇapadaṃ nissāya manosaddassa napuṃsakaliṅgattamicchatha,
anya-e0803n:1291_9: “cattāro indriyānī”ti etthapi “cattāro”ti samānādhikaraṇapadaṃ nissāya indriyasaddassa pulliṅgattaṃ icchathāti.
anya-e0803n:1291_10: Na mayaṃ bho indriyasaddassa pulliṅgattaṃ icchāma,
anya-e0803n:1291_14: Yadi evaṃ “patitaṃ asubhesu munissa mano”ti etthāpi “patita”nti padaṃ liṅgavipallāsavasena ṭhitanti mantvā “patito”ti atthaṃ dhārethāti.
anya-e0803n:1291_25: tasmā na taṃ liṅgavisesajotane ekantato pamāṇaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1291_32: Yasmā evamādīsupi ṭhānesu liṅgavavatthānaṃ hotiyeva. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0803n:1291_34: tasmā “patitaṃ asubhesu munissa mano”ti etthāpi “patita”nti napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ “mano”ti pulliṅganti vavatthānaṃ bhavatīti.
anya-e0803n:1291_37: yasmā manogaṇe pavattānaṃ padānaṃ samānādhikaraṇapadāni katthaci napuṃsakavasena yojetabbāni,
anya-e0803n:1291_38: tasmā manogaṇe pamukhassa manosaddassapi samānādhikaraṇapadāni katthaci napuṃsakavasena yojitāni.
anya-e0803n:1291_43: appakaṃ rāgādi rajo yesaṃ paññāmaye akkhimhi te apparajakkhā”tiādinā saddaracanaṃ kubbiṃsu,
anya-e0803n:1291_44: na pana tehi vaco siro rajosaddādīnaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgattaṃ vibhāvetuṃ īdisī saddaracanā katā,
anya-e0803n:1291_45: atha kho siromanosaddānaṃ manogaṇe pavattānaṃ pulliṅgasaddānaṃ katthacipi īdisānipi liṅgavipallāsavasena
anya-e0803n:1291_46: ṭhitāni samānādhikaraṇapadāni hontīti paresaṃ jānāpanādhippāyavatiyā anukampāya viracitā.
anya-e0803n:1291_47: Etthāpi tumhākaṃ matena manosaddassa napuṃsakaliṅgatte sati vaco siro iccādayopi napuṃsakaliṅgattamāpajjanti
anya-e0803n:1291_50: Addhā te idampi sutvā nibbeṭhetumasakkontā tuṇhī bhavissanti.
anya-e0803n:1291_51: Kiñcāpi te aññaṃ gahetabbakāraṇaṃ apassantā evaṃ vadeyyuṃ “yadi bho mano saddo napuṃsakaliṅgona hoti,
anya-e0803n:1291_54: yadi tumhe veyyākaraṇamataṃ gahetvā manosaddassa napuṃsakaliṅgattaṃ rocetha,
anya-e0803n:1291_55: nanu bhagavāyeva loke asadiso mahāveyyākaraṇo mahāpuriso visārado parappavādamaddano.
anya-e0803n:1291_56: Bhagavantañhi padakā veyyākaraṇā ambaṭṭhamāṇavapokkharasātisoṇadaṇḍādayo ca brāhmaṇā saccakanigaṇṭhādayo ca paribbājakā vādena na sampāpuṇiṃsu,
anya-e0803n:1291_57: aññadatthu bhagavāyeva mattavāraṇagaṇamajjhe kesarasīho viya asambhīto nesaṃ nesaṃ vādaṃ maddesi,
anya-e0803n:1291_59: evaṃvidhena bhagavatā vohārakusalena yasmā “kāyo anicco”ti ca “kāyo dukkho,
anya-e0803n:1291_61: mano dukkho”ti ca evamādinā vuttā manosaddassa pulliṅgabhāvasūcanikā bahū pāḷiyo dissanti,
anya-e0803n:1291_63: Evaṃ vuttā te niruttarā appaṭibhānā maṅkubhūtā pattakkhandhā adhomukhā pajjhāyissanti.
anya-e0803n:1293_0: Saro, sarā. Saraṃ, sare. Sarena, sarehi, sarebhi. Sarassa, sarānaṃ. Sarā, sarasmā, saramhā, sarehi, sarebhi. Sarassa, sarānaṃ. Sare, sarasmiṃ, saramhi, saresu. Bho sara,
anya-e0803n:1294_0: Ayaṃ purisanaye sabbathā paviṭṭhassa ususaddasaravanaakārādisaravācakassa sarasaddassa nāmikapadamālā.
anya-e0803n:1295_0: Ayaṃ pana purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhassa manogaṇapakkhikassa rahadavācakassa sarasaddassa nāmikapadamālā –
anya-e0803n:1296_0: Saro, sarā. Saraṃ, saro, sare. Sarasā, sarena, sarehi, sarebhi. Saraso, sarassa, sarānaṃ. Sarā, sarasmā, saramhā, sarehi, sarebhi. Saraso, sarassa, sarānaṃ. Sarasi, sare, sarasmiṃ, saramhi, saresu. Bho sara,
anya-e0803n:1297_0: Vayo, vayā. Vayaṃ, vaye. Vayena, vayehi,
anya-e0803n:1297_2: Ayaṃ purisanaye sabbathā paviṭṭhassa parihānivācakassa vayasaddassa nāmikapadamālā.
anya-e0803n:1298_0: Ayaṃ pana purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhassa manogaṇapakkhikassa āyukoṭṭhāsavācakassa vayasaddassa nāmikapadamālā – vayo, vayā. Vayaṃ, vayo, vaye. Vayasā, vayena, vayehi,
anya-e0803n:1299_0: Ceto, cetā. Cetaṃ, cete. Cetena, cetehi,
anya-e0803n:1299_2: Ayaṃ purisanaye sabbathā paviṭṭhassa paṇṇattivācakassa cetasaddassa nāmikapadamālā.
anya-e0803n:1300_0: Ayaṃ pana purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhassa cittavācakassa cetasaddassa nāmikapadamālā – ceto, cetā. Cetaṃ, ceto, cete. Cetasā, cetena, cetehi,
anya-e0803n:1300_6: Evaṃ kānici okārantapadāni purisanaye sabbathā paviṭṭhāni ca honti,
anya-e0803n:1300_7: ekadesena paviṭṭhāni cāti iminā nayena sabbapadāni paññācakkhunā upaparikkhitvā viseso veditabbo.
anya-e0803n:1300_8: Avisesaññuno hi evamādivibhāgaṃ ajānantā yaṃ vā taṃ vā byañjanaṃ ropentā yathādhippetaṃ atthaṃ virādhenti,
anya-e0803n:1300_9: tasmā yo ettha amhehi pakāsito vibhāgo,
anya-e0803n:1300_11: Katamāni kānici okārantapadāni purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhāni ca ekadesena na paviṭṭhāni ca?
anya-e0803n:1300_12: Mano vaco tejosaddādayo ceva ayyasaddo ca,
anya-e0803n:1301_4: bhavanto ayyo”ti dve bahuvacanāni ca vattabbāni.
anya-e0803n:1301_5: Ettha ayyo iti saddo paccattavacanabhāve ekavacanaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1301_7: Tatrime payogā “ayyo kira sāgato ambatitthikena nāgena saṅgāmesi,
anya-e0803n:1301_8: pivatu bhante ayyo sāgato kāpotikaṃ pasanna”nti evamādīni ayyosaddassa paccattekavacanappayogāni,
anya-e0803n:1301_9: “atha kho sā itthī taṃ purisaṃ etadavoca ‘nāyyo so bhikkhu maṃ nippāṭesi,
anya-e0803n:1301_15: Etha mayaṃ ayyo samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajissāmā”ti evamādīni ayyosaddassa ālapanabahuvacanappayogāni.
anya-e0803n:1302_0: Ayyo iti ayaṃ saddo, paccattekavaco bhave;
anya-e0803n:1304_0: Evaṃ kānici okārantapadāni purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhāni ca honti ekadesena na paviṭṭhāni ca.
anya-e0803n:1305_0: Katamāni kānici okārantapadāni purisanaye sabbathā appaviṭṭhāni?
anya-e0803n:1306_0: Go, gāvo, gavo. Gāvuṃ, gāvaṃ, gavaṃ, gāvo, gavo. Gāvena, gavena, gohi, gobhi. Gāvassa, gavassa, gavaṃ, gunnaṃ, gonaṃ. Gāvā, gāvasmā, gāvamhā, gavā, gavasmā, gavamhā, gohi, gobhi. Gāvassa, gavassa, gavaṃ, gunnaṃ, gonaṃ. Gāve, gāvasmiṃ, gāvamhi, gave, gavasmiṃ, gavamhi, gāvesu, gavesu, gosu. Bho go,
anya-e0803n:1306_2: Ayaṃ purisanaye sabbathā appaviṭṭhassa gosaddassa nāmikapadamālā.
anya-e0803n:1307_0: Nanu ca bho gosaddo attanā sambhūtagoṇasaddamālāvasena purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭho ceva ekadesena na paviṭṭho cāti? Saccaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1307_1: Goṇasaddo gosaddavasena sambhūtopi “vatticchānupubbikā saddapaṭipattī”ti vacanato gosaddato visuṃ amhehi gahetvā purisanaye pakkhitto.
anya-e0803n:1307_2: Tassa hi visuṃ gahaṇe yutti dissati syādīsu ekākāreneva tiṭṭhanato,
anya-e0803n:1307_3: tasmā gosaddato sambhūtampi goṇasaddaṃ anapekkhitvā suddhaṃ gosaddameva gahetvā purisanaye sabbathā gosaddassa appaviṭṭhatā vuttā.
anya-e0803n:1308_0: Nanu ca bho paccattavacanabhūto goiti saddo purisoti saddena sadisattā purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhoti? Tanna,
anya-e0803n:1308_2: na purisasaddādayo viya paṭhamaṃ akārantabhāve ṭhatvā pacchā paṭiladdhokārantaṭṭho.
anya-e0803n:1308_3: Teneva hi paccattavacanaṭṭhānepi ālapanavacanaṭṭhānepi goicceva tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0803n:1308_4: Yadi paccattavacanattaṃ paṭicca gosaddassa purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhatā icchitabbā,
anya-e0803n:1308_5: “kānici okārantapadānī”ti evaṃ vuttā okārantakathā kamatthaṃ dīpeyya,
anya-e0803n:1308_7: tasmā amhehi yathāvutto nayoyeva āyasmantehi manasi kātabbo.
anya-e0803n:1308_8: Evaṃ gosaddassa purisanaye sabbathā appaviṭṭhatā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0803n:1309_0: Kecettha evaṃ puccheyyuṃ “gosaddassa tāva ‘go, gāvo, gavo. Gāvuṃ, gāvaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1309_1: gavaṃ’ iccādinā nayena purisanaye sabbathā appaviṭṭhatā amhehi ñātā,
anya-e0803n:1309_2: jaraggava puṅgavādisaddā pana kutra naye paviṭṭhā”ti?
anya-e0803n:1309_3: Tesaṃ evaṃ byākātabbaṃ “jaraggava puṅgavādisaddā sabbathāpi purisanaye paviṭṭhā”ti.
anya-e0803n:1309_4: Tathā hi tesaṃ gosaddato ayaṃ viseso,
anya-e0803n:1309_5: jaranto ca so go cāti jaraggavo.
anya-e0803n:1309_6: Ettha nakāralopo takārassa ca gakārattaṃ bhavati samāsapadattā,
anya-e0803n:1309_7: samāse ca simhi pare gosaddassokārassa avādeso labbhati,
anya-e0803n:1309_9: Tathā hi aññattha anupapadattā gavoiti bahuvacanapadaṃyeva dissati.
anya-e0803n:1309_10: Idha pana sopapadattā samāsapadabhāvamāgamma “jaraggavo”ti ekavacanapadaṃyeva dissati.
anya-e0803n:1309_11: Tathā hi jaraggavoti ettha jarantā ca te gavo cāti evaṃ bahuvacanavasena nibbacanīyatā na labbhati lokasaṅketavasena ekasmiṃ atthe nirūḷhattāti.
anya-e0803n:1310_0: Tatra puṅgavoti gunnaṃ yūthapati nisabhasaṅkhāto usabho.
anya-e0803n:1310_2: samehi pādehi phusī vasundhara”nti ca “gavañce taramānānaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1310_4: Īdisesu pana ṭhānesu keci “pumā ca so go cāti puṅgavo”ti vacanatthaṃ bhaṇanti.
anya-e0803n:1310_5: Mayaṃ pana padhāne nirūḷho ayaṃ saddoti vacanatthaṃ na bhaṇāma.
anya-e0803n:1310_6: Na hi puṅkokilotiādisaddānaṃ kokilādīnaṃ pumbhāvappakāsanamatte samatthatā viya imassa pumbhāvappakāsanamatte samatthatā sambhavati,
anya-e0803n:1310_7: atha kho padhānabhāvappakāsane ca samatthatā sambhavati.
anya-e0803n:1310_8: Tena “sakyapuṅgavo”tiādīsu nisabhasaṅkhāto puṅgavo viyāti puṅgavo, sakyānaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1310_9: sakyesu vā puṅgavo sakyapuṅgavotiādinā samāsapadattho gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n:1310_10: Atha vā uttarapadatte ṭhitānaṃ sīhabyagghanāgādisaddānaṃ seṭṭhavācakattā “sakyapuṅgavo”tiādīnaṃ “sakyaseṭṭho”tiādinā attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n:1310_11: Iti sabbathāpi purisanaye pavattanato jaraggava puṅgavādisaddānaṃ gosaddassa padamālato visadisapadamālatā vavatthapetabbā.
anya-e0803n:1310_12: Gosaddassa pana purisanaye sabbathā appaviṭṭhatā ca vavatthapetabbā.
anya-e0803n:1311_1: tasmā taṃmatena tassa purisanaye sabbathā appaviṭṭhatā bhavati.
anya-e0803n:1311_2: “Aṅguttarāpesū”ti pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “mahiyā pana nadiyā uttarena āpo”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1311_3: ṭīkāyaṃ pana taṃ ulliṅgitvā “mahiyā nadiyā āpo tassa janapadassa uttarena honti,
anya-e0803n:1311_4: tāsaṃ avidūrattā so janapado uttarāpo”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1311_5: Evaṃ āpasaddassa ekantena itthiliṅgatā bahuvacanatā ca ācariyehi icchitā,
anya-e0803n:1311_6: tesaṃ mate āpoiti itthiliṅge paṭhamābahuvacanarūpe honte dutiyātatiyāpañcamīsattamīnaṃ bahuvacanarūpāni kīdisāni siyuṃ.
anya-e0803n:1311_8: purisehi purisebhi purisesū”ti rūpavato pulliṅgassa viya okārantitthiliṅgassa ekāraehi kārādiyuttāni rūpāni katthacipi na dissanti.
anya-e0803n:1311_9: Ato tesaṃ mate padamālānayo atīva dukkaro.
anya-e0803n:1314_0: Iccāpasaddassa itthiliṅgabahuvacanantatā veyyākaraṇānaṃ mataṃ nissāya anumatāti veditabbā.
anya-e0803n:1314_1: Aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ pana āpo iti saddassa napuṃsakaliṅgekavacanavasena vutto payogo diṭṭho “omattaṃ pana āpo adhimattapathavīgatikaṃ jāta”nti.
anya-e0803n:1314_5: Imasmiṃ padese āpo iti saddo ekavacanaṭṭhāne ṭhito diṭṭho.
anya-e0803n:1314_6: Kecettha vadeyyuṃ “āpoti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ salilaṃ suci sugandhaṃ hutvā tattha abhisandatīti salilaṃsaddavasena ekavacanappayogo kato,
anya-e0803n:1314_8: Āpasaddo hi ekantenitthiliṅgo ceva bahuvacananto ca.
anya-e0803n:1314_9: Tathā hi ‘āpo tatthābhisandantī’ti bahuvacanavasena tappayogo vattabbopi chandānurakkhaṇatthaṃ vacanavipallāsavasena niddiṭṭho”ti. Tanna,
anya-e0803n:1314_10: “āpo tatthābhisandare”ti vattuṃ sakkuṇeyyattā “tāni ajja padissare”ti bahuvacanappayogā viya.
anya-e0803n:1315_1: nanu pāḷiyaṃyeva tassa bahuvacanantatā paccakkhato diṭṭhā “āpo ca devā pathavī ca,
anya-e0803n:1315_3: Ettha hi “devā”ti saddaṃ apekkhitvā “āgamu”nti bahuvacanappayogo kato,
anya-e0803n:1315_5: Yadi “āpo”ti saddaṃ sandhāya bahuvacanappayogo kato siyā,
anya-e0803n:1315_6: “pathavī”ti “tejo”ti “vāyo”ti ca saddampi sandhāya bahuvacanappayogo kato siyā.
anya-e0803n:1315_7: Evaṃ sante pathavī tejo vāyosaddāpi bahuvacanakabhāvamāpajjeyyuṃ,
anya-e0803n:1315_11: Rūḷhīvasena te pavattā pakatiāpādīsu atthesu appavattanato.
anya-e0803n:1315_12: Tathā hi āpokasiṇādīsu parikammaṃ katvā nibbattā devā ārammaṇavasena “āpo”tiādināmaṃ labhantīti.
anya-e0803n:1315_13: Evaṃ vuttāpi te evaṃ vadeyyuṃ “nanu ca bho ‘aṅguttarāpesū’ti bahuvacanapāḷi dissatī”ti?
anya-e0803n:1315_17: “aṅguttarāpesū”ti bahuvacanaṃ pana “kurūsu aṅgesu aṅgānaṃ magadhāna”ntiādīni bahuvacanāni viya rūḷhīvasena ekassāpi janapadassa vuttaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1315_20: pulliṅgabahuvacanena pana vutto janapadasaṅkhāto atthoyeva padhāno “āgatasamaṇo saṅghārāmo”ti ettha samaṇasaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0803n:1315_21: atthaṃ upasajjanakaṃ katvā pavattassa āgatasamaṇasaddassa saṅghārāmasaṅkhāto attho viya,
anya-e0803n:1315_22: tasmā āpasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ gahetvā yo aṅguttarāpo nāma janapado,
anya-e0803n:1315_24: Tathā hi “aṅguttarāpesu viharati āpaṇaṃ nāma aṅgānaṃ nigamo”ti pāḷi dissati.
anya-e0803n:1315_25: Tattha uttarena mahāmahiyā nadiyā āpo yesaṃ te uttarāpā,
anya-e0803n:1315_26: aṅgā ca te uttarāpā cāti aṅguttarāpā,
anya-e0803n:1315_28: Evaṃ ekasmiṃ janapadeyeva bahuvacanaṃ na āpasaṅkhāte atthe,
anya-e0803n:1316_0: Tathāpi ye evaṃ vadanti “āpasaddo itthiliṅgo ceva bahuvacanakocā”ti.
anya-e0803n:1316_1: Te pucchitabbā “kiṃ paṭicca tumhe āyasmanto ‘āpasaddo itthiliṅgo ceva bahuvacanako cā’ti vadathā”ti?
anya-e0803n:1316_5: tāsaṃ avidūrattā uttarāpoti vuccatī”ti ca “mahiyā pana nadiyā āpo tassa janapadassa uttarena honti,
anya-e0803n:1316_6: tāsaṃ avidūrattā so janapado uttarāpoti vuccatī”ti ca evaṃ pubbācariyehi abhisaṅkhato saddaracanāviseso dissati,
anya-e0803n:1316_7: tasmā itthiliṅgo ceva bahuvacanako cā”ti vadāmāti.
anya-e0803n:1316_9: so pana saddasatthe veyyākaraṇānaṃ mataṃ gahetvā abhisaṅkhato,
anya-e0803n:1317_2: Āpasaddato paṭhamāyovacanaṃ katvā tassokārādesañca katvā āpoti padaṃ sijjhati “gāvo”ti padamivāti.
anya-e0803n:1317_5: Tathā hi yomhi pare gosaddantassāvādesaṃ katvā tato yonamokārādesaṃ katvā “gāvo”ti nipphajjati,
anya-e0803n:1317_6: āpasadde pana dve ādesā na santi.
anya-e0803n:1318_2: “na vacanapaccanīkasātena suvijānaṃ subhāsita”nti evaṃ vuttapaccanīkasātabhāve ca ṭhatvā evaṃ vadeyyuṃ “yatheva gāvosaddo,
anya-e0803n:1318_3: tatheva āposaddo kiṃ itthiliṅgo na bhavissati bahuvacanako cā”ti?
anya-e0803n:1318_10: āpaṃ abhinandatī”ti evaṃ suttapadāni dassetvā “āpanti idaṃ kataravacana”nti pucchitabbā.
anya-e0803n:1318_11: Addhā te āpasaddassa bahuvacanantabhāvameva icchamānā vakkhanti “dutiyābahuvacana”nti.
anya-e0803n:1319_1: “Āpato”ti idampi “bahuvacanakaṃ topaccayanta”nti vadāma topaccayassa ekatthe ca bavhatthe ca pavattanato.
anya-e0803n:1319_2: Iti tumhe bahuvacanakattaṃyeva icchamānā “āposaddo ca yovacananto”ti bhaṇatha,
anya-e0803n:1319_4: “āpasmiṃ maññatī”ti ettha pana “āpasmi”ntidaṃ kataravacanantaṃ katarādesena sambhūtanti?
anya-e0803n:1319_5: Addhā te evaṃ puṭṭhā niruttarā bhavissanti.
anya-e0803n:1319_6: Tathā yesaṃ evaṃ hoti “āpasaddo itthiliṅgo ceva bahuvacanako cā”ti,
anya-e0803n:1319_7: te pucchitabbā “yaṃ ācariyehi veyyākaraṇamataṃ gahetvā ‘yā āpo’ti ca ‘tāsa’nti ca vuttaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1319_8: tattha ‘kiṃ tāsa’nti vacane ‘āpāna’nti padaṃ ānetvā attho vattabbo,
anya-e0803n:1319_11: evañca sati “yā āpā”ti vattabbaṃ “yā kaññā tiṭṭhantī”ti padamiva.
anya-e0803n:1319_14: evaṃ sati “tāsa”nti etthāpi “āpassā”ti padaṃ ānetvā attho veditabbo.
anya-e0803n:1319_16: Yasmā “āpo”ti paccattekavacanassa tumhākaṃ matena bahuvacanatte sati “āpassā”ti padampi bahuvacananti katvā tāsaṃsaddena yojetvā vattuṃ yuttitoti.
anya-e0803n:1319_23: Evañca sati “āpasaddo bahuvacanakoyeva hotī”ti na vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1320_1: tesaṃ vacanaṃ sadosaṃ duppariharaṇīyaṃ mūlapariyāyasutte “āpaṃ maññati āpasmi”nti ekavacanapāḷīnaṃ dassanato,
anya-e0803n:1320_2: visuddhimaggādīsu ca “vissandanabhāvena taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ āpoti appotīti āpo”tiādikassa ekavacanavasena vuttanibbacanassa dassanato.
anya-e0803n:1320_3: Yathā pana pāḷiyaṃ itthiliṅgepi pariyāpanno gosaddo “tā gāvo tato tato daṇḍena ākoṭeyyā”ti ca “annadā
anya-e0803n:1320_4: baladā cetā”ti ca ādinā bavhatthadīpakehi itthiliṅgabhūtehi sabbanāmikapadehi ca asabbanāmikapadehi ca
anya-e0803n:1320_6: na tathā pāḷiyaṃ bavhatthadīpakehi itthiliṅgabhūtehi sabbanāmikapadehi vā asabbanāmikapadehi vā samānādhikaraṇabhāvena vutto āpasaddo dissati.
anya-e0803n:1320_8: kaññasaddato āpaccayo viya āpasaddato āpaccayo vā siyā,
anya-e0803n:1320_9: nadasaddato viya ca īpaccayo vā siyā,
anya-e0803n:1320_11: ubhayābhāvato itthiliṅge vuttaṃ sabbampi vidhānaṃ tattha na labbhati,
anya-e0803n:1320_13: Nanu ca bho gosaddatopi āpaccayo natthi,
anya-e0803n:1320_15: evaṃ sante kasmā soyeva itthiliṅgo hoti,
anya-e0803n:1321_3: Itthiliṅgabhāve pana tamhā āpaccaye ahontepi īpaccayo vikappena hoti,
anya-e0803n:1321_10: Yathā vā gosaddassa avisadākāravohārataṃ paṭicca itthiliṅgabhāvo upapajjati,
anya-e0803n:1321_12: Āpasaddassa hi anākularūpakkamattā avisadākāravohāratā na dissati,
anya-e0803n:1322_0: Tathā yesaṃ evaṃ hoti “āpasaddo sabbadā itthiliṅgo ceva bahuvacanako cā”ti,
anya-e0803n:1322_2: yathā itthiliṅgabhūtassa kaññāsaddassa paṭhamaṃ kaññaiti rassavasena ṭhapitassa āpaccayato paraṃ smiṃvacanaṃ sarūpato na tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0803n:1322_5: na tathā “itthiliṅga”nti tumhehi gahitassa āposaddassa paṭhamaṃ āpaiti rassavasena ṭhapitassa paraṃ smiṃvacanaṃ yaṃbhāvena ca yābhāvena ca tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0803n:1322_11: Na hi caturāsītidhammakkhandhasahassasaṅgahesu anekakoṭisatasahassesu pāḷippadesesu ekasmimpi pāḷippadese
anya-e0803n:1322_12: paṭhamaṃ akārantabhāvena ṭhapetabbānaṃ itthiliṅgasaddānaṃ parato ṭhitaṃ smiṃvacanaṃ sarūpato tiṭṭhatīti.
anya-e0803n:1323_1: tathā hi aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ ‘omattaṃ pana āpo adhimattapathavīgatikaṃ jāta’nti napuṃsakaliṅgabhāvena taṃsamānādhikaraṇapadāni niddiṭṭhānī”ti? Tanna,
anya-e0803n:1323_2: manogaṇe pavattehi tama vaca sirasaddādīhi viya āpasaddenapi samānādhikaraṇapadānaṃ katthaci napuṃsakaliṅgabhāvena niddisitabbattā.
anya-e0803n:1323_4: veneyyasattahadayesu tamo payātī”ti ettha “tamo”tipadena samānādhikaraṇaṃ “vihata”nti napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ dissati,
anya-e0803n:1323_5: tathā “dukkhaṃ vaco etasmiṃ vipaccanīkasāte puggaleti dubbaco”ti ettha “vaco”ti padena samānādhikaraṇaṃ “dukkha”nti napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1323_6: “avanataṃ siro yassa so avanatasiro”ti ettha “siro”ti padena samānādhikaraṇaṃ “avanata”nti napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1323_7: “appaṃ rāgādirajo yesaṃ paññāmaye akkhimhi te apparajakkhā”ti ettha “rajo”ti padena samānādhikaraṇaṃ “appa”nti napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ dissati.
anya-e0803n:1323_8: Na te ācariyā tehi samānādhikaraṇapadehi tamavacasirasaddādīnaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgattaviññāpanatthaṃ tathāvidhaṃ saddaracanaṃ kubbiṃsu,
anya-e0803n:1323_9: atha kho “sobhanaṃ mano tassāti sumano”ti ettha viya manogaṇe pavattapulliṅgānaṃ payoge napuṃsakaliṅgabhāvenapi
anya-e0803n:1323_11: Yathā ca “vihata”ntiādikā saddaracanā tamavacasirasaddādīnaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgattaviññāpanatthaṃ na katā,
anya-e0803n:1323_12: tathā “omatta”nti ca “adhimattapathavīgatikaṃ jāta”nti ca saddaracanāpi āpasaddassa napuṃsakaliṅgattaviññāpanatthaṃ na katā.
anya-e0803n:1323_13: Yasmā pana manogaṇe pavattehi manasaddādīhi ekadesena samānagatikattā āpasaddenapi napuṃsakaliṅgassa samānādhikaraṇatā yujjati,
anya-e0803n:1323_14: tasmā aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ “omattaṃ pana āpo adhimattapathavīgatikaṃ jāta”nti napuṃsakaliṅgassa āpasaddena samānādhikaraṇatā katā.
anya-e0803n:1323_15: Tathāpi āpasaddo manasaddādīhi ekadesena samānagatiko samāsapadatte majjhokārassa “āpokasiṇaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1323_17: tasmā “omatta”ntiādivacanaṃ āpasaddassa napuṃsakaliṅgattaviññāpanatthaṃ vuttanti na gahetabbaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1323_18: liṅgavipariyayavasena pana katthaci evampi saddagati hotīti ñāpanatthaṃ vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1323_28: Iccokārantavasena gahitassa āpasaddassa itthiliṅgatā ca napuṃsakaliṅgatā ca ekantato natthi,
anya-e0803n:1323_29: niggahītantavasena pana gahitassa katthaci napuṃsakaliṅgatā siyā “bhante nāgasena samuddo samuddoti vuccati,
anya-e0803n:1323_30: kena kāraṇena āpaṃ udakaṃ samuddoti vuccatī”ti payogadassanato.
anya-e0803n:1323_31: Ettha paneke vadeyyuṃ “yadi bho okārantavasena gahitassa āpasaddassa itthinapuṃsakaliṅgavasena dviliṅgatā natthi,
anya-e0803n:1324_5: na no suttāharaṇe bhāro atthī”ti evañca pana vatvā tesaṃ imāni suttapadāni dassetabbāni.
anya-e0803n:1324_13: Āpaṃ maññati āpasmiṃ maññatī”ti imāni suttapadāni.
anya-e0803n:1325_4: tena “āpenā”ti iminā pana āpasaddassa itthiliṅgabhāvavigamo siddho itthiliṅge enādesābhāvato. “Āpassa,
anya-e0803n:1325_5: āpasmi”nti imināpi itthiliṅgabhāvavigamoyeva itthiliṅge sarūpato nā smā smiṃ vacanānamabhāvā.

anya-e0803n:1473_0: Keci pana vadeyyuṃ “yāyaṃ purisasaddanayaṃ gahetvā ‘bhūto, bhūtā.
anya-e0803n:1473_2: tattha catutthekavacanassa āyādesasahitāni rūpāni kimatthaṃ na vuttānī”ti?

anya-e0803n:1480_12: pabhedato sattaṭṭhānaṃ vā dānarocanadhāraṇanamoyogādibhede yattha katthaci sampadānavisaye catutthekavacanassa āyādesasahitāni rūpāni na dissanti,

anya-e0803n:1489_0: Imissā pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sammādiṭṭhikassa putto guḷaṃ khipamāno buddhānussatiṃ āvajjetvā ‘namo buddhassā’ti

anya-e0803n:1489_3: buddhassā’ti tassa muṇḍakassa samaṇakassa namakkāraṃ karosī”ti āyādesavajjito saddaracanāviseso dissati.
anya-e0803n:1489_4: Tathā tattha tattha “buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ deti.
anya-e0803n:1489_9: Evaṃ dānarocanādīsu bahūsu sampadānavisayesu catutthekavacanassa āyādesasahitaṃ rūpaṃ na dissati.
anya-e0803n:1490_2: appo saggāya gacchatī”ti cettha gatyatthakammani dissati.
anya-e0803n:1490_5: “Paṭikasseyyā”ti cettha kasa gatiyanti dhātussa patiupasaggena visesitattā “ākaḍḍheyyā”ti attho bhavati.
anya-e0803n:1490_7: yo maṃ gahetvāna dakāya netī”ti ettha nayanatthakammani dissati.
anya-e0803n:1490_11: Mama vacanato viramathāti hi nissakkavacanavasena attho.
anya-e0803n:1490_13: Mama mahato haṃsagaṇassa bhattāti hi sāmivacanavasena attho.
anya-e0803n:1490_16: Mayaṃ dhanañcayassa rañño asakkatā ca bhavāmāti hi kattutthe sāmivacanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1490_17: Tathā hi “dhanañcayassā”ti vā “dhanañcayenā”ti vā vattabbe evaṃ avatvā “dhanañcayāyā”ti sampadānavacanaṃ
anya-e0803n:1490_19: tasmā dhanañcayarājena mayaṃ asakkatā ca bhavāmāti attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n:1491_0: “Virāgāya upasamāya nirodhāyā”tiādīni pana anekasahassāni āyādesasahitāni saddarūpāni tadatthe pavattanti.
anya-e0803n:1491_3: na bhavabhogādiattha”nti tadatthavaseneva āyādesasahitaṃ saddarūpaṃ payuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0803n:1491_4: evaṃ catutthekavacanassa āyādesasahitāni rūpāni gatyatthakammani nayanatthakammani vibhattivipariṇāme
anya-e0803n:1491_5: tadatthe cāti imesu catūsuyeva ṭhānesu dissanti,
anya-e0803n:1491_6: na pana dānarocanādibhede yattha katthaci sampadānavisaye.
anya-e0803n:1491_7: Tathā hi niruttipiṭake “atthāyāti sampadānavacana”nti āyādesasahitaṃ saddarūpaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1491_8: purisasaddādivasena pana tādisāni rūpāni na vuttāni tādisānaṃ saddarūpānaṃ yattha katthaci appavattanato.
anya-e0803n:1491_9: Kaccāyanappakaraṇepi hi “āya catutthekavacanassa tū”ti lakkhaṇassa vuttiyaṃ “atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussāna”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1492_1: nanu bho tasseva vuttiyaṃ “catutthīti kimatthaṃ purisassa mukhaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1492_3: Vāti kimatthaṃ dātā hoti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā”ti vuttattā “purisāya samaṇāya brāhmaṇāyā”tiādīni padarūpāni nayato dassitāni,
anya-e0803n:1492_4: kevalaṃ pana mukhasaddayogato bahuvacanabhāvato vikappanato ca “purisāyā”tiādīni na sijjhanti,
anya-e0803n:1492_7: “catutthīti kimatthaṃ purisassa mukha”nti vadanto “sace āyādeso bhaveyya,
anya-e0803n:1492_10: na ca tena “mukhasaddaṭṭhāne detītiādike sampadānavisayabhūte kriyāpade ṭhite āyādeso hotī”ti dasseti.
anya-e0803n:1492_11: “Ekavacanassāti kimatthaṃ purisānaṃ dadātī”ti vadantopi “ekavacanasseva āyādeso hoti,
anya-e0803n:1492_13: “Dadātī”ti idaṃ padaṃ “purisāna”nti padassa sampadānavacanattaṃ ñāpetuṃ avoca,
anya-e0803n:1492_14: na ca “detītiādike sampadānavisayabhūte kriyāpade sati catutthekavacanassa āyādeso hotī”ti imamatthaṃ viññāpeti.
anya-e0803n:1492_15: “Vāti kimatthaṃ dātā hoti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā”ti ca vadantopi “sampadāneyeva vikappena āyādeso hotī”ti viññāpeti,
anya-e0803n:1493_0: Yadi pana dānādikriyaṃ paṭicca āyādesavidhānaṃ siyā,
anya-e0803n:1493_1: vuttikārakena lakkhaṇassa vuttiyaṃ mūlodāharaṇeyeva “atthāya hitāyā”ti tadatthapayogāni viya “purisāya dīyate”tiādi vattabbaṃ siyā,
anya-e0803n:1493_4: Buddhavacane porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu ca tādisassa payogassa abhāvā.
anya-e0803n:1493_5: Niruttipiṭake hi pabhinnapaṭisambhido so āyasmā mahākaccāno “purisassa dīyate”ti āyādesarahitāniyeva rūpāni dasseti,
anya-e0803n:1493_6: “atthāyāti sampadānavacana”nti bhaṇantopi ca thero dānādikriyāpekkhaṃ akatvā catutthekavacanassa āyādesasahitaṃ rūpameva niddisi.
anya-e0803n:1493_8: Iti imehi kāraṇehi jānitabbaṃ “dānādikriyaṃ paṭicca āyādesavidhānaṃ na kata”nti.
anya-e0803n:1493_9: Yajjevaṃ “atthāya hitāyā”tiādīniyeva tadatthappayogāni “āya catutthekavacanassa tū”ti lakkhaṇassa visayā bhaveyyuṃ,
anya-e0803n:1494_0: Nanu ca bho evaṃ sante vuttikārakena mūlodāharaṇesu “atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussāna”nti vatvā “mūlāya paṭikasseyyā”tiādīnipi vattabbāni,
anya-e0803n:1494_1: kimudāharaṇe pana “vāti kimatthaṃ saggassa gamanena vā”ti vattabbanti? Saccaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1494_6: saggāyā”ti padāni suddhasampadānavacanāni na honti gatyatthakammani vattanato,
anya-e0803n:1494_8: Tathā “dakāya netī”ti ettha “dakāyā”ti padaṃ nayanatthakammani vattanato suddhasampadānavacanaṃ na hotīti na vuttaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1494_9: “Viramathāyasmanto mama vacanāyā”ti ettha pana “vacanāyā”ti padaṃ nissakkavacanatthe vattanato,
anya-e0803n:1494_11: “asakkatā casma dhanañcayāyā”ti ettha “dhanañcayāyā”ti padaṃ kattuvasena sāmiatthe vattanato suddhasampadānavacanaṃ na hotīti na vuttaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1494_12: Kimudāharaṇepi “saggassā”ti padaṃ gamanasaddasannidhānato gatyatthakammani vattanato suddhasampadānavacanaṃ
anya-e0803n:1494_13: na hotīti “vāti kimatthaṃ saggassa gamanena vā”ti na vuttaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1494_14: Evañhettha vuttanayena buddhavacanaṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathānayañca patvā catutthekavacanassa āyādesasahitāni
anya-e0803n:1494_16: na pana dānarocanādibhede yattha katthaci sampadānavisayeti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

anya-e0803n:1495_6: atha kasmā “buddhavacanaṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathānayañca patvā catutthekavacanassa āyādesasahitāni rūpāni gatyatthakammādīsu catūsuyeva ṭhānesu dissanti,
anya-e0803n:1495_7: na pana dānarocanādibhede yattha katthaci sampadānavisaye”ti vadathāti?
anya-e0803n:1495_9: na hi bhavaṃ amhākaṃ vacanatthaṃ jānāti.
anya-e0803n:1495_13: tasmā tāni ṭhapetvā pulliṅganapuṃsakaliṅgesu purisādi cittādisaddānaṃ akārantapakatibhāve ṭhitānaṃ catutthekavacanassa
anya-e0803n:1495_14: āyādesasahitāni rūpāni buddhavacanādīsu dānarocanādibhede yattha katthaci sampadānavisaye na dissanti.
anya-e0803n:1495_18: nibbānāyā”ti evamādīni pana anekasatāni tiliṅgapadāni tadattheyevāti imesu catūsu ṭhānesu dissanti. “Deti, rocati,

anya-e0803n:1525_0: Atha pubbācariyamataṃ purecaraṃ katvā ākārantapulliṅgānaṃ pakatirūpesu abhibhavitu iccetassa pakatirūpassa nāmikapadamālaṃ vakkhāma – satthā, satthā, satthāro.

anya-e0803n:1526_1: Ettha ca niruttipiṭake ca kaccāyane ca “satthunā”ti padaṃ anāgatampi gahetabbameva “dhammarājena satthunā”ti dassanato.
anya-e0803n:1526_6: byañjanavisesābhāvepi atthanānatthatāvasena saddantarasandassanaṃ niruttikkamoti “satthā”ti padaṃ ekavacanabahuvacanavasena
anya-e0803n:1526_18: Bhātaro atikkamatī”ti dassanato “satthāre”ti dutiyābahuvacanarūpaṃ ayuttaṃ viya dissati.

anya-e0803n:1526_22: Cūḷaniruttiyaṃ “bho sattha” iti rassavasena ālapanekavacanaṃ vatvā “bho satthā” iti dīghavasena ālapanabahuvacanaṃ lapitaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1526_23: Sabbametaṃ āgame upaparikkhitvā yathā na virujjhati,
anya-e0803n:1527_0: Idāni satthusaddassa yaṃ rūpantaraṃ amhehi diṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1527_2: tathā hi “imesaṃ mahānāma tiṇṇaṃ satthūnaṃ ekā niṭṭhā udāhu puthu niṭṭhā”ti pāḷiyaṃ “satthūna”nti padaṃ diṭṭhaṃ,

anya-e0803n:1537_0: Bodhetādī caññe saddā, ñeyyā hetusmiṃ atthasmiṃ.
anya-e0803n:1538_0: Kattā khattā nettā bhattā, pitā bhātātime pana;
anya-e0803n:1539_0: Kiñci bhijjanti suttasmiṃ, taṃ pabhedaṃ kathessahaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1541_0: Saheva niccaṃ vattanti, neva vattanti keci tu.
anya-e0803n:1542_0: Tatra kattusaddādayo rūpantaravasena satthusaddato kiñci bhijjanti.
anya-e0803n:1542_4: “Tena hi bho khatte yena campeyyakā brāhmaṇagahapatikā tenupasaṅkamā”ti ettha “khatte”ti idañcālapanekavacanarūpaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1542_6: “Nette ujuṃ gate satī”ti ettha “nette”ti idaṃ sattamiyā ekavacanarūpaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1542_9: pūjaṃ labhati bhattusū”ti ettha “bhattūsū”ti idaṃ sattamiyā bahuvacanarūpaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1542_12: “mātāpitūsu paṇḍitā”ti ettha “pitūsū”ti dassanato ca “vattūsu dhātūsu gantūsu netūsu dātūsu kattūsū”ti evamādinayopi gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n:1542_13: Ayaṃ nayo satthusaddepi icchitabbo viya amhe paṭibhāti.

anya-e0803n:1543_3: pitarebhi, pitūhi, pitūbhi. Pitu, pitussa, pituno, pitānaṃ,

anya-e0803n:1543_8: Tattha “matyā ca petyā ca kataṃ susādhu,
anya-e0803n:1543_10: mātāpitūnaṃ accayenā”ti ca dassanato pitusaddassa “petyā, pitūhi, pitūbhi.

anya-e0803n:1544_1: satthā pitā iccevamādīni nipphannattamupādāya ākārantānīti ca,
anya-e0803n:1544_2: paṭhamaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ pakatirūpamupādāya ukārantānīti ca tumhe bhaṇatha,
anya-e0803n:1544_5: Kattāraniddeso”tiādīsu pana satthāra iccādīni kathaṃ tumhe bhaṇathāti?
anya-e0803n:1544_7: Nanu ca bho etāni akārantānīti? Na,
anya-e0803n:1544_9: Nanu ca bho yo aṃ nādīni parabhūtāni vacanāni na dissanti yehi ukārantasaddānamantassa ārādeso siyā,
anya-e0803n:1544_11: īdise ṭhāne parabhūtānaṃ yo aṃ nādīnaṃ vacanānamanokāsattā.
anya-e0803n:1544_14: Evaṃ santepi bho “gāmato nikkhamatī”ti payogassa viya asamāsavisaye “satthārato satthāraṃ gacchatī”ti
anya-e0803n:1544_15: niddesapāḷidassanato “hetu satthāradassana”ntiādīsu satthāra iccādīni akārantānīti cintetabbānīti?
anya-e0803n:1544_16: Na cintetabbāni “satthārato satthāraṃ gacchatī”ti etthāpi ukārantattā.
anya-e0803n:1544_17: Ettha hi asamāsattepi topaccayaṃ paṭicca satthusaddassa ukāro ārādesaṃ labhati.
anya-e0803n:1544_18: Yāni pana tumhe ukārassa ārādesanimittāni yo aṃnādīni vacanāni icchatha,
anya-e0803n:1544_19: tāni īdise ṭhāne viññūnaṃ pamāṇaṃ na honti.
anya-e0803n:1544_21: Asamāsavisaye topaccayo ca samāsavisaye parapadāni ca parapadābhāve syādivibhattiyo cāti imāneva īdise ṭhāne ekantena pamāṇaṃ honti.
anya-e0803n:1544_23: ñattaṃ bālassa jāyatī”ti imissā pāḷiyā atthasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ “ayaṃ nimmātāpitaroti imasmiṃ pahaṭe daṇḍo
anya-e0803n:1544_24: natthī”ti ettha nimmātāpitaroti imassa samāsavisayattā simhi pare ukāro ārādesaṃ labhati,

anya-e0803n:1553_7: bhaṇḍamūlaṃ gahetvā vāṇijjāya desantaraṃ gato janasamūho.

anya-e0803n:1561_14: Aññesupi ṭhānesu yathārahaṃ iminā nayena sadisāsadisatā upaparikkhitabbā.

anya-e0803n:1594_2: ñāṇasaṅkhāto vedo assa atthīti vidvā, paṇḍito.

anya-e0803n:1600_9: “Socati puttehi puttimā”ti ettha hi bahuputto “puttimā”ti vuccati.
anya-e0803n:1600_14: pamāṇato cando āyāmavitthārato ubbedhato ca ekūnapaññāsayojano,
anya-e0803n:1600_15: parikkhepato tīhi yojanehi ūnadiyaḍḍhasatayojano”tiādīsu candavimānaṃ “cando”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1603_1: Iti “cando”ti ca “candimā”ti ca candadevaputtassapi candavimānassapi nāmanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1603_2: Tatra “pāpimā puttimā candimā”ti imāni pāpasaddādito “tadassatthi” iccetasmiṃ atthe pavattassa imantupaccayassa vasena siddhimupāgatānīti gahetabbāni.
anya-e0803n:1604_0: Nanu ca bho mantupaccayavaseneva sādhetabbānīti? Na,
anya-e0803n:1604_2: Nanu ca bho evaṃ santepi pāpa putta candato paṭhamaṃ ikārāgamaṃ katvā tato mantupaccayaṃ katvā sakkā sādhetunti?
anya-e0803n:1604_5: Tathā hi pāpa puttādito akārantato ikārāgamaṃ katvā mantupaccaye vidhiyamāne aññehi guṇayasādīhi akārantehi
anya-e0803n:1604_7: Na hi anekesu pāḷisatasahassesu katthacipi akārantato guṇa yasādito ikārāgamena saddhiṃ mantupaccayo dissati,
anya-e0803n:1604_8: aṭṭhānattā pana pāpa puttādito akārantato ikārāgamaṃ akatvā imantupaccaye kateyeva “pāpimā puttimā”tiādīni sijjhantīti.
anya-e0803n:1605_0: Evaṃ santepi bho kasmā kaccāyanappakaraṇe mantupaccayova vutto,
anya-e0803n:1605_7: guṇādito vantū”ti imāni cattāri suttāni sannihitatodantasaddabhāvena vatvā majjhe “satyādīhi mantū”ti
anya-e0803n:1605_8: aññathā suttaṃ vatvā tato sannihitatodantavasena “saddhādito ṇā”ti suttaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1605_9: tasmā tattha “satyādīhimantū”ti visadisaṃ katvā vuttassa suttassa vasena imantu paccayo ca vuttoti viññāyati.
anya-e0803n:1605_10: Pakati hesācariyānaṃ yena kenaci ākārena attano adhippāyaviññāpanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1605_11: Ettha ca dutiyo attho sarasandhivasena gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n:1605_14: Iti “seto dhāvatī”ti payoge viya “satyādīhi mantū”ti sutte bhinnasattisamavetavasena atthadvayapaṭipatti bhavati,
anya-e0803n:1605_15: tasmā paramasukhumasugambhīratthavatā anena suttena katthaci sati gati setu goiccādito mantupaccayo icchito.
anya-e0803n:1605_16: Katthaci sati pāpa puttaiccādito imantupaccayo icchitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1606_0: Yasmā pana satisaddo mantuvasena gatidhīsethugo iccādīhi,
anya-e0803n:1606_1: imantuvasena pāpaputtādīhi ca samānagatikattā tesaṃ pakārabhāvena gahito,
anya-e0803n:1606_2: tasmā evaṃ suttattho bhavati “satyādīhi mantu satippakārehi saddehi mantupaccayo hoti imantupaccayo ca yathārahaṃ ‘tadassatthi’ iccetasmiṃ atthe”ti.
anya-e0803n:1606_4: yathā “satimā”ti ettha satīti ikārantato mantupaccayo hoti,
anya-e0803n:1606_6: gomā”tiādīsu ikāranta īkāranta ukārantaniccokārantato mantupaccayo hoti.
anya-e0803n:1606_7: Yathā ca “satimā”ti ettha “satī”ti ikārantato imantupaccayo hoti,
anya-e0803n:1606_10: Evaṃ satippakārehi saddehi yathāsambhavaṃ mantu imantupaccayā hontīti.
anya-e0803n:1607_0: Yajjevaṃ paccayadvayavidhāyakaṃ “daṇḍādito ika ī”ti suttaṃ viya “satyādito imantu mantū”ti vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1607_3: Yadi hi “daṇḍādito ika ī”ti suttaṃ viya “satyādito imantu mantū”ti suttaṃ vuttaṃ siyā,
anya-e0803n:1607_4: ekakkhaṇeyeva imantu mantūnaṃ vacanena daṇḍasaddato sambhūtaṃ “daṇḍiko daṇḍī”ti rūpadvayamiva satigatiāditopi visadisarūpadvayamicchitabbaṃ siyā,
anya-e0803n:1607_7: Apica tathā vutte bavhakkharatāya ganthagarutā siyā.
anya-e0803n:1607_8: Yasmā ca suttena nāma appakkharena asandiddhena sāravantena gūḷhaninnayena sabbatomukhena anavajjena bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1607_9: Kaccāyane ca yebhuyyena tādisāni gambhīratthāni suvisadañāṇavisayabhūtāni suttāni dissanti “upājhadhikissaravacane,
anya-e0803n:1607_13: Evaṃ suttopadese akatepi imantunopi gahaṇatthaṃ bhinnasattisamavetavasena “satyādīhi mantū”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1608_1: “tapādito sī”tiādīsu todantasaddassa bahuvacanantatā na suṭṭhu pākaṭā topaccayassa ekatthabavhatthesu vattanato,
anya-e0803n:1608_2: “satyādīhi mantū”ti ettha pana hisaddassa bahuvacanatthatā atīva pākaṭā,
anya-e0803n:1608_3: tasmā bahuvacanaggahaṇena imantu paccayo hotītipi daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1608_4: Nanu ca bho vināpi imantupaccayena pāpamassatthīti pāpī,
anya-e0803n:1608_5: pāpī eva pāpimāti sakatthe māpaccaye kateyeva “pāpimā puttimā”tiādīni sijjhanti “chaṭṭhamo so parābhavo”ti
anya-e0803n:1608_15: Evaṃvidhāsu saddagatīsu “pāpī eva pāpimā”tiādikaṃ kataraṃ saddagatiṃ vadesi?
anya-e0803n:1608_16: “Satthā rājā brahmā sakhā attā sā pumā”tiādīsu ca kataraṃ saddagatiṃ vadesi?
anya-e0803n:1608_17: Katarasaddantogadhaṃ katarāya ca nāmikapadamālāyaṃ yojetabbaṃ maññasīti?
anya-e0803n:1608_18: So evaṃ puṭṭho addhā uttari kiñci adisvā tuṇhī bhavissati,
anya-e0803n:1608_20: Tādisasmiñhi naye “pāpimatā pāpimato”tiādīni rūpāni na sijjhanti,
anya-e0803n:1608_22: tasmā ayameva nayo pasatthataro āyasmantehi sammā citte ṭhapetabbo.
anya-e0803n:1614_0: Pāpimā, pāpimā, pāpimanto. Pāpimantaṃ. Sesaṃ neyyaṃ, esa nayo “khandhimā, puttimā”tiādīsupi.
anya-e0803n:1615_0: Idāni yathāpāvacanaṃ kiñcideva himavantu satimantādīnaṃ visesaṃ brūma.
anya-e0803n:1615_7: Iddhimassa ca parassa ca ekakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0803n:1615_14: tena catunnampi pañcannampi atirekasatānampīti dassitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0803n:1615_15: Bahavohi upādāya “uddiṭṭhā kho āyasmanto cattāro pārājikā dhammā”tiādikā pāḷiyo ṭhapitā.
anya-e0803n:1615_16: Tattha “āyasmantā”tidaṃ vinayavohāravasena dveyeva sandhāya vuttattā na sabbasādhāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1615_17: Vinayavohārañhi vajjetvā aññasmiṃ vohāre na pavattati.
