anya-e0803n:2080_0: Idāni bhūdhātumayānaṃ ukārantitthiliṅgānaṃ appasiddhattā aññena ukārantitthiliṅgena nāmikapadamālaṃ pūressāma –
anya-e0803n:2081_0: Yāgu, yāgū, yāguyo. Yāguṃ, yāgū, yāguyo. Yāguyā, yāgūhi, yāgūbhi. Yāguyā, yāgūnaṃ. Yāguyā, yāgūhi, yāgūbhi. Yāguyā, yāgūnaṃ. Yāguyā, yāguyaṃ, yāgūsu.
anya-e0803n:2082_0: Evaṃ “dhātu dhenu kāsu daddu kaṇḍu kacchu rajju”iccādīni.
anya-e0803n:2082_2: sabhāvavācako pana sugatādīnaṃ sārīrikavācako lokadhātuvācako ca cakkhādivācako ca itthiliṅgo,
anya-e0803n:2082_3: bhū hū karapacādisaddavācako itthiliṅgoceva pulliṅgo ca.
anya-e0803n:2085_0: Idāni bhūsaddādīnaṃ nāmikapadamālaṃ vakkhāma pubbācariyamataṃ purecaraṃ katvā –
anya-e0803n:2086_0: Jambū, jambū, jambuyo. Jambuṃ, jambū, jambuyo. Jambuyā, jambūhi, jambūbhi. Jambuyā, jambūnaṃ. Jambuyā, jambūhi, jambūbhi. Jambuyā, jambūnaṃ. Jambuyā, jambuyaṃ, jambūsu.
anya-e0803n:2087_0: Ettha jambūsaddassa itthiliṅgattaṃ “ambā sālā ca jambuyo”tiādinā pasiddhaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2087_1: “Ime te jambukā rukkhā”ti ettha pana rukkhasaddaṃ apekkhitvā “jambukā”ti pulliṅganiddeso katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2087_4: Atha vā itthiliṅgavasena jambū eva jambukā,
anya-e0803n:2087_5: jambukā ca tā rukkhā cāti jambukārukkhā,
anya-e0803n:2087_7: pulliṅgapakkhe vā samāsavasena “jambukarukkhā”ti vattabbe gāthāvisayattā chandānurakkhaṇatthaṃ dīghaṃ
anya-e0803n:2088_0: Bhū, bhū, bhuyo. Bhuṃ, bhū, bhuyo. Bhuyā, bhūhi, bhūbhi. Bhuyā, bhūnaṃ. Bhuyā, bhūhi, bhūbhi. Bhuyā, bhūnaṃ. Bhuyā, bhuyaṃ, bhūsu.
anya-e0803n:2089_0: Evaṃ “abhū, abhū, abhuyo. Abhuṃ, abhū, abhuyo.
anya-e0803n:2090_0: “Vadhū ca sarabhū ceva, sarabū sutanū camū;
anya-e0803n:2092_0: Idaṃ pana sukhumaṃ ṭhānaṃ suṭṭhu manasi kātabbaṃ. “Vadaññū, vadaññū,
anya-e0803n:2094_0: “Sohaṃ nūna ito gantvā, yoniṃ laddhāna mānusiṃ;
anya-e0803n:2096_1: evaṃ sante kasmā idha itthiliṅganayo dassitoti?
anya-e0803n:2098_0: Saṅghe dānāni dassāmi, appamattā punappuna”nti ca,
anya-e0803n:2099_0: “Kodhanā akataññū cā”ti ca itthiliṅgapayogikā bahū pāḷiyo dissanti, tasmā evaṃ nīti amhehi ṭhapitā.
anya-e0803n:2102_0: Okārantapadaṃ bhūdhātumayaṃ itthiliṅgamappasiddhaṃ, aññaṃ panokārantaṃ itthiliṅgaṃ pasiddhaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2105_1: Gāvu”ntiādinā nayena vuttāni pulliṅgassa gosaddassa rūpāni viya itthiliṅgassa gosaddassa rūpāni icchanti,
anya-e0803n:2105_2: tesaṃ mate majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇānaṃ vaṇṇavisesābhāvo viya rūpavisesābhāvato gosaddassa itthiliṅgabhāvapaṭipādanaṃ anijjhānakkhamaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2105_5: Mātugāma”ntiādinā nayena dve padamālā katvā ekā pulliṅgassa padamālā,
anya-e0803n:2105_6: ekā itthiliṅgapadamālāti vuttavacanaṃ viya idaṃ vacanaṃ amhe paṭibhāti,
anya-e0803n:2106_0: Apica itthiliṅgassa gosaddassa rūpesu pulliṅgassa gosaddassa rūpehi samesu santesu kathaṃ gosaddassa itthiliṅgabhāvo siyā?
anya-e0803n:2106_2: Yathā hi ratti aggi aṭṭhisaddānaṃ ikārantabhāvena samattepi itthiliṅgapumanapuṃsakaliṅgalakkhaṇabhūto rūpamālāviseso dissati.
anya-e0803n:2106_3: Yathā pana dvinnaṃ dhātusaddānaṃ pumitthiliṅgapariyāpannānaṃ rūpamālāviseso dissati,
anya-e0803n:2106_4: na tathā tehācariyehi abhimatassa itthiliṅgassa gosaddassa rūpamālāviseso dissati.
anya-e0803n:2106_5: Yathā pana dvinnaṃ dhātusaddānaṃ pumitthiliṅgapariyāpannānaṃ rūpamālāviseso bhavati,
anya-e0803n:2106_6: yathā dvinnaṃ gosaddānaṃ pumitthiliṅgapariyāpannānaṃ rūpamālāvisesena bhavitabbaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2106_7: yathā ca dvinnaṃ āyusaddānaṃ punnapuṃsakaliṅgapariyāpannānaṃ rūpamālāviseso dissati,
anya-e0803n:2106_8: tathā dvinnaṃ gosaddānaṃ pumitthiliṅgapariyāpannānaṃ rūpamālāvisesena bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2106_9: Avisesatte sati kathaṃ tesaṃ pumitthiliṅgavavatthānaṃ siyā,
anya-e0803n:2106_11: Idaṃ ṭhānaṃ atīva saṇhasukhumaṃ paramagambhīraṃ mahāgahanaṃ na sakkā sabbasattānaṃ mūlabhāsābhūtāya sabbaññujineritāya
anya-e0803n:2106_12: māgadhikāya sabhāvaniruttiyā nayaṃ sammā ajānantena akatañāṇasambhārena kenaci ajjhogāhetuṃ vā vijaṭetuṃ vā,
anya-e0803n:2106_13: amhākaṃ pana mate dvinnaṃ gosaddānaṃ rūpamālāviseso ceva dissati,
anya-e0803n:2107_0: Idāni imassatthassa āvibhāvatthaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne imaṃ nītiṃ ṭhapessāma.
anya-e0803n:2107_1: Evañhi sati pariyattisāsane paṭipannakā nikkaṅkhabhāvena na kilamissanti.
anya-e0803n:2107_2: Ettha tāva atthaggahaṇe viññūnaṃ kosalluppādanatthaṃ tisso nāmikapadamālāyo kathessāma –
anya-e0803n:2108_0: Gāvī, gāvī, gāviyo. Gāviṃ, gāvī, gāviyo. Gāviyā, gāvīhi, gāvībhi. Gāviyā, gāvīnaṃ. Gāviyā, gāvīhi, gāvībhi. Gāviyā, gāvīnaṃ. Gāviyā, gāviyaṃ, gāvīsu.
anya-e0803n:2109_0: Ayaṃ gosaddato vihitassa īpaccayassa vasena nipphannassa itthivācakassa īkārantitthiliṅgassa gāvīsaddassa nāmikapadamālā.
anya-e0803n:2110_0: Go, gāvo, gavo. Gāvuṃ, gāvaṃ, gavaṃ, gāvo, gavo. Gāvena, gavena, gohi, gobhi. Gāvassa, gavassa, gavaṃ, gunnaṃ, gonaṃ. Gāvā, gāvasmā, gāvamhā, gavā, gavasmā, gavamhā, gohi, gobhi. Gāvassa, gavassa, gavaṃ, gunnaṃ, gonaṃ. Gāve, gāvasmiṃ, gāvamhi, gave, gavasmiṃ, gavamhi, gāvesu, gavesu, gosu. Bho go,
anya-e0803n:2112_0: Go, gāvī, gāvo, gāvī, gavo. Gāvaṃ, gavaṃ, gāviṃ, gāvo,
anya-e0803n:2112_1: gāvī gavo. Gohi, gobhi. Gavaṃ, gunnaṃ, gonaṃ. Gohi, gobhi. Gavaṃ, gunnaṃ, gonaṃ. Gosu. Bhoti go,
anya-e0803n:2113_0: Ettha pana “gāvu”nti padaṃ ekantapumavācakattā na vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2113_1: ekantapumavācakattañcassa āhaccapāḷiyā ñāyati “idha pana bhikkhave vassūpagataṃ bhikkhuṃ itthī nimantesi ‘ehi bhante,
anya-e0803n:2113_12: aññaṃ vā te bhariyaṃ ānemī’ti” evaṃ āhaccapāḷiyā ñāyati.
anya-e0803n:2114_2: yaṃ pana imissaṃ okārantitthiliṅgapadamālāyaṃ “gāvī”ti padaṃ catukkhattuṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2114_3: taṃ “kaññā”ti padaṃ viya itthiliṅgassa avisadākāravohāratāviññāpane samatthaṃ hoti.
anya-e0803n:2114_4: Na hi itaresu liṅgesu samānasutikabhāvena catukkhattuṃ āgatapadaṃ ekampi atthi,
anya-e0803n:2114_5: “gāvī gāvi”nti ca imesaṃ saddānaṃ katthaci ṭhāne itthipumesu sāmaññavasena pavattiṃ upari kathayissāma.
anya-e0803n:2114_6: Yā panamhehi okārantitthiliṅgassa “go, gāvī, gāvo, gāvī, gavo. Gāvaṃ, gavaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2114_8: tattha gosaddato siyonaṃ īkārādeso aṃvacanassa ca iṃkārādeso bhavati,
anya-e0803n:2114_9: tena okārantitthiliṅgassa “gāvī gāvī gāvi”nti rūpāni dassitāni.
anya-e0803n:2114_10: Tathā hi mukhamattadīpaniyaṃ saddasatthavidunā vajirabuddhācariyena niruttinaye kosallavasena gosaddato yonamīkārādeso vutto.
anya-e0803n:2114_12: tathā sissīkārādeso aṃvacanassa ca iṃkārādeso bhavati.
anya-e0803n:2122_0: Tathā hi samantapāsādikādīsu aṭṭhakathāsu “cheko hi gopālako sakkharāyo ucchaṅgena gahetvā rajjudaṇḍahattho
anya-e0803n:2122_1: pātova vajaṃ gantvā gāvo piṭṭhiyaṃ paharitvā palighathambhamatthake nisinno dvāraṃ pattaṃ pattaṃ gāviṃ
anya-e0803n:2122_2: ‘eko dve’ti sakkharaṃ khipitvā gaṇetī”ti imasmiṃ padese “gāvo”ti vatvā “gāvi”nti vacanena itthipumavācakassa
anya-e0803n:2122_4: “Gāvo”ti hi iminā sāmaññato itthipumabhūtā goṇā gahitā,
anya-e0803n:2122_5: tathā “gāvi”nti imināpi itthibhūto pumabhūto ca goṇo.
anya-e0803n:2122_6: Evaṃ “gāvo”ti ca “gāvi”nti ca ime saddā saddasatthavidūhi aṭṭhakathācariyehi niruttinayakusalatāya samānaliṅgavasena
anya-e0803n:2122_8: Yadi hi itthiliṅge vattamānassa itthipumavācakassa okārantitthiliṅgassa gosaddassa padamālāyaṃ “gāvī gāvi”miccetāni rūpāni na labbheyyuṃ,
anya-e0803n:2122_11: Yathā ca pana aṭṭhakathācariyehi “gāvo”ti itthipumavasena sabbesaṃ gunnaṃ saṅgāhakavacanaṃ vatvā teyeva
anya-e0803n:2122_12: gāvo sandhāya puna “dvāraṃ pattaṃ pattaṃ gāvi”nti saddaracanaṃ kubbiṃsu,
anya-e0803n:2122_14: Asabbasaṅgāhakavacanaṃ idaṃ gāvīsaddena itthiyāyeva gahetabbattāti ce? Na,
anya-e0803n:2122_20: Apica “gāvimpi disvā palāyanti ‘bhikkhū’ti maññamānā”ti pāḷi dissati,
anya-e0803n:2122_21: etthāpi “gāvi”nti vacanena itthibhūto pumabhūto ca sabbo go gahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2122_23: Iti pāḷinayena itthiliṅge vattamānamhā itthipumavācakasmā gosaddato aṃvacanassa iṃkārādeso hotīti viññāyati.
anya-e0803n:2123_0: Vajirabuddhācariyenapi gosaddato īpaccaye kātabbepi akatvā yonamīkārādeso kato.
anya-e0803n:2123_1: Tassādhippāyo evaṃ siyā gosaddato īpaccaye kate sati īpaccayavasena “gāvī”ti nipphannasaddo yattha katthaci
anya-e0803n:2123_2: visaye “migī morī kukkuṭī”iccādayo viya itthivācakoyeva siyā,
anya-e0803n:2123_5: Iti vajirabuddhācariyamate gosaddato yonaṃ īkārādeso hotīti ñāyati.
anya-e0803n:2124_1: yasmā aṭṭhakathācariyehi “gāvo piṭṭhiyaṃ paharitvā”tiādinā nayena racitāya “dvāraṃ pattaṃ pattaṃ gāviṃ
anya-e0803n:2124_2: ‘eko dve’ti sakkharaṃ khipitvā gaṇetī”ti vacanapariyosānāya saddaracanāyaṃ “eko gāvī,
anya-e0803n:2124_5: Iti aṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ mate gosaddato siyonamīkārādeso aṃvacanassa iṃkārādeso hotīti ñāyati.
anya-e0803n:2124_6: Tasmāyevamhehi yā sā okārantatāpakatikassa itthiliṅgassa gosaddassa “go, gāvī, gāvo, gāvī, gavo, gāvaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2124_8: sā pāḷinayānukūlā aṭṭhakathānayānukūlā kaccāyanācariyamataṃ gahetvā padanipphattijanakassa garuno ca matānukūlā,
anya-e0803n:2124_9: “gāvī”ti padassa catukkhattuṃ āgatattā pana okārantitthiliṅgassa gosaddassa avisadākāravohārattañca sādheti.
anya-e0803n:2124_10: Iccesā pāḷinayādīsu ñāṇena sammā upaparikkhiyamānesu atīva yujjati,
anya-e0803n:2124_13: “gāviyā”ti padañca karaṇanissakkānaṃ bahuvacanaṭṭhāne “gāvīhi gāvībhī”ti padāni ca sampadānasāmīnaṃ bahuvacanaṭṭhāne
anya-e0803n:2124_15: gāvīsū”ti padāni cāti imāni vitthārato soḷasa padāni ekantena īpaccayavasena siddhattā ekantitthivācakattā ca na vuttānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2125_0: Ayaṃ panettha nicchayo vuccate sotūnaṃ nikkaṅkhabhāvāya –
anya-e0803n:2125_1: itthiliṅgapadesu hi “gāvī gāvi”nti imāni īpaccayavasena vā īkāriṃkārādesavasena vā sijjhanti.
anya-e0803n:2125_4: Tathā “gāvī gāvi”nti imāni īpaccayavasenapi siddhattā yebhuyyena itthivācakāni bhavanti īkāriṃkārādesavasenapi siddhattā.
anya-e0803n:2125_7: pubbanayo aññattha. “Gāviyo. Gāviyā, gāvīhi, gāvībhi. Gāvīnaṃ. Gāviyaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2125_8: gāvīsū”ti etāni pana īpaccayavaseneva siddhattā sabbathāpi itthīnaṃyeva vācakāni bhavanti.
anya-e0803n:2125_9: Itthibhūtesveva godabbesu lokasaṅketavasena visesato pavattattā ekantato itthidabbesu pavattāni “migī morī kukkuṭī”iccādīni padāni viya.
anya-e0803n:2125_10: Kiñcāpi pana “nadī mahī”iccādīnipi itthiliṅgāni īpaccayavaseneva siddhāni,
anya-e0803n:2125_11: tathāpi tāni aviññāṇakattā tadatthānaṃ itthidabbesu vattantīti vattuṃ na yujjati.
anya-e0803n:2125_13: Yasmā pana itthiliṅge gosadde enayogo esukāro ca na labbhati,
anya-e0803n:2125_14: tasmā “gāvena gavena gāvesu gavesū”ti padāni na vuttāni.
anya-e0803n:2125_15: Yasmā ca itthiliṅgena gosaddena saddhiṃ sasmāsmiṃvacanāni sarūpato parattaṃ na yanti,
anya-e0803n:2125_16: tasmā “gāvassa gavassa gāvasmā gavasmā gāvasmiṃ gavasmi”nti padāni na vuttāni.
anya-e0803n:2125_17: Yasmā ca tattha smāvacanassa ādesabhūto ākāro ca mhākāro ca na labbhati,
anya-e0803n:2125_18: tasmā “gāvā gavā gāvamhā gavamhā”ti padāni na vuttāni.
anya-e0803n:2125_19: Yasmā ca smiṃvacanassa ādesabhūto ekāro ca mhikāro ca na labbhati,
anya-e0803n:2125_20: tasmā “gāve gave gāvamhi gavamhī”ti padāni na vuttāni.
anya-e0803n:2125_21: Apica “yāya tāyā”tiādīhi samānādhikaraṇapadehi yojetuṃ ayuttattāpi “gāvena gavenā”tiādīni itthiliṅgaṭṭhāne na vuttāni.
anya-e0803n:2125_22: Tathā hi “yāya tāya”iccādīhi saddhiṃ “gāvena gavenā”tiādīni na yojetabbāni ekantapulliṅgarūpattā.
anya-e0803n:2126_1: yā tumhehi okārantatāpakatikassa itthiliṅgassa gosaddassa “go, gāvī, gāvo, gāvī,
anya-e0803n:2126_3: sā “mātugāmo itthī mātugāmā itthiyo”ti vuttasadisā ca hotīti? Tanna.
anya-e0803n:2126_6: imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne go gāvīsaddā ekaliṅgā itthi liṅgabhāvena,
anya-e0803n:2126_8: Yajjevaṃ goṇasaddassa gosaddassādesavasena kaccāyanena vuttattā tadādesattaṃ ekadhātukattañcāgamma tenāpi saddhiṃ missetvā padamālā vattabbāti? Na,
anya-e0803n:2126_10: Tathā hi so visuṃ pulliṅgaṭṭhāne uddiṭṭho.
anya-e0803n:2126_12: gavo”tiādikā padamālā okārīkārantapadāni missetvā katāti na sallakkhetabbā,
anya-e0803n:2126_13: atha kho vikappena gosaddato paresaṃ si yo aṃvacanānaṃ īkāriṃkārādesavasena vuttapadavantattā okārantitthiliṅgapadamālā icceva sārato paccetabbā.
anya-e0803n:2127_0: Idāni gosaddassa itthiliṅgabhāvasādhakāni suttapadāni lokikappayogāni ca kathayāma –
anya-e0803n:2127_1: “seyyathāpi bhikkhave vassānaṃ pacchime māse saradasamaye kiṭṭhasambādhe gopālako gāvo rakkheyya,
anya-e0803n:2127_2: tā gāvo tato tato daṇḍena ākoṭeyya.
anya-e0803n:2128_0: Annadā baladā cetā, vaṇṇadā sukhadā ca tā;
anya-e0803n:2129_0: Etamatthaṃ vasaṃ ñatvā, nāssu gāvo haniṃsu te.
anya-e0803n:2130_1: Gamissanti bhante gāvo vacchagiddhiniyo”ti imāni suttapadāni.
anya-e0803n:2130_3: Iti gosaddassa itthiliṅgabhāvopi pulliṅgabhāvo viya sārato paccetabbo.
anya-e0803n:2131_2: tathāpi yathāpayogaṃ “pajā devatā”tipadāni viya itthipurisavācakāneva bhavanti,
anya-e0803n:2131_3: tasmā itthiliṅgavasena “sā go”ti vā “tā gāvo”ti vā vutte itthipumabhūtā sabbepi goṇā gahitāti veditabbā.
anya-e0803n:2131_4: Na hi īdise ṭhāne ekantato liṅgaṃ padhānaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2131_6: “Vajegāvo duhantī”ti vutte kiñcāpi “gāvo”ti ayaṃ saddo pumepi vattati,
anya-e0803n:2131_7: tathāpi duhanakriyāya pume asambhavato atthavasena itthiyo ñāyante.
anya-e0803n:2131_8: “Gāvī duhantī”ti vutte pana liṅgavasena atthavasena ca vacanato ko saṃsayamāpajjissati viññū.
anya-e0803n:2131_9: “Tā gāvo carantī”ti vutte itthiliṅgavasena vacanato kadāci kassaci saṃsayo siyā “nanu itthiyo”ti,
anya-e0803n:2131_10: pulliṅgavasena pana “te gāvo carantī”ti vutte saṃsayo natthi,
anya-e0803n:2131_11: itthiyo ca pumāno ca ñāyante pulliṅgabahuvacanena katthaci itthipumassa gahitattā.
anya-e0803n:2131_12: “Athettha sīhā byagghā cā”tiādīsu viya “gāvī caratī”ti ca “gāviṃ passatī”ti ca vutte itthī viññāyate gāvīsaddena itthiyā gahetabbattā.
anya-e0803n:2131_13: Lokikappayogesu hi sāsanikappayogesu ca gāvīsaddena itthī gayhati.
anya-e0803n:2131_16: Tathā hi “seyyathāpi bhikkhave dakkho goghātako vā goghātakantevāsī vā gāviṃ vadhitvā catumahāpathe bilaso vibhajitvā nisinno assā”ti pāḷi dissati.
anya-e0803n:2131_17: Aṭṭhakathāsu ca “gāvo”ti itthipumasādhāraṇaṃ saddaracanaṃ katvā puna tadeva itthipumaṃ sandhāya “dvāraṃ
anya-e0803n:2131_18: pattaṃ pattaṃ gāvi”nti racitā saddaracanā dissati.
anya-e0803n:2132_0: Ettha hi gojātiyaṃ ṭhitā itthīpi pumāpi “gāvī”ti saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0803n:2132_2: Tathā hi tattha tattha pāḷippadesādīsu “acirapakkantassa bhagavato bāhiyaṃ dārucīriyaṃ gāvī taruṇavacchā adhipatitvā jīvitā voropesī”ti,
anya-e0803n:2132_4: gāviṃ vā te demī”ti ca “tiṇasīho kapotavaṇṇagāvīsadiso”ti ca payogadassanato itthī kathiyatīti vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2132_7: Gokhīraṃ godhano gorūpāni cā”ti dassanato itthīpi pumāpi kathiyatīti vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2133_0: Idāni okārantassa itthiliṅgassa gosaddassa padamālāyaṃ pāḷinayādinissito atthayuttinayo vuccate viññūnaṃ kosallajananatthaṃ –
anya-e0803n:2134_1: sā gāvī gacchati, tā gāvo, gāvī,
anya-e0803n:2136_1: sā gāvī nadiṃ tarantī gacchati, tā gāvo, gāvī,
anya-e0803n:2136_4: gavaṃ nadiṃ tarantiṃ passati, tā gāvo, gāvī,
anya-e0803n:2137_0: Tatra yā sā “go, gāvī, gāvo, gāvī,
anya-e0803n:2137_1: gavo”tiādinā okārantassitthiliṅgassa gosaddassa padamālā ṭhapitā, sā “go,
anya-e0803n:2137_2: gāvo gavo”tiādinā vuttassa okārantapulliṅgassa gosaddassa padamālāto savisesā paccattopayogālapanaṭṭhāne
anya-e0803n:2137_5: tasmā imassa okārantitthiliṅgassa gosaddassa aññesamitthiliṅgānaṃ viya avisadākāravohāratā sallakkhetabbā,
anya-e0803n:2140_0: Tathā hi pumitthiliṅgavasena dvinnaṃ dhātusaddānaṃ viseso dissati. Taṃ yathā?
anya-e0803n:2141_0: Dhātu, dhātū, dhātavo. Dhātuṃ, dhātū, dhātavo. Dhātunā, dhātūhi, dhātūbhi. Dhātussa, dhātūnaṃ. Dhātusmā, dhātumhā, dhātūhi, dhātūbhi. Dhātussa, dhātūnaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2142_0: Dhātu, dhātū, dhātuyo. Dhātuṃ, dhātū, dhātuyo. Dhātuyā, dhātūhi, dhātūbhi. Dhātuyā, dhātūnaṃ. Dhātuyā, dhātūhi, dhātūbhi. Dhātuyā, dhātūnaṃ. Dhātuyā, dhātuyaṃ, dhātūsu.
anya-e0803n:2143_0: Yathā ca dvinnaṃ dhātusaddānaṃ viseso paññāyati,
anya-e0803n:2143_2: Yathā ca punnapuṃsakaliṅgānaṃ dvinnaṃ āyusaddānaṃ “āyu, āyū,
anya-e0803n:2144_0: Idāni imamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ katvā saṅkhepato kathayāma –
anya-e0803n:2144_34: Napuṃsakaliṅgassa pana “rūpaṃ, rūpāni, rūpā. Rūpaṃ, rūpāni, rūpe. Bho rūpa,
anya-e0803n:2144_36: rūpā”ti evaṃ tīsu paccattopayogālapanaṭṭhānesu sanikārāya visesāya rūpamālāya vasena ubhayamuttākāravohāratā dissati,
anya-e0803n:2144_37: pumitthiliṅgānaṃ tīsu ṭhānesu sanikārāni rūpāni sabbadā na santi,
anya-e0803n:2145_5: Yā ca pana itthiliṅgassa avisadākāravohāratā vuttā,
anya-e0803n:2145_7: Tathā hi vīsatiādayo navutipariyantā saddā ekavacanantā itthiliṅgāti vuttā,
anya-e0803n:2145_10: evaṃ vīsatiādīnaṃ kaññāsaddasseva avisadākāravohāratā labbhatīti avagantabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2145_13: cattāro caturo catasso cattārī”ti attano attano rūpāni abhidheyyaliṅgānugabhattā yathāsakaliṅgavasena
anya-e0803n:2146_0: Sabbanāmesupi ayaṃ tividho ākāro labbhati rūpavisesayogato. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0803n:2146_1: Punnapuṃsakavisaye “tassa kassa” iccādīni sabbāni sabbanāmikarūpāni catutthīchaṭṭhiyantāni bhavanti,
anya-e0803n:2146_3: tasmā sabbanāmattepi itthiliṅgassa avisadākāravohāratā ekantato sampaṭicchitabbā.
anya-e0803n:2146_4: Ettha pana sulabhāni catutthīchaṭṭhīrūpāni anāharitvā sudullabhabhāvena tatiyāpañcamīsattamīrūpāni sāsanato
anya-e0803n:2146_5: āharitvā dassessāma bhagavato pāvacane nikkaṅkhabhāvena sotūnaṃ paramasaṇhasukhumañāṇādhigamatthaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2146_8: upasaṅkamitvā tassā kumārikāya saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho paṭicchanne āsane alaṃkammanīye nisajjaṃ kappesī”ti.
anya-e0803n:2146_10: “tassā”ti tatiyāya rūpe diṭṭheyeva “sabbassā katarissā”tiādīni tatiyārūpāni pāḷiyaṃ anāgatānipidiṭṭhāniyeva nāma tesaṃ aññamaññasamānagatikattā,
anya-e0803n:2146_13: “kassā”ti pañcamiyā rūpe diṭṭheyeva “sabbassā katarissā”tiādīni pañcamiyā rūpāni pāḷiyaṃ anāgatānipi diṭṭhāniyeva nāma.
anya-e0803n:2146_14: “Aññataro bhikkhu vesāliyaṃ mahāvane makkaṭiṃ āmisena upalāpetvā tassā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati.
anya-e0803n:2146_15: Aññataro bhikkhu aññatarissā itthiyā paṭibaddhacitto hotī”ti ca ettha “tassā aññatarissā”ti ca sattamiyā rūpaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2146_16: tasmiṃ diṭṭheyeva “sabbassā katarissā”tiādīni sattamiyā rūpāni pāḷiyaṃ anāgatānipi diṭṭhāniyeva nāmāti.
anya-e0803n:2147_0: Nanu ca bho “tassā kumārikāya saddhi”nti ettha “tassā”ti idaṃ vibhattivipallāsena vuttaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2147_2: tathā “kassāhaṃ kena hāyāmī”ti idampi vibhattivipallāsena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2147_4: “Aññatarissā itthiyā paṭibaddhacitto”ti etthāpi “aññatarissā”ti idaṃ vibhattivipallāsena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2147_7: Nanu ca bho cuṇṇiyapadavisayepi “saṅghe gotami dehī”tiādīsu “saṅghassā”ti vibhattivipallāsatthaṃ vadanti garūti? Saccaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2147_8: tathāpi tādisesu ṭhānesu dve adhippāyā bhavanti ādhārapaṭiggāhakabhāvena bhummasampadānānamicchitabbattā.
anya-e0803n:2147_9: Tathā hi “saṅghassa dethā”ti vattukāmassa sato “saṅghe dethā”ti vacanaṃ na virujjhati,
anya-e0803n:2147_11: Tathā “saṅghe dethā”ti vattukāmassapi sato “saṅghassa dethā”ti vacanampi na virujjhati,
anya-e0803n:2147_13: yathā pana alābu lābusaddesu visuṃ visuṃ vijjamānesupi “lābūni sīdanti silā plavantī”ti ettha chandānurakkhaṇatthaṃ
anya-e0803n:2147_15: Tathā “saṅghe gotami dehī”tiādīsupi buddhiyā vibhattivipallāsassa parikappanaṃ katvā “saṅghassā”ti vipallāsatthamicchanti ācariyā.
anya-e0803n:2147_17: Vessantare varaṃ datvā”tiādīsu vibhattivipallāso yutto “tassā kumārikāyā”tiādīsu pana na yutto,
anya-e0803n:2147_18: vibhattivipallāso ca nāma yebhuyyena “neva dānaṃ viramissa”ntiādīsu gāthāsu icchitabbo.
anya-e0803n:2148_0: Tathāpi vadeyya yā sā tumhehi “tassā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevatī”ti pāḷi ābhatā,
anya-e0803n:2148_2: “Tassā”ti hi idaṃ chaṭṭhiyantapadaṃ “tassāmakkaṭiyāaṅgajāte methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevatī”ti atthasambhavatoti? Tanna,
anya-e0803n:2148_5: aṭṭhakathāyaṃyeva “tassā ca sikkhāya sikkhaṃ paripūrento sikkhati,
anya-e0803n:2148_6: tasmiñca sikkhāpade avītikkamanto sikkhatī”ti imasmiṃ padese “tassā”ti bhummavacanaṃ niddeso katoti.
anya-e0803n:2148_7: Nanu ca bho tatthāpi “tassā”ti idaṃ vibhattivipallāsavasena bhummatthe sāmivacananti?
anya-e0803n:2148_16: attano gāhaṃ amuñcantoyeva saññattiṃ na gamissati,
anya-e0803n:2148_18: “Tasmā hi sikkhetha idheva jantū”ti imissā pāḷiyā atthaṃ niddisantena pabhinnapaṭisambhidena satthukappena
anya-e0803n:2148_19: aggasāvakena dhammasenāpatinā āyasmatā sāriputtena “idhāti imissā diṭṭhiyā imissā khantiyā imissā ruciyā
anya-e0803n:2148_20: imasmiṃ ādāye imasmiṃ dhamme”ti evaṃ “imissā”ti padaṃ bhummavacanavasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2148_21: Tañhi “idhā”ti padassa atthavācakattā sattamiyā rūpanti viññāyati.
anya-e0803n:2148_22: Iti “imissā”ti sattamiyā rūpe diṭṭheyeva “sabbassā katarissā”tiādīni sattamiyā rūpāni pāḷiyaṃ anāgatānipi diṭṭhāniyeva nāma.
anya-e0803n:2149_0: Aparampi te sabbalokānukampakena sabbaññunā āhaccabhāsitaṃ pāḷiṃ āharissāma,
anya-e0803n:2149_3: yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā apubbaṃ acarimaṃ dve arahanto sammāsambuddhā uppajjeyyu”nti ettha “ekissā”ti idaṃ sattamiyā rūpaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2149_4: Evaṃ “ekissā”ti sattamiyā rūpe diṭṭheyeva “sabbassā katarissā”tiādīni sattamiyā rūpāni pāḷiyaṃ anāgatānipi diṭṭhāniyeva nāma.
anya-e0803n:2149_5: Na hi sabbathāpi vohārā sarūpato pāḷiādīsu dissanti,
anya-e0803n:2154_9: Dullabhāyaṃ nīti sādhukaṃ cittiṃ katvā pariyāpuṇitabbā sāsanassa ciraṭṭhitatthaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2154_10: Evaṃ sabbathāpi pāḷiaṭṭhakathānayānusārena itthiliṅgassa avisadākāravohāratā ñātabbā.
anya-e0803n:2155_0: Evaṃ pana ñatvā viññujātinā “dvinnaṃ gosaddānaṃ rūpamālāvisesena liṅganānattaṃ hotī”ti niṭṭhametthāvagantabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2155_1: Gosaddo hi “puriso mātugāmo orodho āpo satthā”tiādayo viya na niyogā visadākāravohāro,
anya-e0803n:2155_2: nāpi “kaññā ratti itthī”tiādayo viya niyogā avisadākāravohāro.
anya-e0803n:2155_3: Tathā hi ayaṃ pulliṅgabhāve dhātusaddo viya visadākāravohāro,
anya-e0803n:2155_5: Iti imassa atthassa sotūnaṃ ñāpanena paramasaṇhasukhumañāṇappaṭilābhattaṃ “go,
anya-e0803n:2155_7: gavo”tiādinā okārantassa itthiliṅgassa gosaddassa āveṇikā nāmikapadamālā vuttā.
anya-e0803n:2155_12: evamettha pañcakkhattuṃ āgatapadānaṃ vasena avisadākāro dissatīti idaṃ itthiliṅganti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2155_13: Imañhi nayaṃ muñcitvā natthi añño nayo yena gosaddo itthiliṅgo siyā.
anya-e0803n:2155_14: Tasmā idameva amhākaṃ mataṃ sārato paccetabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2155_15: Pumitthiliṅgasaṅkhātānaṃ dvinnaṃ gosaddānaṃ rūpamālāya nibbisesataṃ vadantānaṃ pana ācariyānaṃ mataṃ
anya-e0803n:2155_16: pulliṅge vattamānena gosaddeni’tthiliṅge vattamānassa gosaddassa rūpamālāya sadisatte sati mātugāmasaddassa
anya-e0803n:2155_17: nāmikapadamālāyo samaṃ yojetvā pumitthiliṅgabhāvaparikappanaṃ viya hotīti na sārato paccetabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2156_1: heṭṭhā niddiṭṭhassa okārantapulliṅgassa gosaddassa nāmikapadamālāyaṃ “gāvuṃ gāvaṃ gāvenā”tiādīni ekakkhattumāgatāni,
anya-e0803n:2156_3: “gāvo gavo gava”nti imāni pana “satthā rājā”tiādīni viya tikkhattuṃ,
anya-e0803n:2156_4: catukkhattuṃ vā panettha pañcakkhattuṃ vā āgatapadāni na santi.
anya-e0803n:2156_20: Iminā nayena sabbāsupi pumitthiliṅgapadamālāsu visadākāro ca avisadākāro ca veditabbo.
anya-e0803n:2156_26: Kiñcāpettha catukkhattuṃ pañcakkhattuṃ vā āgatapadānaṃ abhāvato visadākāro upalabbhamāno viya dissati,
anya-e0803n:2156_27: tathāpi yasmā “cittaṃ aṭṭhi āyū”tiādīni napuṃsakāni “gacchaṃ aggi bhikkhū”tiādīnaṃ pulliṅgānaṃ nayena appavattanato visadākārañca,
anya-e0803n:2156_28: “ratti yāgū”tiādīnaṃ itthiliṅgānaṃ nayena appavattanato avisadākārañca ubhayamanupagamma visesato “cittaṃ, cittāni, cittā. Cittaṃ, cittāni,
anya-e0803n:2157_2: Sabbasattānaṃ pana mūlabhāsābhūtāya jineritāya māgadhikāya sabhāvaniruttiyā labbhati.
anya-e0803n:2158_0: Kiṃ panetaṃ liṅgaṃ nāma? Keci tāva vadanti –
anya-e0803n:2159_0: “Thanakesavatī itthī, massuvā puriso siyā. Ubhinnamantaraṃ etaṃ, itaro’bhayamuttako’ti
anya-e0803n:2161_4: Sabbaliṅgikopi saddo hoti taṭaṃ taṭī taṭoti.
anya-e0803n:2161_5: Yadi ca paramatthato liṅgaṃ nāma siyā,
anya-e0803n:2161_6: kathaṃ aññamaññaviruddhānaṃ tesaṃ ekattha samāveso bhavati,
anya-e0803n:2161_7: tasmā yassa kassaci atthassa avisadākāravohāro itthiliṅgaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2162_3: “kaññāyo purisā cittānī”ti ca evamādikassa ekekapadassa avisadākāravohārāditā na dissati.
anya-e0803n:2162_4: Yasmā pana pabandhavasena visadākāravohārādibhāve siddheyeva samudāyāvayavattā ekekapadassapi avisadākāravohārāditā sijjhateva.
anya-e0803n:2163_0: Keci pana nāmikapadamālāsaṅkhātaṃ pabandhaṃ aparāmasitvā ekekapadavaseneva avisadākāravohārādikaṃ icchanti,
anya-e0803n:2163_2: evaṃ sante ‘kaññā purisā satthā guṇavā rājā’tiādīnaṃ padānaṃ ākārasutivasena,
anya-e0803n:2163_4: ‘cittaṃ purisaṃ kañña’ntiādīnaṃ anusārasutivasena aññamaññaṃ samānasutisambhavā kathaṃ avisadākāravohārāditā siyā”ti?
anya-e0803n:2163_8: dujjānatarampi nibbānaṃ kathanasamatthaṃ puggalaṃ nissāya jānanti,
anya-e0803n:2163_10: Evañca pana vatvā tato uttari te pañhaṃ pucchitabbā “bodhisaddo āyusaddo ca kataraliṅgo”ti.
anya-e0803n:2163_11: Te jānantā evaṃ vakkhanti “bodhisaddo itthiliṅgo ceva pulliṅgo ca,
anya-e0803n:2163_12: āyusaddo ca pana napuṃsakaliṅgo ca pulliṅgo cāti dviliṅgā ete saddā”ti.
anya-e0803n:2163_13: Te vattabbā “yadi bodhisaddo ca āyusaddo ca dviliṅgā ete saddā,
anya-e0803n:2163_14: evaṃ sante dvinnaṃ bodhisaddānaṃ ekapadabhāvena vavatthitānaṃ accantasamānasutikānaṃ kathaṃ avisadākāravohāratā ca visadākāravohāratā ca siyā,
anya-e0803n:2163_15: kathañca pana dvinnaṃ āyusaddānaṃ ekapadabhāvena vavatthitānaṃ accantasamānasutikānaṃ ubhayamuttākāravohāratā ca visadākāravohāratā ca siyā”ti?
anya-e0803n:2163_16: Evaṃ vuttā te addhā kiñci uttari apassantā niruttarā bhavissanti.
anya-e0803n:2163_17: Saddasatthavidū pana saddasatthato nayaṃ gahetvā vadanti –
anya-e0803n:2168_5: etaṃ citta”nti evaṃ purisādīsu yesu atthesu lokassa “eso esā eta”nti ca pasiddhi hoti,
anya-e0803n:2168_8: Evaṃ vadantehi tehi “iminā nāma ākārena ‘eso esā eta’nti nāmāni aññāni ca pulliṅgādināmaṃ labhantī”ti ayaṃ viseso na dassito,
anya-e0803n:2168_9: saddhammanayaññūhi pana neruttikehi dassito “yassa kassaci atthassa avisadākāravohāro itthiliṅga”ntiādinā.
anya-e0803n:2169_0: Keci pana “avisadākārānaṃ atthānaṃ vācako vohāro itthiliṅga”ntiādīni vadanti,
anya-e0803n:2169_2: Yadi hi avisadākārānaṃ atthānaṃ vācako vohāro itthiliṅgaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2169_3: evaṃ sante mātugāmakalattakantakaṇṭakagumbādayopi vohārā itthiliṅgāni siyuṃ avisadākārattā tadatthānaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2169_4: Yadi pana visadākārānaṃ atthānaṃ vācako vohāro pulliṅgaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2169_5: evaṃ sante “devatā saddhā ñāṇa”miccādayopi vohārā pulliṅgāni siyuṃ visadākārattā tadatthānaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2169_6: Atha vā yadi avisadākārānaṃ atthānaṃ vācako vohāro itthiliṅgaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2169_8: evaṃ sante ekassevatthassa ekakkhaṇe dvīhi liṅgehi na vattabbatā siyā –
anya-e0803n:2171_0: Karomi te taṃ vacanaṃ, tvaṃsi ācariyo mamā”ti.
anya-e0803n:2172_0: Yadi ca ubhayamuttākārānaṃ atthānaṃ vācako vohāro napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2172_1: evaṃ sante ubhayamuttākārānaṃ atthānaṃ tiṇarukkhādīsu “idaṃ nāmā”ti niyamābhāvato liṅgavacanaṃ viruddhaṃ siyā.
anya-e0803n:2172_3: Sāriputtamoggallānaṃ sāvakayuga”nti ca ādinā napuṃsakaliṅgavacanena tadatthānampi ubhayamuttākāratā vuttā siyā.
anya-e0803n:2172_4: Apica ekampi tīraṃ “taṭaṃ taṭī taṭo”ti tīhi liṅgehi na vattabbaṃ siyā.
anya-e0803n:2172_5: Ekampi ca ñāṇaṃ “paññāṇaṃ paññā pajānanā amoho”tiādinā tīhi liṅgehi na vattabbaṃ siyā,
anya-e0803n:2172_6: tasmā taṃ nayaṃ aggahetvā yathāvuttoyeva nayo gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n:2173_5: tiṭṭhamānā nipajjamānā nisīdamānā khādamānā bhuñjamānā avisadaṃ bhuñjanti.
anya-e0803n:2173_6: Purisampi hi avisadaṃ disvā “mātugāmo viya gacchati tiṭṭhati nipajjati nisīdati khādati bhuñjatī”ti vadanti.
anya-e0803n:2173_8: tathā yassa kassaci saviññāṇakassa vā aviññāṇakassa vā atthassa ye vohārā yebhuyyena avisadākārā,
anya-e0803n:2173_11: “Kaññā devatā dhītalikā dubbā saddhā ratti itthī yāgu vadhū” iccevamādīni.
anya-e0803n:2173_17: tiṭṭhamānā nipajjamānā nisīdamānā khādamānā bhuñjamānā visadaṃ bhuñjanti.

anya-e0803n:2421_12: Yathā ca kusavohāro kusanāmake raññepi kusatiṇepi pavattati –
anya-e0803n:2425_4: Jambūsaddo pana gahapatimanādīsu citta kusa kākasaddā viya paṇṇattivasena dīpasmiṃ na pavattati,
anya-e0803n:2426_0: Yathā panettha “laṅkādīpo”ti saddassa nāmikapadamālā samāsavasena byāsavasena ca yojitā,
anya-e0803n:2426_8: dibbaratho”tiādīnampi nāmikapadamālā samāsavasena byāsavasena ca yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n:2426_10: “Dibbaratho”tiādīnaṃ samāsagatapadānaṃ payojane sati byāsavasena visuṃ kattabbatā ca veditabbā.
anya-e0803n:2426_11: Tathā hi byāsavasena “dibbo ratho”tiādinā dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ padānaṃ samānādhikaraṇavasena paccekavibhattiyuttabhāve
anya-e0803n:2426_13: So ca sāsanānukūlo hi ayaṃ nayo ṭhapito.
anya-e0803n:2429_0: Dāmā dāmaṃ tathā saddhā, saddhaṃ taṭaṃ taṭī taṭo.
anya-e0803n:2434_0: Etesu hi bodhisaddassa tāva “bodhi rājakumāro”ti ca,
anya-e0803n:2434_2: tassa bodhissa aṅgoti bojjhaṅgo”ti ca evaṃ puggalavacanassa “bodhi, bodhī, bodhayo. Bodhiṃ, bodhī, bodhayo.
anya-e0803n:2435_0: Rukkhamagganibbānasabbaññutaññāṇavacanassa pana “bodhi, bodhī, bodhiyo. Bodhiṃ, bodhī, bodhiyo.
anya-e0803n:2436_1: taṃ āgamena viruddhaṃ viya dissanato vicāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2436_2: Na hi āgame rukkhavacanassa bodhisaddassa pulliṅgabhāvo dissati,
anya-e0803n:2436_4: Yadi ca “sālo dhavo khadīro”tiādīnaṃ viya rukkhavacanassa bodhisaddassa pulliṅgattaṃ siyā,
anya-e0803n:2436_5: jambū simbalī pāṭalīsaddādīnaṃ rukkhavācakattā pulliṅgattaṃ siyā,
anya-e0803n:2436_6: na tesaṃ imassa ca rukkhavācakattepi pulliṅgabhāvo upalabbhati.
anya-e0803n:2436_8: evaṃ sante nibbānavacano sabbaññutaññāṇavacano ca bodhisaddo napuṃsakaliṅgo siyā “nibbāna”ntiādinā napuṃsakaliṅgavasena
anya-e0803n:2437_2: taṃ ettha bhagavā pattoti rukkhopi bodhicceva vuccatī”ti vuttamatthaṃ cetasi sannidhāya “bujjhati etthāti
anya-e0803n:2437_3: bodhī”ti nibbacanavasena “kiṃ rukkhavacano bodhisaddo pulliṅgo na bhavissatī”ti maññamānā vadanti maññe.
anya-e0803n:2437_7: taṃ ettha bhagavā pattoti rukkhopi bodhicceva vuccatī”ti vadantehi garūhi ñāṇavacanaṃ itthi liṅgabhūtaṃ
anya-e0803n:2437_8: bodhīti ñāṇassa nāmaṃ paṇṇattiantaraparikappanenatthaṃ parikappentena bujjhanaṭṭhānabhūte rukkhe āropetvā
anya-e0803n:2437_10: tasmā īdisesu ṭhānesu nibbacane ādaro na kātabbo.
anya-e0803n:2437_11: Na hi “bujjhati etthāti bodhī”ti nibbacanakaraṇaṃ rukkhavacanassa bodhisaddassa pulliṅgattaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti saṅketasiddhattā vohārassa,
anya-e0803n:2437_12: tasmā rukkhaṃ sayaṃ abodhimpi samānaṃ bodhiyā paṭilābhaṭṭhānattā saṅketasiddhena “bodhī”ti itthiliṅgavohārena voharanti sāsanikā,
anya-e0803n:2437_14: Etamatthaṃyeva hi sandhāya “bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2437_15: taṃ ettha bhagavā pattoti rukkhopi bodhicceva vuccatī”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2437_17: Tenāha āyasmā sāriputto dhammasenāpati anudhammacakkavattī vohārakusalo itthiliṅgavohārena “buddhānaṃ
anya-e0803n:2437_18: bhagavantānaṃ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇappaṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṃ buddho”ti.
anya-e0803n:2439_0: Uggantvāna tadā muñci, chabbaṇṇā rasmiyo subhā”ti ca
anya-e0803n:2440_0: Evamādayo rukkhavācakassa bodhisaddassa itthiliṅgabhāve payogā dissanti.
anya-e0803n:2441_0: Atha vā rukkhavācako bodhisaddo dviliṅgo pumitthiliṅgavasena.
anya-e0803n:2441_1: Tathā hi samantapāsādikāyaṃ vinayasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ mahāveyyākaraṇassa pāḷinayaviduno buddhaghosācariyassa
anya-e0803n:2441_2: evaṃ saddaracanā dissati “sakkhissasi tvaṃ tāta pāṭaliputtaṃ gantvā mahābodhinā saddhiṃ ayyaṃ saṅghamittattheriṃ
anya-e0803n:2441_4: “sāpi kho mahābodhisamārūḷhā nāvā passato mahārājassa mahāsamuddatalaṃ pakkhandā”ti ca tassa rukkhavācakassa
anya-e0803n:2441_5: bodhisaddassa “bujjhati etthāti bodhī”ti nibbacanavasena “bodhi, bodhī, bodhayo. Bodhiṃ, bodhī, bodhayo.
anya-e0803n:2441_7: Rukkhavācakasseva pana tassa ñāṇe pavattitthiliṅgavohārena saṅketasiddhena rūḷhatthadīpakena “bodhi, bodhī, bodhiyo. Bodhiṃ, bodhī, bodhiyo.
anya-e0803n:2451_0: Dāmā dāmaṃ saddā mālatīdāmādibhedabhinnassa ekassa vatthussa yathākkamaṃ itthinapuṃsakaliṅgā.
anya-e0803n:2451_5: Ratanadāma”nti ca dviliṅgabhāve lokikappayogā dissanti sāsanānukūlā.
anya-e0803n:2452_0: Saddhaṃ saddhāsaddā pana bhinnavatthūnaṃ vācakā itthinapuṃsakaliṅgā,
anya-e0803n:2452_3: Mayamassubho gotamabrāhmaṇā nāma dānāni dema saddhāni karomā”ti dassanato.
anya-e0803n:2452_6: saddhaṃ kula”nti imāni vāccaliṅgattā saṅgahaṃ na gacchantīti daṭṭhabbāni.
anya-e0803n:2453_0: Taṭaṃ taṭī taṭotime saddā tīrasaṅkhāte ekasmiṃyevatthe thīpunnapuṃsakaliṅgā.
anya-e0803n:2454_2: Tatrupasecane “sūpaṃ vā byañjanaṃ vā”ti napuṃsakaniddeso dissati.
anya-e0803n:2454_6: Sarīrāvayave “kilesānaṃ anu anu byañjanato pākaṭabhāvakaraṇato anubyañjana”nti evaṃ napuṃsakaniddeso.
anya-e0803n:2455_2: Tathā hi kathāvatthumhi “atthatthamhī”ti imissā pāḷiyā atthasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ “atthaṃ vuccati nibbāna”nti napuṃsakaliṅganiddesena atthasaddo vutto.
anya-e0803n:2456_0: Akkharasaddo ca “yo pubbo akkharo akkharānī”ti ca dassanato.
anya-e0803n:2456_1: Apica akkharasaddo nibbānavacano nāmapaṇṇattivacano ca sabbadānapuṃsakaliṅgo bhavati “padamaccutamakkharaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2456_2: mahājanasammatoti kho vāseṭṭha ‘mahāsammato’tveva paṭhamaṃ akkharaṃ nibbatta”nti evamādīsu.
anya-e0803n:2456_4: akkharakkharāya āpatti pācittiyassā”ti ettha pana pulliṅgotipi napuṃsakaliṅgotipi vattabbo,
anya-e0803n:2457_5: gāravaṃ hoti me tadā”ti ca ādidassanato.
anya-e0803n:2458_1: tattha vacīsaddassa “vacī, vacī, vaciyo. Vaciṃ, vacī, vaciyo.
anya-e0803n:2458_5: taṃ na gahetabbaṃ vacasaddato visuṃ vacīsaddassa dassanato.
anya-e0803n:2458_6: Atrimāni pāḷito ca aṭṭhakathāto ca nidassanapadāni.
anya-e0803n:2458_9: vaciñca vacīsaṅkhāre ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva vacī,
anya-e0803n:2458_11: Gadito vacībhi satimābhinande”ti imāni pāḷito nidassanapadāni.
anya-e0803n:2458_13: vaciyā bhedo vacībhedo”ti imāni aṭṭhakathāto nidassanapadāni.
anya-e0803n:2458_14: Iminā nayena aññesampi sarūpāsarūpapadānaṃ yathārahaṃ dvitiliṅgatā vavatthapetabbā.
anya-e0803n:2459_0: Idāni katthaci vāccaliṅgabhūtānaṃ abhidheyyaliṅgānañca taddhibhantaliṅgānañca dhammādivasena nāmikapadamālā vuccate.
anya-e0803n:2463_0: Padaṃ samaṃ visamañca, jaññā sabbasamampi ca.
anya-e0803n:2465_34: Paccattopayogavacanādivasena pana padaṃ sadisaṃ visadisaṃ sabbathā sadisampi ca bhavati.
anya-e0803n:2466_11: evaṃ katthaci vāccaliṅgabhūtānaṃ abhidheyyaliṅgānañca taddhitantaliṅgānañca nāmikapadamālā sappayogā kathitā.
anya-e0803n:2467_0: Idāni nevābhidheyyaliṅgassa bhavitabbasaddassa ca abhidheyyaliṅgānaṃ sotthi suvatthi saddānañca vāccaliṅgābhidheyyaliṅgassa
anya-e0803n:2467_1: abbhutasaddassa ca vāccaliṅgassa abhūtasaddassacāti imesaṃ kiñci visesaṃ kathayāma,
anya-e0803n:2467_3: Etesu hi bhavitabbasaddo ekantabhāvavācako napuṃsakaliṅgo ekavacanantoyeva hoti.
anya-e0803n:2467_4: Tatiyantapadehi evaṃsadda nasaddādīhi ca yojetabbo ca hoti.
anya-e0803n:2474_2: saṃyogapare paṭisedhatthavati aitinipāte upapade sati ekantena rassattamupayāti. Kvatthe?
anya-e0803n:2474_4: Tathāvidhe asaññogapare rassattaṃ na upayāti. Kvatthe?
anya-e0803n:2474_6: Tathā hi “abbhuta”nti padassa “abhūtapubbaṃ bhūta”ntipi attho bhavati,
anya-e0803n:2474_10: Tatra “acchariyaṃ vata bho abbhutaṃ vata bho.
anya-e0803n:2474_12: abbhutaṃ lomahaṃsanaṃ” iccevamādayo “abhūtapubbaṃ bhūta”nti atthe payogā.
anya-e0803n:2486_8: “Abhūta”miti padaṃ pana vāccaliṅgaṃ abhidheyyaliṅgampi vā saccasaddo viya katthaci.
anya-e0803n:2486_9: Itissa yathārahaṃ ayampi sappayogā nāmikapadamālā kathitā.
anya-e0803n:2487_0: Idāni āgamikānaṃ kosallajananatthaṃ padasamodhānavasena nāmikapadamālā vuccate –
anya-e0803n:2489_0: So bhagavā jānaṃ passaṃ arahaṃ sammāsambuddho,
anya-e0803n:2489_1: taṃ bhagavantaṃ jānantaṃ passantaṃ arahantaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2489_2: tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena,
anya-e0803n:2489_3: tassa bhagavato jānato passato arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0803n:2490_0: Rājā suddhodano, rājānaṃ suddhodanaṃ, raññā suddhodanena. Sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2491_0: Rājā passenadī kosalo, rājānaṃ passenadiṃ kosalaṃ, raññā passenadinā kosalena. Sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2495_0: Makkhali gosālo. Makkhaliṃ gosālaṃ. Makkhalinā gosālena. Sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2498_0: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ, paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ, paṭhamena jhānena, paṭhamassa jhānassa. Sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2499_0: Catutthī disā, catutthiṃ disaṃ, catutthiyā disāya.
anya-e0803n:2500_6: Iminā nayena aññesupi ṭhānesu padasamodhānavasena liṅgato ca antato ca vacanato ca apekkhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2501_0: Idāni ekappakārānaṃ saddānaṃ liṅgaantavasena nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ. Kathaṃ? Yādiso, yādisī, yādisaṃ. Tādiso, tādisī, tādisaṃ. Etādiso, etādisī, etādisaṃ. Kīdiso, kīdisī, kīdisaṃ. Īdiso, īdisī, īdisaṃ. Ediso, edisī, edisaṃ. Sadiso, sadisī, sadisaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2501_1: Kadāci pana “yādisā tādisā”ti evamādīni itthiliṅgarūpānipi bhavanti.
anya-e0803n:2501_2: Nāmikapadamālā nesaṃ purisa itthī cittanayena yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n:2502_0: Idāni samāsataddhitapadabhūtānaṃ amamasaddādīnaṃ nāmikapadamālā vuccate – amamo, amamā, amamaṃ, amame. Amamena.
anya-e0803n:2503_0: Mayhako, mayhakā. Mayhakaṃ, mayhake. Mayhakena. Sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2504_0: Āmā, āmā, āmāyo. Āmaṃ, āmā, āmāyo. Sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2505_0: Tatra amamoti natthi taṇhāmamattaṃ diṭṭhimamattañca etassāti amamo, ko so,
anya-e0803n:2505_2: Apica yesataṇhāpi sadiṭṭhīpi “mama ida”nti mamattaṃ na karonti,
anya-e0803n:2505_11: Tatra mayhakoti “idampi mayhaṃ idampi mayha”nti vippalapatīti mayhako,
anya-e0803n:2508_2: Tatra āmāti “āma ahaṃ tumhākaṃ dāsī”ti evaṃ dāsibhāvaṃ paṭijānātīti āmā. Gehadāsī.
anya-e0803n:2509_0: Idāni kati katipaya katimīsaddānaṃ viseso vuccate yathārahaṃ nāmikapadamālā ca.
anya-e0803n:2509_1: Tatra katimīsaddassa nāmikapadamālā na labbhati “ajja bhante katimī”ti evaṃ pucchāvasena āgatamattato.
anya-e0803n:2509_9: Kati lokasmiṃ chiddāni yattha cittaṃ na tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0803n:2509_13: Katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2511_19: Katipayajanakata”ntiādīsu hi “kati kittakā saṅgā katisaṅgā”tiādinā sabbadā bahuvacanasamāso daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0803n:2512_9: Tatra yevāpanakoti “phasso hoti vedanā hotī”tiādinā vuttā phassādayo viya sarūpato avatvā “ye vā pana
anya-e0803n:2512_10: tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā”ti evaṃ “yevāpanā”ti padena vutto yevāpanako,
anya-e0803n:2512_12: Tathā “yaṃ vā panaññampi atthi rūpa”nti evaṃ “yaṃvāpanā”ti padena vuttaṃ yaṃvāpanakaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2512_13: Esa nayo yathārahaṃ yassakaṃ yatthakantiādīsupi netabbo.
anya-e0803n:2513_2: nipātānañca abyayabhāvo siddho tīsu liṅgesu sabbavibhattivacanesu ca vayābhāvato,
anya-e0803n:2513_5: so ca kho “ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye”ti vā,
anya-e0803n:2513_9: “yevāpano”ti vā evamādīsu nipāto nāma na hoti.
anya-e0803n:2513_11: tasmā īdisesu panasaddasahitā payogā rūḷhīsaddāti gahetabbā.
anya-e0803n:2515_0: Tayosaṅkhārā. Tayosaṅkhāre. Tayosaṅkhārehi, tayosaṅkhārebhi. Tayosaṅkhārānaṃ. Sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2518_0: Aparesampi rūḷhīsaddānaṃ nāmikapadamālā vuccate saddhimatthavibhāvanāya. Aṅgā. Aṅge. Aṅgehi, aṅgebhi. Aṅgānaṃ. Aṅgehi, aṅgebhi. Aṅgānaṃ. Aṅgesu.
anya-e0803n:2520_0: Itthiliṅge kāsī, kāsiyo, kāsī, kāsiyo. Kāsīhi, kāsībhi. Kāsīnaṃ. Kāsīhi, kāsībhi. Kāsīnaṃ. Kāsīsu.
anya-e0803n:2520_11: Evaṃ avantīcetī vajjī iccetesampi padānaṃ yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n:2520_13: Evaṃ aṅgādīni atthassa ekattepi janapadanāmattā rūḷhīvasena bahuvacanāneva bhavanti.
anya-e0803n:2520_16: “aṅgānaṃ magadhānaṃ kāsīnaṃ kosalāna”ntiādinā ca bahuvacanapāḷiyo dissanti.
anya-e0803n:2521_0: Idāni aparāpi ito savisesatarā saddabhede sammohaviddhaṃsanakārikā paramasukhumañāṇāvahā nāmikapadamālāyo
anya-e0803n:2521_5: Sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānato ime dhammā anabhisambuddhā”tiādayo pāḷinaye nissāyeva.
anya-e0803n:2521_6: Tattha sambuddhopaṭijānāsīti “tvaṃ ‘ahaṃ sammāsambuddho’ti paṭijānāsī”ti itisaddalopavasena attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n:2521_8: “Sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānato”ti ettha pana “ahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti paṭijānantassa tavāti evaṃ itisaddalopayojanāvasena
anya-e0803n:2521_9: añño saddasanniveso teneva añño atthapaṭivedho ca bhavati.
anya-e0803n:2521_11: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānatoti “ahaṃ sammāsambuddho,
anya-e0803n:2521_12: sabbe dhammā mayā abhisambuddhā”ti evaṃ paṭijānato tavāti yo attho vutto,
anya-e0803n:2521_14: Evaṃpakāraṃ ñatvā paṇḍitajātiyena kulaputtena amhehi vuccamānā “ahaṃ sammāsambuddho’ti tvaṃ paṭijānāsī”ti
anya-e0803n:2521_15: etasmiṃ atthe sakriyāpadā ayaṃ padamālā vavatthapetabbā –
anya-e0803n:2523_0: Iddhimā bhikkhu ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti,
anya-e0803n:2523_2: Iddhimanto bhikkhū ekopi hutvā bahudhā honti,
anya-e0803n:2523_3: bahudhāpi hutvā eko hontīti imasmiṃ panatthe ayampi sakriyāpadā padamālā vavatthapetabbā –
anya-e0803n:2524_0: Ekopi hutvā bahudhā honto bahudhāpi hutvā eko honto bhikkhu tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0803n:2524_1: ekopi hutvā bahudhā hontā bahudhāpi hutvā eko hontā bhikkhū tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0803n:2524_2: Ekopi hutvā bahudhā hontaṃ bahudhāpi hutvā eko hontaṃ bhikkhuṃ passati,
anya-e0803n:2524_3: ekopi hutvā bahudhā honte bahudhāpi hutvā eko honte bhikkhū passati.
anya-e0803n:2524_4: Ekopi hutvā bahudhā hontena bahudhāpi hutvā eko hontena bhikkhunā dhammo desito,
anya-e0803n:2524_5: ekopi hutvā bahudhā hontehi bahudhāpi hutvā eko hontehi bhikkhūhi dhammo desito.
anya-e0803n:2524_6: Ekopi hutvā bahudhā hontassa bahudhāpi hutvā eko hontassa bhikkhuno dīyate.
anya-e0803n:2524_8: Bho ekopi hutvā bahudhā honta bahudhāpi hutvā eko honta bhikkhu tvaṃ dhammaṃ desehi,
anya-e0803n:2524_9: bhonto ekopi hutvā bahudhā hontā bahudhāpi hutvā eko hontā tumhe dhammaṃ desethāti.
anya-e0803n:2524_15: tamenaṃ aññataro saddho pasanno passati taṃ bhikkhuṃ anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhontaṃ ekopi hutvā
anya-e0803n:2524_16: bahudhā hontaṃ bahudhāpi hutvā eko honta”nti idaṃ kevaṭṭasuttaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2525_0: Ekoekāya mātugāmena saddhiṃ raho nisajjaṃ kappento bhikkhu evaṃ vadati,
anya-e0803n:2525_1: ekoekāya mātugāmena saddhiṃ raho nisajjaṃ kappentā bhikkhū evaṃ vadanti.
anya-e0803n:2525_2: Ekoekāya mātugāmena saddhiṃ raho nisajjaṃ kappentaṃ bhikkhuṃ passati,
anya-e0803n:2525_3: ekoekāya mātugāmena saddhiṃ raho nisajjaṃ kappente bhikkhū passati.

anya-e0803n:2782_4: Pabbajjā mama ruccatī”tiādīsupi sampadānavisayesu vibhattivipallāsanayo dassitoti sakkā vattunti? Na sakkā,

anya-e0803n:2782_6: Na hi īdise ṭhāne gāthāyaṃ vā cuṇṇiyapadaṭṭhāne vā vibhattivipallāso icchitabbo.
anya-e0803n:2782_8: Kiṃ nu kho ahaṃ tassa sukhassa bhāyāmī”tiādīsuyeva pana ṭhānesu icchitabbo.
anya-e0803n:2783_0: Yadi saddanayaṃ nissāya “tuyhaṃ maṃsena medenā”tiādīsu vibhattivipallāso icchitabbo siyā,
anya-e0803n:2783_2: Brāhmaṇassa pitā adāsī”tiādīsupi saddanayaṃ nissāya “brāhmaṇāyā”tiādinā vibhattivipallāsattho vacanīyo
anya-e0803n:2783_6: yasmā dānayoge vā namoyoge vā āyādesasahitāni catutthīchaṭṭhīrūpāni sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane nupalabbhanti,
anya-e0803n:2783_7: tasmā “brāhmaṇāyā”tiādinā vibhattivipallāsatthavacane ayaṃ doso yadidaṃ avijjamānaggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2783_8: Yasmā pana īdisesu ṭhānesu vibhattivipallāsakaraṇaṃ sāvajjaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2783_9: tasmā “tuyhaṃ maṃsena medenā”tiādīsupi vibhattivipallāso na icchitabbo.
anya-e0803n:2784_3: Tathā hi pāvacane sa naṃsaddā sampadānasāmiatthesu sāmaññena pavattanti,
anya-e0803n:2784_5: “Aggassa dātā medhāvī”ti ettha hi “aggassā”ti ayaṃ saddo yadā kriyāpaṭiggahaṇaṃ paṭicca sampadānatthe pavattati,
anya-e0803n:2784_7: Yadā pana kriyaṃ paṭicca kammabhūte sāmiatthe pavattati,
anya-e0803n:2784_9: Evaṃ sabbathāpi vipallāso tumhākaṃ saraṇaṃ na hotīti.
anya-e0803n:2784_10: Tathā saddanayaṃ nissāya “sampadānavacana”nti tumhehi daḷhaṃ gahitassa mayhaṃsaddassa sāmiatthavasena
anya-e0803n:2784_11: paṇṇattiyaṃ dassanato vibhattivipallāso tumhākaṃ saraṇaṃ na hoteva.
anya-e0803n:2787_2: idampi mayha”nti kāyati ravatīti mayhakoti vuccati mayhasaddūpapadassa ke re ge saddeti dhātussa vasena.
anya-e0803n:2788_3: evaṃ sante lokavohārakusalena sabbaññunā tassa sakuṇassa “mayhako”ti paṇṇatti na vattabbā siyā anantogadhasampadānatthattā,
anya-e0803n:2788_4: antogadhasāmyatthattā pana “mamako” icceva paññatti vattabbā siyā.
anya-e0803n:2788_5: Etthapi “mayhako”ti idaṃ vibhattivipallāsavasena vuttanti ce? Na,
anya-e0803n:2789_0: Apicettha mayhaṃsaddo sarūpato vibhatyantabhāvena tiṭṭhati kasaddena ekapadattūpagamanato,
anya-e0803n:2789_1: evaṃ santepi “mayhako”ti ayaṃ sakuṇavisesavācako saddo paccattavacanabhāve ṭhitoyeva īsakaṃ sāmiatthampi jotayati sujampati rājapurisasaddā viya.
anya-e0803n:2789_2: Imināpi kāraṇena vibhattivipallāso tumhākaṃ saraṇaṃ na hoti.
anya-e0803n:2789_3: Iti “mayhako”ti paṇṇattiyaṃ vattamānassa padāvayavabhūtassa mayhasaddassa avipallāsavacanalesena tuyhaṃ
anya-e0803n:2789_4: tava mamasaddesupi vibhattivipallāso na icchitabboti siddhaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2789_5: Tasmā aṭṭhakathācariyehi sampadānasāmiatthesu sāmaññena pavattānampi samānānaṃ tuyhaṃ mayhaṃ tava mamasaddānaṃ
anya-e0803n:2789_6: saddanayaññeva nissāya paresamanukampāya vuttappakāro niyamo dassitoti avagantabbaṃ. Iccevaṃ –
anya-e0803n:2792_0: Evaṃ santepi etesaṃ, niyamo natthi pāḷiyaṃ;
anya-e0803n:2793_0: Koci tesaṃ viseso ca, diṭṭho amhehi taṃ suṇa.
anya-e0803n:2795_0: “Tuyhaṃ mayha”ntime saddā, te payogā na dullabhā.
anya-e0803n:2797_0: Sampadāne yahiṃ honti, te payogā panappakā.
anya-e0803n:2800_0: Sabbāpi imā nītiyo paramasukhumā sududdasā vīrajātinā sādhukaṃ manasi kātabbā.
anya-e0803n:2801_1: “Kacci vo anuruddhā samaggā sammodamānā”tiādīsu hi paccatte dissati.
anya-e0803n:2805_1: Ayañhi “gāmaṃ no gaccheyyāmā”ti ettha paccatte dissati.
anya-e0803n:2805_8: “Na no samaṃ atthi tathāgatenā”ti ettha avadhāraṇe.
anya-e0803n:2805_13: “Na no sabhāyaṃ na karonti kiñcī”tiādīsu nipātamatte.
anya-e0803n:2809_0: Idāni sabbanāmānaṃ yathārahaṃ saṃkhittena missakapadamālā vuccate –
anya-e0803n:2810_0: Yo so, ye te. Yaṃ taṃ, ye te.
anya-e0803n:2810_2: Sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. Yā sā, yā tā. Yaṃ taṃ, yā tā.
anya-e0803n:2811_0: “Eso so, ete te. Ayaṃ so, ime te.
anya-e0803n:2811_1: So ayaṃ te ime”tiādinā yathāpayogaṃ padamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n:2811_2: Tathā hi “yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako.
anya-e0803n:2811_3: Ete te bhikkhave ubho ante anupagamma majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā.
anya-e0803n:2811_4: Ayaṃ so sārathi etī”ti evamādayo vicittappayogā dissanti.
anya-e0803n:2818_0: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṃ
anya-e0803n:2825_0: Yā hi sā heṭṭhā amhehi eka dviti catuiccetesaṃ saṅkhyāsabbanāmānaṃ nāmikapadamālā kathitā,
anya-e0803n:2825_1: taṃ ṭhapetvā idha asabbanāmānaṃ pañca cha sattādīnaṃ saṅkhyānāmānaṃ nāmikapadamālā bhūdhātumayehi aññehi ca rūpehi yojanatthaṃ vuccate –
anya-e0803n:2826_9: pañca cittānī”tiādinā sabbattha yojetabbaṃ. Cha, chahi, chabhi, channaṃ, chasu,
anya-e0803n:2826_12: chassu krubbati santhava”nti hi pāḷi. Satta, sattahi, sattabhi,
anya-e0803n:2826_14: aṭṭhannaṃ, aṭṭhasu. Nava, navahi, navabhi, navannaṃ, navasu. Dasa, dasahi, dasabhi, dasannaṃ, dasasu.
anya-e0803n:2826_15: Evaṃ ekādasa. Dvādasa, bārasa. Terasa, tedasa, teḷasa.
anya-e0803n:2828_2: Tathā ekavīsa dvāvīsa bāvīsa tevīsa catuvīsa iccādīsupi. Tiṃsa, tiṃsaṃ, tiṃsāya, tiṃsāyaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2828_15: Sattari iccādipi. Asīti, asītiṃ, asītiyā, asītiyaṃ. Navuti. Navutiṃ, navutiyā,
anya-e0803n:2829_4: “Channavutīna”nti ca ādināpi saṅkhyārūpānaṃ katthaci dassanato keci saddasatthavidū ūnavīsatisaddaṃ sabbadāpi ekavacanantamitthiliṅgameva payuñjanti.
anya-e0803n:2832_1: Sabbesampi ca tesaṃ yathāvuttavacanaṃ kiñci pāḷippadesaṃ patvā yujjati,
anya-e0803n:2832_2: kiñci pana patvā na yujjati vīsativīsaṃtiṃsaṃiccādīnañhi saṅkhatthānaṃ saddānaṃ bahuvacanappayogavasenapi pāḷiyaṃ dassanato,
anya-e0803n:2832_4: Tasmā yathāsambhavaṃ yathāpāvacanañca itthiliṅgabhāve tesamekavacanantatā veditabbā atthi natthisaddānaṃ viya.
anya-e0803n:2833_0: Atthinatthisaddā hi nipātattā ekattepi bahuttepi pavattanti “puttā matthi dhanammatthi.
anya-e0803n:2833_4: Abhidhamme hi dhammasenāpatinā anudhammacakkavattinā vohārakusalena vohārakusalasādhakena “atthiyā nava.
anya-e0803n:2833_6: tasmā vīsativīsatimiccādīnampi yathāsambhavaṃ yathāpāvacanañca itthiliṅgabhāve ekavacanantatā veditabbā.
anya-e0803n:2834_0: Tattheke “hetuyā adhipatiyā”ti ca idaṃ liṅgavipallāsavasena gahetabbaṃ maññanti.
anya-e0803n:2834_3: Atha vā “hetuyā adhipatiyā”ti dvayamidaṃ itthiliṅgarūpapaṭibhāgaṃ pulliṅgarūpanti gahetabbaṃ “hetuyo
anya-e0803n:2834_5: “atthiyā natthiyā”ti idaṃ pana liṅgavipallāsavasena vuttanti na gahetabbaṃ atthi natthisaddānaṃ aliṅgabhedattā.
anya-e0803n:2834_6: Na hi atthi natthisaddā tīsu liṅgesu ekasmimpi antogadhā.
anya-e0803n:2834_7: Etesu hi atthisaddo ākhyātanipātavasena bhijjati “atthi santi saṃvijjati.
anya-e0803n:2834_10: Iccevaṃ atthi natthisaddānaṃ nipātānañca liṅgavacanavasena kathanaṃ yujjati itthiliṅgādivasena ekattādivasena ca appavattanato.
anya-e0803n:2836_0: Vacanesu ca sabbesu, yaṃ na byeti tadabyaya”nti.
anya-e0803n:2837_1: nanu ca bho “atthi sakkā labbhā iccete paṭhamāyā”ti vacanato atthisaddo paṭhamāya vibhattiyā yutto,
anya-e0803n:2837_2: evaṃ sante kasmā “sadisaṃ tīsu liṅgesū”tiādi vuttanti?
anya-e0803n:2837_4: tathā natthisaddo atthisaddassa vacanalesena gahetabbattā yugaḷapadattā ca.
anya-e0803n:2837_5: Idaṃ pana “sadisaṃ tīsu liṅgesū”tiādivacanaṃ upasagganipātasaṅkhāte asaṅkhyāsadde sandhāya vuttaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2837_7: Tathā hi “asaṅkhyā”ti ca “abyayā”ti ca laddhavohāresu upasagganipātesu upasaggā sabbepi sabbavibhattivacanakā.
anya-e0803n:2837_8: Nipātānaṃ pana ekacce paṭhamādīsu yathārahaṃ vibhattiyuttā,
anya-e0803n:2837_12: Upasagganipātesu hi paccekaṃ “idaṃ nāma vacana”nti laddhuṃ na sakkā,
anya-e0803n:2837_13: sabbasaṅgāhakavasena pana “sadisaṃ tīsu liṅgesū”tiādi pubbācariyehi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2837_15: Na hi āvusosaddato sabbāpi vibhattiyo labbhanti,
anya-e0803n:2837_16: atha kho ālapanatthavācakattā ekavacanikaanekavacanikā paṭhamāvibhattiyoyeva labbhanti.
anya-e0803n:2838_0: Keci pana sabbehipi nipātehi sabbavibhattilopaṃ vadanti,
anya-e0803n:2838_3: Divā bhiyyo namo iccete paṭhamāya ca dutiyāya cā”tiādivacanato,
anya-e0803n:2838_4: padapūraṇamattānañca avibhattiyuttānaṃ atha khalu vata vatha iccādīnaṃ nipātānaṃ vacanato.
anya-e0803n:2838_5: Etthāpi siyā “nanu ca bho avibhattiyuttānampi nipātānaṃ sambhavato atthi natthisaddānaṃ avibhattiko niddeso kātabbo,
anya-e0803n:2839_0: Yadi evaṃ “atthi sakkā labbhā iccete paṭhamāyā”ti vacanato atthi natthisaddā luttāya paṭhamāya vibhattiyā vasena paṭhamāvibhattikāyeva niddisitabbā,
anya-e0803n:2839_1: evamakatvā kasmā sattamyantavasena “atthiyā natthiyā”ti niddiṭṭhāti? Saccaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2839_4: natthipaccaye navā”ti etassatthassa paridīpane paṭhamāya okāso natthi,
anya-e0803n:2839_8: Iti atthiyānatthiyāsaddānaṃ sattamyantabhāve siddheyeva tatiyācatutthīpañcamīchaṭṭhiyantabhāvopi siddhoyeva hoti.
anya-e0803n:2839_13: taṃ “pāḷiyā virujjhatī”ti na vattabbaṃ pāḷinayānusārena vuttattāti.
anya-e0803n:2840_6: Yathā hi vīsatiiccādīnaṃ saṅkhyāsaddānaṃ sarūpato adabbavācakattepi dabbavācakānaṃ latāmatirattiitthī
anya-e0803n:2840_8: evaṃ adabbavācakattepi atthi natthisaddānaṃ katthaci itthiliṅgabhāvo saddhammavidūhi anumato.
anya-e0803n:2840_12: natthiyā”ti imāni liṅgabhāvavinimuttāni sattamiyantāni nipātapadānītipi gahetabbāni,
anya-e0803n:2840_14: evarūpāni nipātapadāni pubbācariyehi vuttāni na santi,
anya-e0803n:2841_0: Pāvacanasmiñhi garūhi aniddiṭṭhānipi anekavihitāni nipātapadāni sandissanti,
anya-e0803n:2841_4: Na hi acinteyyānubhāvena pāramitāpuññena nipphannena anāvaraṇañāṇena sabbaṃ ñeyyamaṇḍalaṃ hatthatale
anya-e0803n:2841_5: āmalakaṃ viya paccakkhaṃ katvā passato buddhassa vacane aññesaṃ vācāvippalāpo avassaṃ labbhatīti.
anya-e0803n:2841_8: natthiyā”ti ca idaṃ sāriputtattheravacanaṃ tena nikkhittattā.
anya-e0803n:2841_9: Tathāgatena hi tāvatiṃsabhapane desitakāle imāni padāni na santi,
anya-e0803n:2841_12: Āyasmato hi sāriputtassa tathāgatena nayo dinno,
anya-e0803n:2841_13: tenapi pabhinnapaṭisambhidena satthukappena aggasāvakena satthu santikā nayaṃ labhitvā byañjanaṃ suropitaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0803n:2841_14: Sabbepi hi paṭisambhidappattā ariyā dunniruttiṃ na vadanti niruttipabhedasmiṃ sukusalattā,
anya-e0803n:2841_15: tasmā aññesamavisayo esa ariyānaṃ vohāroti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2843_0: Sataṃ, satāni, satā. Sataṃ, satāni, sate. Satena, satehi, satebhi. Satassa, satānaṃ. Satā, satasmā, satamhā, satehi, satebhi. Satassa, satānaṃ. Sate, satasmiṃ, satamhi, satesu.
anya-e0803n:2843_3: Dasasahassaṃ satasahassaṃ dasasatasahassanti etthāpi eseva nayo.
anya-e0803n:2843_11: Itthañca aññathāpi saddarūpāni bhavanti. Koṭi, koṭī, koṭiyo.
anya-e0803n:2845_0: Saṅkhyā tāva sā saṅkhyeyya-ppadhānāti garū vaduṃ.
anya-e0803n:2846_0: Vīsatito yāva satā, yā saṅkhyā tāva sā pana;
anya-e0803n:2849_0: Vīsato yāva koṭiyā, saṅkhyā tāva hi sā khalu;
anya-e0803n:2852_0: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne sabbesaṃ saṅkhyāsaddarūpānaṃ pākaṭīkaraṇena viññūnaṃ sukhumañāṇapaṭilābhatthaṃ sāṭṭhakathaṃ
anya-e0803n:2854_2: Ettha ca yasmā ekato paṭṭhāya yāva dasa,
anya-e0803n:2854_9: Yasmā pana vīsatito paṭṭhāya yāva sataṃ,
anya-e0803n:2854_11: tasmā tatthāpi saṅkhyeyyappadhānaṃyeva gahetvā “yesaṃ kho visākhe sataṃ piyāni,
anya-e0803n:2854_16: Ekasmiñhi padakkame ekarasāva bhagavato desanā hotīti.
anya-e0803n:2855_0: Idāni añño pāḷippadeso aṭṭhakathāpāṭhappadeso ca nīyate –
anya-e0803n:2859_3: tasmā sataṃsaddaṃ sahassasaddena yojetvā “hatthī”tiādīni pana upapadaṃ katvā attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n:2859_9: Saṅkhyāppadhānavasena pana ayampi attho gahetabbo “hatthīnaṃ satasahassaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2859_13: Ayaṃ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n:2859_16: Ettha “pañcā”ti saddaṃ satasaddena saddhiṃ yojetvā “sippikānaṃ sataṃ natthī”ti ettha viya himavā pabbato
anya-e0803n:2859_17: yojanānaṃ pañca satāni uccoti saṅkhyāppadhānavasena attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n:2859_19: Ayaṃ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n:2859_27: “Parosahassaṃ kho panassa puttā bhavissantī”ti ettha sahassanti bahuvacananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2862_1: Ettha “kappe ca satasahasse caturo ca asaṅkhiyeti sāmiatthe upayogabahuvacanaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2862_2: tasmā “mahākappānaṃ satasahassānaṃ catunnaṃ asaṅkhiyānaṃ matthake”ti attho gahetabbo,
anya-e0803n:2862_5: Ayaṃ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n:2864_0: Etthantare yaṃ caritaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ bodhipācana”nti
anya-e0803n:2865_2: “Satasahasse kappe”ti kappasaddasambandhena cāyaṃ pulliṅganiddeso upayoganiddeso ca.
anya-e0803n:2865_6: Aññassa avuttattā kappassa ca vuttattā pakaraṇato “kappāna”nti ayamattho viññāyateva.
anya-e0803n:2865_7: Na hi vuttaṃ vajjetvā avuttassa kassaci gahaṇaṃ yuttanti.
anya-e0803n:2865_8: Casaddo sampiṇḍanattho “mahākappānaṃ caturo asaṅkhyeyye satasahasse ca mahākappe”ti.
anya-e0803n:2865_9: Ayaṃ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n:2866_5: Kumbhīnañca satā bahūti anekāni ca kumbhīnaṃ satāni.
anya-e0803n:2866_7: Ayaṃ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n:2869_6: Ayaṃ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n:2872_1: Ettha cattāri satasahassānīti idaṃ liṅgabhedavasena “chaḷabhiññā mahiddhikā”ti imehi dvīhi padehi samānādhikaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2872_2: Īdisesu hi ṭhānesu asaṅkhyeyya vācakopi saddo napuṃsakova hoti,
anya-e0803n:2872_3: tasmā “cattāri satasahassānī”ti ca “chaḷabhiññā”ti ca “mahiddhikā”ti ca etaṃ padattayaṃ samānādhikaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2872_4: Atha vā chaḷabhiññā mahiddhikāti chaḷabhiññānaṃ mahaddhikānanti sāmiatthe paccattavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2872_5: Imasmiṃ panatthe “cattāri satasahassānī”ti ayaṃ saṅkhyāvacano bhavati.
anya-e0803n:2873_0: Nanu ca bho “tā devatā sattasatā uḷārā”ti ettha satasaddo itthiliṅgo hutvā dissatīti? Na,
anya-e0803n:2873_6: Tathā hi “pañca paccekabuddhasatāni imasmiṃ isigilismiṃ pabbate ciravāsino ahesu”nti napuṃsakaliṅgena pulliṅgassa samānādhikaraṇatā dissati,
anya-e0803n:2873_7: tasmā “tā devatā sattasatā uḷārā”ti etthāpi “sattasatānī”ti napuṃsakabhāvoyevāti avagantabbo.
anya-e0803n:2873_9: Ayaṃ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n:2874_2: Ettha “navutikoṭisahassehi bhikkhūhī”ti vā “bhikkhūnaṃ navutikoṭisahassehī”ti vā saṅkhyeyyasaṅkhyāpadhānavasena attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n:2874_3: Ayaṃ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n:2875_5: Ayaṃ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n:2876_3: Ettha satasahassamhi kappeti satasahassānaṃ kappānaṃ matthake.
anya-e0803n:2876_4: Ekanavute kappeti ekanavutiyā kappānaṃ matthaketi bhummavacanassa sāmibhummavacanavasena attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n:2876_5: Tathā hi “bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatī”ti ettha bhummavacanassa “bhagavato santike”ti sāmibhummavacanavasena attho gahito.
anya-e0803n:2876_6: Ayaṃ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n:2878_0: Nevamhākaṃ bhayaṃ koci, vane vāḷesu vijjatī”ti
anya-e0803n:2879_2: tattha vane vāḷānaṃ sahassāni ca satāni ca nahutāni ca yadi vijjanti.
anya-e0803n:2879_4: vāḷānaṃ satasahassāni ca nahutāni ca yadi vijjanti,
anya-e0803n:2879_6: Kocisaddo hi “ko te balaṃ mahārājā”ti ettha kosaddo viya kvasaddatthe vattati,
anya-e0803n:2879_8: Tena “koci kvaci kismiñci vāḷe ekassapi vāḷamigassa kāraṇā nevamhākaṃ bhayaṃ vijjatī”ti attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n:2879_11: Vāḷānaṃ kāraṇā appamattakampi amhākaṃ bhayaṃ na vijjatīti.
anya-e0803n:2879_12: Ayaṃ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n:2882_1: Ettha yasmā saddato samānavibhattiliṅgavacanānaṃ padānaṃ asamānavibhattiliṅgavacanānaṃ vā atthato pana samānānaṃ dūre ṭhitānampi ekasambandho hoti,
anya-e0803n:2882_5: Ayaṃ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n:2885_5: Tathā hi “satasahassāni nahutāni cā”ti imāni “duve cattārī”ti imehi visesitabbattā “dvisatasahassaṃ catunahuta”nti atthappakāsanāni bhavanti.
anya-e0803n:2885_6: Evaṃ santepi “duve”iccādīnaṃ saṅkhyāsaddānaṃ “satasahassānī”tiādīhi saṅkhyāsaddehi samānādhikaraṇatā pubbācariyehi na vuttā.
anya-e0803n:2885_8: Satasahassaṃ bhikkhū”tiādīsu samānādhikaraṇatā labbhati dabbavācakattā visesitabbapadānaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2885_10: tasmā īdisesu ṭhānesu samānādhikaraṇatā na icchitabbā yuttiyā abhāvato.
anya-e0803n:2886_2: Ubhayena imamatthaṃ dasseti “ayaṃ vasundharā bahalattena yojanānaṃ duve satasahassāni cattāri nahutāni ca ettakaṃ saṅkhātā”ti.
anya-e0803n:2886_3: “Ettaka”nti padassa ca “duve satasahassāni cattāri nahutāni cā”ti imehi vā “vasundharā”ti iminā vā samānādhikaraṇatā na icchitabbā.
anya-e0803n:2886_7: Apica “duve satasahassāni cattāri na hutāni cā”ti imesampi “vasundharā”ti iminā samānādhikaraṇatā na
anya-e0803n:2886_8: icchitabbā “bhikkhūnaṃ sata”nti ettha satasaddassa viya saṅkhyāvacanamattattā.
anya-e0803n:2886_10: “Saṅkhātā”ti pana “aya”nti ca imesaṃ “vasundharā”ti iminā samānādhikaraṇatā labbhati.
anya-e0803n:2886_11: Sabbopāyaṃ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n:2888_0: Cha piṅgalā pannarasa, haliddā tā catuddasā”ti
anya-e0803n:2889_1: Ettha cha piṅgalā pannarasāti cha ca pannarasa cāti ekavīsati piṅgalā rājiyoti attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n:2892_0: Asīti dasa eko ca, indanāmā mahabbalā”ti
anya-e0803n:2893_1: Ettha pana “ekanavutī”ti vattabbe “asīti dasa eko cā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2893_3: Ayaṃ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n:2895_0: Yesaṃ samaṃ na passāmi, kevalaṃ mahi’maṃ cara”nti
anya-e0803n:2896_1: Ettha “purisānaṃ tiṃsasahassāni navuti ca satāni tiṃsa nāvutyo”ti vuccanti.
anya-e0803n:2896_2: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne tiṃsasaddato sahassasaddassa navutisaddato ca satasaddassa lopaṃ katvā “tiṃsa nāvutyo”ti vuttanti na gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2896_3: Evañhi gahaṇe sati yattha katthacipi edisī saddaracanā kātabbā siyā,
anya-e0803n:2896_4: katāya ca edisāya saddaracanāya atthāvagamo vinā upadesena suṇantānaṃ na siyā,
anya-e0803n:2896_8: saṅketarūḷhassa pana vacanassattho yasmā gahitapubbasaṅketehi sutvā ñāyate,
anya-e0803n:2896_10: tasmā brahmadattena raññā vuttakālepi satthārā taṃ kathaṃ āharitvā vuttakālepi sabbe manussā vināpi upadesena vacanatthaṃ jānantīti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2897_0: Tiṃsañceva sahassāni, navuti ca satāni tu;
anya-e0803n:2899_0: Yasmā pāvacane santi, nayā ceva acintiyā;
anya-e0803n:2902_0: Upadesaṃ sadā gaṇhe, garuṃ sammā upaṭṭhahaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2909_0: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṃ
anya-e0803n:2919_0: Tasmā tāva bhūdhātuto pavattassa bhūtasaddassa atthuddhāro nīyate –
anya-e0803n:2925_2: “Bhūtamidanti bhikkhave samanupassathā”tiādīsu hi ayaṃ pañcakkhandhesu dissati.
anya-e0803n:2925_4: “Cattāro kho bhikkhu mahābhūtā hetū”ti ettha dhātūsu.
anya-e0803n:2930_0: Tatra samānatthapadesu ekamevādipadaṃ gahetvā niddeso kātabbo –
anya-e0803n:2930_1: bhavitunti hotuṃ vijjituṃ paññāyituṃ sarūpaṃ labhituṃ.
anya-e0803n:2930_2: Ettha vuttanayānusārena sesānampi tumantānaṃ niddeso vitthāretabbo,
anya-e0803n:2930_3: sabbāni tumantapadāni catutthiyatthe vattanti “tvaṃ mama cittamaññāya,
anya-e0803n:2930_6: Tasmā bhavituntiādīnampi “bhavanatthāyā”ti vā “bhavanattha”nti vā “bhavanāyā”ti vā ādinā attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n:2930_7: Apica “nekkhammaṃ daṭṭhu khemato”ti ettha “daṭṭhu”nti padassa “disvā”ti atthadassanato yathārahaṃ tumantāni tvāsaddantapadatthavasenapi gahetabbāni.
anya-e0803n:2930_10: Tatrāyamattho “tuṃ iti etadanto nipāto catutthiyā atthe vattatī”ti.
anya-e0803n:2938_9: paribhāvetvāna”iccevamādīni sakammakāni ussukkanatthāni tvādiyantapadāni hetukattariyeva bhavanti.
anya-e0803n:2939_0: Tatra samānatthapadesu ekamevādipadaṃ gahetvā niddeso kātabbo –
anya-e0803n:2939_2: Evaṃ vuttanayānusārena sesānampi tvādiyantapadānaṃ niddeso vitthāretabbo.
anya-e0803n:2939_3: Ayaṃ pana viseso bhutvāti sampattiṃ anubhutvāti sakammakavasena attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n:2939_4: Bhutvā anubhutvāti imesañhi samānatthataṃ saddhammavidū icchanti.
anya-e0803n:2941_0: Atthaṃ sūcenti “hutvā”ti, padassa pana neva te.
anya-e0803n:2950_2: Niruttipiṭake hi nipātaparicchede avibhattikāni katvā tvādiyantapadāni vuttāni.
anya-e0803n:2950_3: Saddatthavidūnaṃ pana mate paṭhamādivibhattivasena savibhattikāni bhavanti.
anya-e0803n:2951_7: Bhutvāna bhikkhu bhikkhassu iccādī samānakattukānaṃ dhātūnaṃ pubbakāle tvādisaddappayogā.
anya-e0803n:2951_8: “Bhutvā gacchatī”ti ettha hi “bhutvā”ti idaṃ pubbakālakriyādīpakaṃ padaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2951_10: samānakattukāni cetāni padāni ekakattukānaṃ kriyānaṃ vācakattā.
anya-e0803n:2951_13: Ayaṃ nayo aññatrāpi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n:2954_2: “Udito”ti idaṃ pana uttarakālakriyādīpakaṃ padanti na vattabbaṃ samānakālakriyāya idhādhippetattā.
anya-e0803n:2954_4: Ayaṃ nayo aññatrāpi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n:2955_6: ṭhatvā kathetī”ti ca samānakālatāyapi ajjhenakathanehi pubbepi nisajjaṭṭhānāni hontīti sakkā pubbuttarakālatā sambhāvetuṃ,
anya-e0803n:2956_5: Ayaṃ nayo aññatrāpi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n:2956_7: Abhighātabhūtasamāyoge pana abhighātajasaddassa samānakālatā ettha labbhatīti idhāpi purimāniyeva udāharaṇāni yuttānīti.
anya-e0803n:2957_1: Paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā”iccādi asamāne kattari payogo.
anya-e0803n:2957_2: Ettha hi pisācaṃ disvā purisassa bhayaṃ hoti,
anya-e0803n:2957_3: paññāya disvā assa puggalassa āsavā parikkhīṇā.
anya-e0803n:2957_4: Evaṃ samānakattukatā dhātūnaṃ na labbhati dassanakriyāya purisesu pavattanato,
anya-e0803n:2957_6: Ayaṃ nayo aññatrāpi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n:2959_0: Iccevaṃ sabbathāpi samānakattukānaṃ dhātūnaṃ pubbakāle tvādisaddappayogo,
anya-e0803n:2959_6: byattayena saddasiddhippayogoti sattadhā tvādiyantānaṃ padānaṃ payogo veditabbo.
anya-e0803n:2960_0: Yadi evaṃ kasmā kaccāyane “pubbakālekakattukānaṃ tuna tvāna tvā vā”ti pubbakāleyeva ekakattukaggahaṇaṃ katanti?
anya-e0803n:2960_2: Kaccāyane hi yebhuyyena pavattiṃ sandhāya “pubbakālekakattukāna”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2960_3: Yasmā pana “iti katvā”tiādīnaṃ padānaṃ hetuatthavasenapi pubbācariyehi attho saṃvaṇṇito,
anya-e0803n:2960_4: tasmā “bhavitvā”tiādīnaṃ bhūdhātumayānaṃ tvādisaddantānaṃ padānaṃ aññesañca “pacitvā”tiādīnaṃ yathāpayogaṃ
anya-e0803n:2965_0: “Gacchāmi dāni nibbānaṃ, yattha gantvā na socati”;
anya-e0803n:2969_0: Evaṃ bhūtasaddassa atthuddhāro ca tumantapadañca tvādiyantapadañcāti atthattikaṃ vibhattaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2974_0: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṃ
